item.text: yang dag pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/
bod skad du/ yang dag pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal badzra he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs nas/ thugs yang dag pa las yi ge a zhes gsungs pas/ skye ba med pa las skye ba'i cho 'phrul du 'khor rnams rang bzhin du byung ngo/ bka'// de nas yang dpa'
bo mchog gis shU'u n+ya ta'i sngags kyis thams cad zil gyis gnon te/ 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/ bkra shis byin can gnas rnams su// blang dang sbyang ba rtags thon
nas// thig bzhi re mig dgu pa bri// tshon legs mdzes par bya ba dang// ma hA dam pa'i ting 'dzin bya// rgyu yi sa bon las 'byung ba// rang bzhin rim pa dmigs nas ni// bruM
las 'das brgyad rtsibs dang ldan// zhe sdang rgyu yi sa bon can// bton nas de dang steng 'og can// hUM mdzad la sogs rnam par grags// tsit+ta hUM dang bcas pa
nyid// rgyu yi sa bon yab yum 'khril// tsan d+ha b+huM las sangs rgyas rigs// spyan mas sa bon tsan da'o// rdo rje ra ba bar khyams can// gru bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan// ka ba brgyad
mchog khyad par can// sur+ya tsan tra'i steng du dag/ hUM las dkar po rtse lnga grub// rgyu yi sa bon rab bsam gsal// rdo rje'i rigs su gyur pa ni// dbus dkar g.yas mthing g.yon
pa dmar// badzra tsakra rat+na dang// pad+ma tshon chen yum gyi rgya// mnyam par thabs dang shes rab tu// bud med dbus su 'khor rnams rgyas// kun gyi dbugs kyi 'byung ba yin// hUM

tri hri a dza du baM/ hUM dang muM badzra d+h+rika/ badzra bu su swa b+ha wA Ad+ma ko\u0f85haM/ yaM raM baM dang yaM dang sruM/ b+h+ruM dang rnam pa yongs kyis so// hUM muM bzlas pa mthar phyin nas// mig rten ri mo mdun du bzhug/ phrin gdags
bsod nams tshogs bskyed nas// yab yum gnyis med khyab par las// thal chen khrag dang zhag kyang dgod// nyan pa la sogs rtags kyi mchog/ sa ma ya dang dam rdzas sbyin// lha dang 'dres pa dam pa'i
dam// de nas bdag po'i sku las/ thams cad lha dang lha mor byin gyis brlabs pa'i thabs 'di dag bka' stsal to// phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang dag ni// legs par mchod de sbyin par bya// sangs rgyas rnams
kyi mdzad spyod bzhin// gsang ba don du gnyer ba'i phyir// srog lus bu dang bu mo dang// rab tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul// gnas ci ra na mchod pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin yang
dag grub pa'i rgyud las/ rang bzhin bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas zil gyis gnon pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ he ru ka sogs lha mo brgyad// yig 'bru la ni yang dag

bsam// de bzhin kham por 'od dang bcas// zhing la sogs pa de bzhin no// bro gar 'du 'phro byas nas su// 'bru brgyad pas ni shes pa sbyang// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba sbyin// bsnyen pa mthar ru phyir
nas ni// thams cad 'dus nas mnyam pa nyid// thig le rab tu gsal ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin yang dag bsgrub pa'i rgyud las/ khro bo ston pa'i le'u ste gsum
pa'o//// de nas rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas bka' stsal pa/ rim mam cig car 'jug pa'i gnas// ri rtse chu 'gram sa gzhi legs// bdud rtsi byug pa byas nas ni// chos rnams rang
bzhin rnams dag las// yi ge so so'i ngo bo ru// dbang bas don de 'jug brtag bya// yi ge bkod pa'i 'jug spyod pa ni// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so// de yi rang bzhin ye shes so// de yi rang bzhin 'od
gsal ba// gsal la dag pa dri ma med// de las sgyu ma'i sku rnams rdzogs// mtshan dang dpe byad rnam dag pa// me long ye shes las grub pa// mtshan ma la sogs sbyor ba gang// rang bzhin med pa'i rang
bzhin gyis// mnyam nyid las ni grub pa yin// ye shes de ni 'dir bshad do// de nas sgyu ma yi gnas su// thams cad mkha' ltar dag pa yin// bka' yi 'khor lo sbyor ba dang// lha yi pho brang sgyu ma'i

sku// mkha' la sogs pa du ma'i rgya// bya ba'i rig pa thams cad dag/ rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid yin no// tshon sku pad+ma lha yi rigs// sku gsung thugs su brlab par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
rang bzhin yang dag pa bsgrub pa las/ ye shes kyi rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas nyid kyi sngags kyi bdag po chen po'i don dang ldan par mdzad pa'i phyir/ 'khor la bka' stsal pa/
bgegs rnams rab tu zhi ba'i phyir// bsnyen pa'i las ni yin par bshad// nye bar bsgrub pa'i las yin te// sgrub pa chen po 'grub par gsungs// dbu la rigs lnga'i rgyal bas brgyan// sku gsung thugs kyi

lha rnams rdzogs// skye mched la ni lha mo yang// byang chub sems las dkyil 'khor bskyed// nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor brtsegs ma la// a dang k+sha la sogs pa yi// sgra dang dbyangs kyi yi ge rnams// nyis 'gyur

rin pa rab tu dgos// d+hu pa puSh+pa a lo ka g+han d+ha/ A+oM a hUM dang swa hA lnga// sa ma ya s+t+wam rab tu bsam// a nu ra ga gnyis med bde// A+oM a d+ha ri shadz+nyA na sogs/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+nya nya/ Ta Tha Da d+ha Na/

ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya wa ra la/ sha Sha sa ha k+Sha A/ a A/ i I/ u U/ ri rI/ li l-I/ e ai/ o au/ AM a/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin yang dag bsgrub pa las/ yi ge 'phreng ba
bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// dpal 'jigs byed chen po de zil gyis gnon pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'khor rnams lus ngag yid gsum rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas/
rang bzhin 'di lta bu bka' stsal pa/ bar du gcod pa'i bgegs rnams gzhil// byin brlabs de las byung ba yi// mkha'i dkyil du bskyed dang rdzogs// bskyed pas dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor

ro// phyi dang nang dang gsang bas bslab// A+auM badzra shri he ru ka/ badzra kro d+hi shwa ri stom/ badzra ko'u ri ha/ badzra tsau ri ha/ badzra pra mo ha/ badzra be ta li ha/ badzra pu ka si ha/ badzra g+has ma ri ha/ badzra sma sha ni ha/ badzra tsa n+d+ra

la ha/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ mthar phyin pa'i yi ge bsam/ mtshan gsum bzlas dang spyan drang mchod// bstim nas gzhan la las
rnams bcol// las la gzung cing gnad pa bstam// de 'og dngos grub yang dag go/ thugs ni shin tu bstan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin las dpal yang dag grub pa'i thugs kyi

'khor lo bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// dpal yang dag grub pa'i rgyud las// tsit+ta'i dkyil 'khor dam pa rdzogs so sa ho//// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nya na gar+b+ha dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba bai ro tsa
nas bsgyur////

rgya gar skad du/ badzra ma hA gu h+ya karma tan tra/ bod skad du/ rdo rje gsang ba chen po las kyi rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bshad pa'i dus gcig na/
bcom ldan chos thams cad kyi bdag nyid chen po de/ 'og min chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i gzhal yas dbus med pa na/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang/ khams gsum gyi sems can dang/ chos thams cad

dang/ kun mnyam par bzhugs pa'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje kun tu bzang po de nyid kyi chos nyid kyi rang bzhin de la/ nyid kyi dgongs pa la zhugs pas/ chos thams cad sangs rgyas par mkhyen to// de
nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje kun tu bzang po rigs kyi bdag po des/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang/ khams gsum gyi sems can dang/ chos thams cad nyid dang mnyam par bzhed nas ma skyes pa'i chos nyid

la bzhugs so// de nas ma bskyed pa'i chos nyid de kun la snang bar bzhed nas/ ye shes kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas/ ma skyes pa'i snying po/ ye shes kyi a zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di
bsgrags so// khams gsum kun la ar gsal lo// chos thams cad ma skyes pa ye shes kyi rang bzhin de a las A+oM snang bar byas so// khams gsum kun la or gsal lo// o'i sgra yang grags so// kun

la A+oM du gsal lo// de nas A+oM du snang bar byas so// A+oM gyi sgra yang grags so// khams gsum kun la A+oM du gsal lo// de nas badzra pany+tsa/ zhes bya ba'i sgra bsgrags nas// gser gyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa

nyid du byas so// kun tu rdo rjer gsal lo// de nas badzra b+ha drA zhes bya ba'i sgra grags nas// nyid rdo rje kun tu bzang po ye shes kyi skur snang bar mdzad do// ye shes kyi skur snang bar mdzad nas/ ma skyes pa'i
ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par zhugs nas/ chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i gzhal yas/ de bzhin nyid du mnyam par gshegs so// rdo rje gsang ba las kyi rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang
po'o//// de nas khams gsum gnas pa'i lha chen po tshangs pa'i rigs dang/ brgya byin dbang po'i rigs dang/ ma hA de ba chen po dang/ steng lha'i rigs dang/ 'og sa bdag gi rigs dang/ shar dri
za'i rigs dang/ lho gshin rje'i rigs dang/ nub klu'i rigs dang/ byang gnod sbyin gyi rigs dang/ me lha'i rigs dang/ srin po'i rigs dang/ rlung lha'i rigs dang/ dbang ldan gyi rigs dang/ lha ma yin

ma yin pa'i dang/ rje bo dang bran mor gyur pa rnams dang/ bdag tu rtogs pa ni ma spongs/ 'khrul pa'i gzung 'dzin ni ma bral/ blang dor med pa'i theg pa la ma zhugs pa'i dbang gis/ de dag thams cad la

sngon rdo rje kun tu bzang po'i 'thad pa'i sgo nas 'dul tshad du bstan pa de bkrid drang du ma rtogs/ nges par rtag pa'i dbang gtso ste/ rdo rje kun tu bzang pos ye shes kyi skur snang bar mdzad de/ chos thams cad
sangs rgyas par mdzod pa de la/ bdag tu rtogs pas gzung 'dzin blang dor du brtags te/ ye shes kyi sku la/ sku khro ba/ ngag gtum pa/ sems gdul la/ 'o dod chen po 'bod cing/ shin tu slong ba'i skad

'byin pa/ mnar med pa'i nyon mongs pa/ bskal pa stong phrag nyi shu'i bar du gnas pa dang/ de bzhin nyid la brtag tu med pa las/ rang rang du rtog pa'i chos nyid la zhed pa'i mthu brtas pas/ dug lnga'i
'bras bu smin te/ mi 'tshams pa'i lus dang mi 'tshams pa'i bsam pa dang/ mi 'tsham pa'i rnam par smin pa dang/ mi 'tshams pa'i 'bras bu dang/ mi 'tsham pa'i sdug bsngal dang/ mnar med pa'i nyon mongs

pa dang/ bskal pa stong phrag nyi shu'i bar du gnas pa dang/ dus med par lha dang mi'i 'jig rten phung bar byed pa/ de nas mi 'tshams pa'i sdug bsngal zad nas/ gti mug dran med pa'i sdug bsngal dran pa

dbyings su chud de/ byang chub skye ba'i thabs gting med par gnas so// rdo rje gsang ba las kyi rgyud las rtog pa rnam smin gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas rdo rje kun tu bzang po des/ thugs rje ye shes
skyes nas/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid las bzhengs nas 'di skad gsungs so// A+oM/ yod med stong pa ye shes rnal 'byor sku// nam mkha' bzhin du khyab pa'i thugs rje yi// mi 'tshams nyon mongs
sdug bsngal zhi mdzad pa// ye shes kun tu snang mdzad skur bzhengs shig/ ces ma skyes pa mngon du skur bzhengs su gsol lo// de nas dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad ma skyes pa'i dbyings nas skur

bzhengs so// de nas dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid chen po'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs pa/ A+oM/ snang srid snod bcud bsdus pa thams cad kun// bdag gi rdo rje skye mched rang bzhin
te// ye nas rang 'byung ye shes lha yi lha// mthun pa'i sdug bsngal can rnams zhi bar mdzod// ces gsungs pas/ de nas dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad rgyud ma dag pa'i sdug bsngal can zhi bar mdzad

pa'i sku/ rdo rje kun tu bzang po'i skur bzhugs so// rdo rje kun tu bzang po des/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi che ba lnga ldan pa'i rtags bkod pa/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya paN tsa A+oM/ A+oM sarba ta tha ga ta bA' ka paN tsa

A+oM/ hUM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta paN tsa hUM/ swa sarba ta thA ga ta gu na pan tsa swa/ ha sarba ta thA ga ta karma paN tsa ha/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta swa b+ha wa At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ rdo rje gsang ba las kyi rgyun las/ che ba byin gyis brlabs

pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas rdo rje kun tu bzang po de/ rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las byung ngo// A+oM badzra mahA shrI he ru ka/ badzra mahA kro d+hi shwa ra s+t+waM/ A+oM b+hud+d+ha

mahA shrI he ru ka/ bud+d+ha mahA kro d+hi shwa ri s+t+waM/ A+oM rat+na mahA shrI he ru ka/ rat+na mahA kro d+hi shwa ri stAM/ A+oM pad+ma mahA shri he ru ka/ pad+ma kro d+hi shwa ri stAM/ A+oM karma mahA shri he ru ka/ A+oM karma kro d+hi shwa ri s+t+waM/ zhes 'bar ba chen po lnga

phyung nas/ A+oM a hUM/ hUM pa ra na phaT/ ces spros/ hUM hUM hUM/ zhes bsdus nas/ gnas 'dir phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan par byas so// de nas ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha spros so// de nas he he he he he he he he spros so// de nas

phaT phaT phaT phaT ces spros nas/ A+oM A hUM/ hUM pa ra na phaT/ saM ha ra na hUM hUM hUM/ zhes bsdus nas/ khro mo dang/ 'phra men ma dang/ sgo ma'i tshigs spros te/ phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan par bya'o// rdo rje kun tu bzang po
'di'i sku nyid du bzhugs so// sku gsung thugs las byung nas sku nyid dkyil 'khor gyi lhar bstan nas bzhugs so// rdo rje gsang ba las kyi rgyud las/ sku la rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par

bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas rdo rje kun tu bzang po nges sku lnga mngon du phyung ste/ zhe sdang dang zhe sdang gi yul gnas su dag pa badzra he ru ka yab yum phyung ngo// 'dod chags yul dang chas pa
gnas su dag pa pad+ma he ru ka yab yum phyung ngo// gti mug yul dang chas pa gnas su dag pa bud+d+ha he ru ka yab yum phyung ngo// phrag dog yul dang chas pa gnas su dag pa karma he ru ka yab yum

phyung ngo// nga rgyal yul dang chas pa gnas su dag pa rad na he ru ka yab yum phyung ngo// de nas sku rnam pa lnga po de ltar phyung nas/ 'gro ba lnga'i gnas su mthing nag dang/ smug nag dang/ ser nag dang/ dmar

nag dang/ ljang nag la sogs ba sku mdog dang phyag mtshan rdo rje dang/ dbyug tho dang/ kha TAM kha dang/ zhags pa dang/ gar gyi rgya gram dang/ zhal gsum phyag drug/ lha chen po rnams kyi gdan la zhabs brgyad
brkyang bskum dang/ gyed kyi 'dor stabs su bzhugs nas/ rigs drug dang mthun pa'i skad kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad do// rdo rje gsang ba las kyi rgyud las/ sku lnga rdzogs par bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga
pa'o//// de nas rdo rje kun tu bzang po des khams gsum dbang du sdud pa 'di gsungs so// dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang/ khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad hUM hUM hUM zhes pas mngon sum du bsdus

nas/ nyid la thim par mdzad do// A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya si d+hi saM ha ra na hUM/ zhes khams gsum he ru ka nyid sku gcig gis gang bar mdzad do// A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta bA' ka si d+hi saM ha ra na hUM/ zhes pas khams

gsum gsung gcig gis gang bar mdzad do// A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta si d+hi sang ha rat+na hUM zhes pas/ khams gsum he ru ka nyid sku gcig gi sku gsung thugs las/ gzhan cang mi gnas bar mdzad de/ yang bag

chags ngan pa'i mthu langs nas/ rang rang gi lus grub ste las ngan pa spyad pa las/ de nas he ru kas hUM hUM hUM bi sha badzra kro d+ha dza la man Da la phaT phaT phaT/ ha la ha la ha la hUM/ zhes brjod pa las/ 'jig

rten drug gi phyogs bcu kun g.yogs so// 'ur chem gyi sgra phyung ngo// rab tu zhu nas rdul gtor bas/ lha klu gnod sbyin gyi rigs/ mthu che ba dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa brgyal du yang nas yang bcug nas/
bkrag dang/ gzim mdangs dang/ shes pa'i bcud bsdus nas/ shes pa nyams pa thams cad byas so// rdo rje gsang ba las kyi rgyud las/ drag po dbang sdud kyi le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas snying po bzlas
brjod kyi le'u 'du gsungs so// rdo rje 'dzin pas glu drug po 'di blangs pas/ chos kyi dbyings na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ khams gsum na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyi don lhun gyis grub par

bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag po dpal chen po nyid kyi don gyi sgra 'di brjod do// oM badzra shrI he ru ka badzra mahA kro d+hi shwa ri sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ zhes gsungs so// gsungs pas

don gyi sgra'i rgyas btab nas/ thams cad bde ba la gnas so// de nas sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las kyi sprul pa he ru ka lnga phyung ste/ don gyi sgra phyung ba dang che ba bskyed pa/ A+oM badzra shrI he ru

ka hUM/ badzra kro d+hi shwa ri s+t+waM/ oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ A+oM bud+d+ha shrI he ru ka hUM/ bud+d+ha ko d+hi shwa ri s+t+wam/ A+oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ A+oM rat+na shri he ru ka hUM phaT/ rat+na kro d+hi shwa ri s+t+wam/ A+oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ A+oM pad+ma shri he ru ka

hUM/ pad+ma kro d+hi shwa ri s+t+wam/ A+oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ karma shri he ru ka hUM/ karma kro d+hi shwa ri hUM/ A+oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ zhes che ba bskyed cing don gyi sgra phyung nas/ rnam par smin pa gsum dang/ 'gro ba rigs drug gi
sems can gnas nas stongs par byas nas/ thugs gsang ba'i dbyings su bsdus/ ye shes kyi sras su bskyed/ 'phags pa yang mchod don yang byas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dngos

grub thabs cad bsdus so// de nas sku gsung thugs kyi yan lag khro mo dang/ 'phra men dang/ sgo ma dang 'phrin las kyi lha phyung ste/ A+oM badzra ke'u ri ha/ A+oM badzra tsa'u ri ha/ A+oM badzra pra mo ha/ A+oM badzra be ta li ha/ A+oM

badzra pu ka si ha/ A+oM badzra g+has ma ri ha/ A+oM badzra sma sha ni ha/ A+oM badzra tsan+Ta li ha/ A+oM badzra sing ha mu kha he/ A+oM badzra bya g+h+ri mu kha he/ A+oM badzra sri la mu kha he/ A+oM badzra shwa na mu kha he/ oM badzra kri ta mu kha he/ A+oM badzra kang ka

mu kha he/ A+oM badzra ka ka mu kha he/ A+oM badzra hu ka lu mu kha he/ A+oM badzra ar+ya de tsa te da tsa phaT/ A+oM badzra a mo ka hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra lo ka paM phaT/ A+oM badzra pa smin pa la yab to ho phaT/ A+oM ma nu ra sha si/ A+oM pra ma ni/ A+oM

ro'u tri/ A+oM be sna bi/ kau ma ri/ in tra ma/ badzra bing ka lam/ a mri te/ so'u ma/ da Na Da ma/ rag sha si/ bag sha se/ ra ti ra/ ru ti ra ma ti/ e ka tsa ra/ ma nu ha raM/ si hi ka raM/ ba yaM be/ badzra ma ra ni/

badzra ag ne/ b+ha ra hi/ badzra tsa mun ti/ pu tan/ ba ru na/ mahA kA la/ tsa kra li/ gum pa ka ra/ lam bo d+ha ra b+h+yo/ A+oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ zhes don gyi sgra phyung nas/ rnam par smin pa gsum dang/ 'gro ba rigs
drug gi sems can gnas nas stongs par byas nas/ thugs gsang ba'i dbyings su bsdus/ ye shes kyi sras su bskyed/ 'phags pa mchod/ don yang byas nas/ dngos grub thams cad bsdus so// rdo rje gsang
ba las kyi rgyud las/ snying po bzlas brjod kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag po des/ gsung sgra don gyi le'u 'di bstan to// kye kun gyi snying po byang

chub sems ni kun gyi rgyu// nga ni kun gyi rang bzhin te// byang chub sems ni rang bzhin bshad// bya ba ye nas skye ba med// spros dang bral ba'i rang bzhin te// chos sku ma skyes rnam par byang// chub pa kun la
khyab par byed// 'dod pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i phyir// skye ba med la thams cad skyes// sems ni kun gyi snying po ste// 'dod pa thams cad sems pa'i phyir// de phyir bskyed pa'i snying po

byed// gang 'dod sems ni de bskyed pa// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin no// skye med 'dod pas de bzhin nyid// rnam dag chos kyi skur 'dod pa'o// skye bar 'dod pa kun tu snang// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rang

bzhin no// sems de skyes pa'i snying po ni// ma skyes snying po a de rgyu// kun tu sprul byed yi ge'i tshogs// a rni su tri pri du tshogs// 'gro ba drug tu snang ba yang// kun tu sprul byed chos nyid do// ma skyes a ni rdo

rje ste// rdo rje ye nas kun tu bzang// da ni kun gyi snying por bshad// yan lag lnga ni sangs rgyas lnga// rnam dbang yul dus chos mtshan nyid// byang chub sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bshad// sangs rgyas dkyil

'khor tshogs rnams kyis// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// che ba'i yon tan rdzogs byas te// gsung sgra gsang ba'i snying brjod pas// don gyi dbyangs sgra drug tu grags// A+oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ A+oM

dang ru dang lu dang ni// hUM dang b+h+yo dang hUM ste drug/ gsang ba'i snying po 'di brjod pas// dug gsum rnam smin ru tra dang// khams gsum rgyud drug nyon mongs rnams// gzigs pa'i thugs rje chen po yis// bla

med byang chub thob bya'i phyir// gsang ba'i snying po 'di brjod do// dper na dbang chen rje de yis// yang bran khol du bos pa bzhin// spyan sngar mi 'du thabs med 'dus// dbyings su bsdus nas sras bskyed

spros// mchod cing 'dod pa bsdu bar mdzad// de don 'bru 'di bshad bya nyon// chos sku ye nas skye ba med// ma skyes pa yi snying po a// skye ba'i cho 'phrul yon tan A+oM// yan lag rdzogs pas A+oM du snang// A+oM ni

sku yi snying po ste// bde gshegs sku yi snying por bshad// sku ni phyag rgya bzhi ldan sku// ru ni ru tra'i snying po ste// ra tra ru tra ma ra tra// ra ga ra ta rag sha ste// dug gsum rnam par smin pa ste// ru tra gsum gyi snying

por bshad// lus ni 'khor ba phyin ci log/ dug lnga smin pa'i rgyud drug ste// rgyud drug spyi yi snying por bshad// hUM ni sdud pa'i snying po ste// dbyings su bsdus nas sbyor ba yis// ye shes sems dpa'i sras su

bskyed// b+h+yo ni bskul ba'i snying po ste// 'phags pa mchod cing 'gro don byed// hUM ni sdud pa'i snying po ste// 'dod pa sku gsung dngos grub sdud// de don 'dod ltar rim par gyis// badzra he ru kas 'di brjod

pas// gsang ba A+oM gyi snying po la// rang rgyud dag pa'i bsnyen pa ste// badzra phyag rgya bzhi ldan gsal// gsang ba ru yi snying po yis// ru tra rnam gsum snying nas 'dren// gsang ba lu yi snying po yis// 'khor ba
rgyud drug thugs rjes 'dren// rang rgyud dag pa'i thugs rje yis// dmyal ba'i 'jig rten stongs par mdzad// tsha grang sdug bsngal gtan sa len// yang nas yang di lan gnyis so// hUM gis gsang

ba'i dbyings bsdus nas// gnyis med sbyor bas sras su bskyed// b+h+yo ni bskul ba'i snying po ste// gzugs bzhi gzugs de spros byas la// spros med dbyings kyi pho brang na// sangs rgyas nam mkha'i khams gang

mchod// hUM gis slar bsdus dngos grub de// sku gsung yon tan 'phrin las thugs// phyag rgya bzhi ldan gnas su sdud// bdag dang gzhan don rnam pa gnyis// lhun grub mthar phyin grub pa ste// thugs rje 'gro

don mdzad las byung// bdag nyid lhun grub don mi gnyer// rgyal ba'i rigs chen he ru ka lngas// gsang ba'i snying po A+oM brjod pas// rang rgyud dag pa'i gnyen po lnga// phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan gyur nas// dregs
pa rnam gsum 'dul ba dang// rang rgyud dag pa'i 'dul skal gyis// rgyud drug stongs mdzad gong ma bzhin// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// 'phrin las lhag ma med par lags// 'khor ba rgyud
drug gnas stongs nas// bla med byang chub sangs rgyas mnyam// zhes gsungs/ rdo rje gsang ba las kyi rgyud las/ ru lu don gyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas kun bzang dges pa des// glu drug
dbyangs kyi don bshad pa// 'go ru dbyangs dang kun de'u dbyangs// sha ta ba dang gar bzang ba// breng nge dbyangs dang dung nge dbyangs// 'go ru dang po sgra chen sgrogs// kun de'i bar du 'gug par

byed// sha tas don gyi snying po 'dzin// gar zas de yi las byed la// breng nges bar chad med pa'am// dung nges dga' dang 'gugs par byed// A+oM gyi snying po dbyangs blangs pas// dkyil 'khor phyag brgya bzhi

ldan gsal// ru yi snying po dbyangs blangs pas// ma DaM ka dang kha T+waM kha// a ka ra dang rnam pa gsum// dug gsum lus ngag yid gsum gyis// khams gsum ru tra rnam gsum 'dul// lu yi snying po dbyangs

blangs pas// rgyud drug spyi yi snying po ste// dug lnga smin pa lam lnga nas// 'khor ba rgyud drug gnas nas 'dren// thugs rje'i rang bzhin yang dang yang// hUM zhes gsang ba'i dbyangs 'di yis// gdul bya yang
dag dbyings su sdud// bskul ba b+h+yo yi dbyangs 'di yis// dbyings nas ye shes de yis ni// 'phags mchod 'gro ba'i don yang byas// hUM zhes bsdud pa'i dbyangs de yis// gang 'dod don de grub par
byed// rigs zhes bya ba'i nges pa ni// sku gsung yon tan 'phrin las thugs// nga yi rang bzhin bstan pa yin// 'di las ma gtogs pa yis chos// nga yis su la bstan pa med// nga las ma byung chos yod na//
nga men pa yi ston pa dgos// nga las byung ba'i rigs chen lnga// don grub ldan pa'i dbyangs blangs pas// 'jig rten drug ni stongs par mdzad// sdug bsngal drug ni gtan nas brlags// rigs

chen lnga yi rigs su 'gyur// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las// rigs chen lnga dang mnyam par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje gsang ba las kyi rgyud las/ dpal he ru ka dbyangs drug gis/ ru tra dang rgyud
drug rigs lngar bsgral ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas kun tu bzang po des bdag nyid chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di phyung nas/ sangs rgyas dang sems can thams cad nyid kyi bcud bsdus so// bdag
ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bdag po dpal chen he ru ka/ bdag la gnas pa'i chos rnams ni// ye nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// bdag gi phung po rnam lnga ni// ye nas rang byung bcom ldan 'das// rigs

lnga he ru sku lnga gsal// 'byung ba rnam shes yul dus rnams// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor byas nas ni// phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa yis// sangs rgyas phal chen thams cad kyi// lhun grub che ba rnam lnga'o// sangs rgyas

lnga yi bdag nyid kyis// ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams dang// khams gsum rgyud drug thams cad kun// bla med byang chub drang ba'i phyir// dbyangs drug gsung sgra brjod don ni// tshangs pa la sogs phyogs skyong

tshogs// pha dang ma dang chung ma dang// bu dang bu mo ming por bcas// sngon byung bdag nyid chen po'i// bka'i nos 'khrul te nyams pa yis// lha mi 'jig rten kun phyung ba// gong du smos pa de ltar dang// bar du

khro mo la sogs pa'i// srin po'i tshogs kyi phung ba ni// phyogs skyong rnams kyi bu mo ste// srin mo dri 'thor bu mo ni// srin mo ke'u ri ma zhes bya// sngon mo zhing gi dbyug pa thogs// des kyang 'jig rten phung bar

byed// srin po gshin rje'i bu mo ni// srin mo rtse'u ri ma zhes bya// ser mo mda' gzhu kun la 'phen// des kyang 'jig rten phung bar byed// srin mo blun mo'i bu mo ni// srin mo pra mo ha zhes bya// dmar mo mdung

rtse gsum pa thogs// des kyang 'jig rten phung bar byed// srin mo gnod sbyin bu mo ni// srin mo pe ta li zhes bya// nag mo rdo rje byis pa za// des kyang 'jig rten phung bar byed// srin mo me za'i bu mo ni// srin

mo pu ka si zhes bya// dmar ser byis pa'i rgyu ma 'dren// des kyang 'jig rten phung bar byed// srin mo chen mo'i bu mo ni// srin mo kas ma ri zhes bya// dmar mo b+han d+ha'i khrag 'thung ma// des kyang 'jig rten

phung bar byed// srin mo rlung mo'i bu mo ni// srin mo sma sha ni zhes bya// mthing nag byis pa'i snying za ma// des kyang 'jig rten phung bar byed// srin mo bgegs chen bu mo ni// srin mo tsaN+Da li zhes bya// ser skya'i
mgo dang lus su 'brel// des kyang 'jig rten phung bar byed// dri za gshin rje klu mo dang// mnod sbyin chen mo la sogs pas// seng ge stag dang wa spyang bzhi// 'jigs byed dpal brtul stsal

mthong nas// 'jigs ma bzhi'i bu byung ba// srin mo lus la 'jigs byed mgo/ ming ni 'jigs byed ming btags te// sing nga dang ni bya kri dang// sri la sho la rnam pa bzhi// srin mo bu mo sing nga ma// ser mo

kha na ro yang thogs// des kyang 'jig rten phung bar byed// srin mo bu mo bya kri ma// dmar mo lus kyi khog pa 'dral// des kyang 'jig rten phung bar byed// srin mo bu mo sri la ma// nag mo bam chen ldag par

byed// des kyang 'jig rte phung bar byed// srin mo bu mo sho na ma// mthing nag khog 'dral sha chen za// des kyang 'jig rten phung bar byed// me rlung 'tshams kyi srin mo bzhi// mgyogs par byed pa'i stsal 'dod

nas// rgod dang dur bya bya rog dang// mthong byed 'ug pa la sogs te// mgyogs byed bzhi yi bu byung ba// srin mo bu mo kri ta ma// dmar mo baM gri thogs pa mo// des kyang 'jig rten phung bar byed// srin mo bu

mo kang ka ma// snar mo zhing chen phrag la khur// des kyang 'jig rten phung bar byed// srin mo bu mo kha kha ma// nag mo rgyu ma 'dren par byed// des kyang 'jig rten phung ba byed// srin mo bu mo hU lu ma// ser mo glo

snying srog 'dzin ma// des kyang 'jig rten phung bar byed// srin mo bum sna'i bu mo ni// rta yi gdong pa lcags kyu thogs// des kyang 'jig rten phung bar byed// srin mo rnam 'joms bu mo ni// phag gi gdong pa

zhags pa thogs// des kyang 'jig rten phung bar byed// srin mo sha za'i bu mo ni// spre'u'i gdong pa lcags sgrog thogs// des kyang 'jig rten phung bar byed// srin mo 'bod 'grogs bu mo ni// spyang khu'i
gdongs pa dril bu thogs// des kyang 'jig rten phung par byed// 'jig rten 'di na dbang che ba// ma rtogs gnod sbyin nyi shu brgyad// srin po tshangs pa lha chen dang// gtogs 'dod la sogs chung ma

ni// dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad de// lus kyi mdog dang sna tshogs la// lag cha rnam pa sna tshogs thogs// ma rtog pa las grub pa yi// mthu che 'di rnams ma rigs 'jig rten phung bar byed// de kun bdag po

chen po yi// ma hA de ba lha chen dang// srin po tshangs pa la sogs pa// ston pa'i zhal mthong don ma rig/ de dag yongs su 'dul ba'i phyir// skye med skye ba'i cho 'phrul ni// dpal chen he rur skur sprul
nas// dbang chen rnams ni drag shul btul// rmad du byung ba'i mdzad sbyor kyis// thams cad byin gyis brlabs nas ni// rigs kyi gdan du bkod de bzhag/ de nas thugs rje bdag po des// rang las byung
ba'i chos rnams ni// phung po rigs lnga'i skur bskyed nas// lha chen rnams kyi gdan la bzhag/ 'byung lnga yum du sku la 'khril// rnam shes brgyad la khro mo brgyad// yul brgyad las ni 'phra med

brgyad// tshad med bzhi la khro mo bzhi// 'phrin las rnam pa bzhi las ni// dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad byung// mthun pa'i mthun pa gzhom pa'i phyir// lus dang mdog dang lag cha dang// ming dang las rnams

mthun byas nas// lha mo ke ri brgyad kyis ni// srin mo ke ri brgyad rnams btul// lha mo 'phra med brgyan kyis ni// srin mo 'phra med brgyan rnams btul// lha mo sgo ma bzhi rnams kyis// srin mo sgo ma bzhi

rnams btul// lha mo dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis// srin mo chen mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad btul// de yang ji ltar btul zhe na// ming lus las rnams mthun byas nas// srin mo tshogs byas de dag la// lha mo rnams

kyis smras pa'i tshig/ kye srin mo grogs mo'i tshogs// lus kyi mdog ni ci yi don// brgyab cing za ba ci yi don// ces smras so// srin mo rnams kyis smras pa'i tshig/ grogs mo chen mo lha mo rnams// lus mdog

pha dang ma yis bskyed// lag cha brgyab cing za ba'i don// pha dang ma yis bskos pa yin// zhes smras so// lha mo rnams kyis smras pa'i tshig/ ltung ba'i sdug bsngal lha la che// 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal mi la

che// las ngan sdug bsngal ngan song gsum la che// zhes smras pa dang/ srin mo rnams kyis smras pa'i tshig/ lha mo chen mo grogs mo dag/ khyed kyi lus mdog ci yi don// brgyab cing za ba ci yi don// de skad ces
ni smras pa las// lha mo rnams kyis smras pa'i tshig/ bdag gi sku mdog nag pa ni// bdag ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bdag po dpal chen he ru ka'i// thugs ni mi 'gyur rtags su byung// lag cha 'khor

ba'i nying thos 'joms pa'i rtags// lha mo rnams kyis de smras so// de ru srin mo'i tshogs rnams kun// bdag cag rnams kyang bka' la 'jug/ ces zer bas/ lha mo rnams kyis smras pa'i tshig/ 'o na khyod kyi

snying po gang// zhes smras pa dang/ srin po rnams kyis snying po smras pa/ ru tra ru tra ma ra ta/ bdag cag kun gyi snying po ni// ru ru ru tra zhes bya ba lags// de skad ces smras pas lha mo rnams// dpal chen thugs

la zhugs pa ni// ru lu zhes brjod cing// dpal chen thugs la kun kyang zhugs// de nas 'khor bcas dkyil 'khor des// dus gsum sangs rgyas lhun grub kyis// che ba'i yon tan bsdu pa'i phyir// gnas bzhi phyag brgya

bzhi ldan gyis// bsnyen bsgrub rnam bzhi rdzogs byas te// nyid kyi don du che ba bsdu// 'gro ba'i don du snying po bzlas// A+oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gsung gi khams
gsum sgrol ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// rdo rje gsang ba chen po'i rgyud rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ badzra gu h+ya karma tan tra/ bod skad du/ rdo rje gsang ba

las kyi rgyud/ dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas rdo rje kun tu bzang po des chos thams cad skye 'jig med pa'i skur phyung ste/ nyid kyi 'khor skye 'jig med pa/ rtog pa thams cad 'joms pa'i

skur gyur pa'i phyir/ rang nyid mi snang bar byas nas/ nam mkha' las sgra 'di phyung ngo// a A/ e o/ o auM/ skye med cho 'phrul drag po'i skus// nam mkha'i khams kun gang bar 'gyur// zhes pa'i sgra phyung

ngo// nyid kyi sku dpal rdo rje kun tu bzang po'i sku dang/ dpal rigs lnga he ru ka'i sku dang/ dpal rdo rje gzhon nu'i sku dang/ ye shes rig pa'i sku dang/ gti mug 'joms pa'i sku dang/ zhe sdang 'joms pa'i sku
dang/ nga rgyal 'joms pa'i sku dang/ 'dod chags 'joms pa'i sku dang/ phrag dog 'joms pa'i sku dang/ gzugs 'joms pa'i sku dang/ tshor ba 'joms pa'i sku dang/ 'du shes 'joms pa'i sku dang/ 'du

byed 'joms pa'i sku dang/ rnam par shes pa 'joms pa'i sku dang/ 'dzin byed chen mo gti mug 'dzin pa dang/ zhe sdang 'dzin pa dang/ nga rgyal 'dzin pa dang/ 'dod chags 'dzin pa dang/ phrag dog 'dzin pa
dang/ gzugs 'dzin pa dang/ tshor ba 'dzin pa dang/ 'du shes 'dzin pa dang/ rnam par shes pa 'dzin pa'i sku dang/ khro bo chen po bcu dang/ khro mo chen mo bcus/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gtams nas

bzhugs so// de las sprul pa'i sku grangs med pa yang byung bar gyur to// de la rdo rje kun tu bzang pos bsgo ba/ kye skye ba med pas rdo rje la// 'jig pa med pa'i gzhon nu'i sku// 'gyur ba med pas mthing nag
mdog/ thams cad dbang sdud rgyas 'debs 'khril// g.yas pa theg dgu rdzogs rtags kyis// don mtshon nyon mongs dgu ni 'joms par mdzad// g.yon pa me dpung 'bar ba yis/ khams gsum bud shing
bsreg par mdzad// bar ma rtse lnga rtse gsum gyis// 'phags mchod dug gsum rtsad nas gcod// tha gnyis bsnams pa'i phyag mtshan gyis// mtshan chen ri rab phur bu des// sngon po lcags kyi phur pa
bsnams// stong gsum 'jig rten khams 'di ni// rdo rje ri rab phur bu 'dril// sku stod zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i// khro bo bcu'i skur bzhugs pa la// sku smad lcags kyi phur gsum bsnams// 'og ni rdo rje
gtan nas blangs// dkar nag mtshams su btab pa yis/ khams gsum sdug bsngal rtsad nas gcod// rnam pa'i mthu dang rdzu 'phrul 'phrog/ hUM gis thugs kyi dbyings nas bsdus// phyogs bcu khro rgyal sras
su bskyed// khyed ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sras te rdo rje gzhon nu'i sku// khams gsum sgrol ba'i las mdzad cig/ de nas dpal rdo rje gzhon nu des// rang gi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'od

zer spros// slar hUM gis bsdus nas/ nyid kyi sku gsung thugs la 'thim par mdzad do// de nyid kyi dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi che ba bsdu ba'i phyir/ A+oM aM hUM bzhi gnas bzhir bkod/ de nas spa ra na phaT ces

'bru bzhi spros nas/ chos kyi dbyings na bzhugs pa yis// lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas la// sku gsung thugs mnyes pa'i mchod pa phul nas/ slar saM ha rat+na hUM gis/ sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las kyi
dngos grub thams cad bdag gis gnas dbyig bsdus nas/ de nas don mdzad par dgongs/ yab yum gnyis su med pa las/ thugs rje ye shes kyi sras/ 'joms byed dang/ 'dzin byed kyi tshogs thams cad

spros pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ oM badzra kro d+ha hUM hUM/ kar gar rdza gar rdza hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas steng gi phyogs su spros/ A+oM badzra kro d+ha hUM/ bi dza ya ha na ha na hUM phaT/ shar du brjod/ A+oM badzra kro d+ha hUM/ ya man ta ka pa tsa

hUM phaT/ lho'i phyogs su sprul pas/ srid pa'i chos 'joms byed chen po lho ru brjod/ A+oM badzra kro d+ha hUM/ ha ya g+h+ri ba hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ nub tu 'o// A+oM badzra kro d+ha hUM/ a mri ta kun Da li tshin d+ha tshin d+ha hUM phaT/ byang

du'o// A+oM kro d+ha hUM/ nI la dan Da da ha da ha hUM phaT/ shar lhor ro// badzra kro d+ha hUM/ ar+ya a tsa la b+han d+ha ban d+ha hUM phaT/ lho nub tu'o// A+oM badzra kro d+ha hUM/ a pa ra dzi ta stiSh+Tha stiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ nub byang du'o// A+oM badzra kro

d+ha hUM/ trai lo kya bi dza ya b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha hUM phaT/ byang shar du'o// oM badzra kro d+ha hUM/ ma hA ba la pho ta pho ta hUM phaT/ 'og gi phyogs su spros/ phyogs bcur spros pas srid pa'i chos 'joms byed chen po khro bo bcu dang/

rtogs byed chen mo bcus/ phyogs bcu ru sku mdog dang phyag mtshan du chas nas/ 'dul ba'i gdan gyi steng 'thon te bzhugs pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ steng gi phyogs na khro bo chen po hUM ka ra/ sku mdog sngo skya zhal
gsum phyag drug pa/ rdo rje gshog pas khams gsum dbang du sdud// sku smad zhabs drug brkyang bskum gyad kyi dor stabs kyis// bgegs kyi rgyal po nyi zla tshangs pa'i gdon tshogs gnon// zhal gsum g.yas

pa ser ba g.yon dmar ba// dbus ni sngo skya sku dang mthun zhing phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan// phyag mtshan rdo rje ri rab phur bu ste// sku stod zhal gsum phyag drug khro bo bcu'i gzugs la// sku smad lcags kyi phur pa zur

gsum bsnams// sgra 'byin srid pa'i chos kun 'dzin dang gnyis su med par bzhugs// sprul pa'i 'phra men phag dang smig pu grangs med 'byin// phyag mtshan dang po gnyis ban d+ha dang rdo rje 'khrug cing gsol
ba// bar ma gnyis sprul pa'i phyag mtshan sna tshogs spyi mthun te// steng gi phyogs na bzhugs so// shar gyi phyogs na khro bo chen po rnam par rgyal// sku mdog dkar po zhal gsum phyag drug pa// sku
mdog zhal gsum phyag drug rdo rje gshog pa can// sku smad zhabs drug brkyang bskum gyad kyi 'dor thabs kyis// bgegs kyi rgyal po dri za'i gdon rnams gnon pa// zhal gsum g.yas sngo g.yon pa ljang ser

dbus dkar po// phyag mtshan rdo rje ri rab phur bu ste// sku stod zhal gsum phyag drug khro bo'i gzugs can la// sku smad lcags kyi phur pa zur gsum bsnams// 'dzin byed bsnyems ma nyid dang gnyis su med

par bzhugs// lho'i phyogs kyi khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed po ni// zhal gsum phyag drug sku mdog sngon po la// sku stod zhal gsum phyag drug rdo rje gshog pa can// sku smad zhabs drug brkyang bskum gyad kyi

'dor thabs kyis// bgegs kyi rgyal po gshin rje'i gdon tshogs gnon// zhal g.yas sngo skya g.yon pa ljang nag dbus sngon po// phyag mtshan rdo rje ri rab phur bu ste// sku stod zhal gsum phyag drug khro bo bcu'i
gzugs can la// sku smad lcags kyi phur pa zur gsum bsnams// 'dzin byed dur khrod bdag dang gnyis med bzhugs// nub kyi phyogs na khro bo chen po rta mchog dpal/ zhal gsum phyag drug sku mdog dmar

po la// sku stod zhal gsum phyag drug pa// rdo rje gshog pas khams gsum dbang du sdud// sku smad zhabs drug brkyang bskum gyad kyi 'dod thabs kyis// bgegs kyi rgyal po klu yi gdon tshogs gnon// zhal ni
g.yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus dmar zhal// phyag mtshan rdo rje ri rab phur bu ste// sku stod zhal gsum phyag drug khro bo bcu'i gzugs can la// sku smad lcags kyi phur pa zur gsum bsnams// yum chen gtum

mo sku dang gnyis med bzhugs// byang gi phyogs su khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil// zhal gsum phyag drug sku mdog ljang ku la// sku stod zhal gsum phyag drug rdo rje gshog pa can// sku smad zhabs drug brkyang bskum gyad

kyi dor stabs kyis// bgegs kyi rgyal po gnod sbyin gdon tshogs gnon// zhal ni g.yas pa ser la g.yon dud kha// phyag mtshan rdo rje ri rab phur bu ste// sku stod zhal gsum phyag drug khro bo bcu'i gzugs

can la// sku smad lcags kyi phur pa zur gsum bsnams// 'dzin byed rlung 'byin gnyis su med par bzhugs// shar lho mtshams kyi khro bo dbyug sngon po// zhal gsum phyag drug sku mdog sngo skya la// sku stod zhal
gsum phyag drug rdo rje gshog pa can// sku smad zhabs drug gyad kyi 'dor thabs kyis// bgegs kyi rgyal po me lha'i gdon tshogs gnon// zhal gsum g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus sngo zhal// phyag mtshan rdo
rje ri rab phur bu ste// sku stod zhal gsum phyag drug khro bo bcu'i gzugs can la// sku smad lcags kyi phur pa zur gsum bsnams// 'dzin byed rdo rje sder dang gnyis med bzhugs// lho nub

mtshams su khro bo mi g.yo mgon// zhal gsum phyag drug sku mdog ljang sngon la// sku stod zhal gsum phyag drug rdo rje gshog pa can// sku smad zhabs drug brkyang bskum gyad kyi 'dor thabs kyis// bgegs kyi

rgyal po srin po'i gdon gyi tshogs rnams gnon// zhal gsum g.yas pa ljang nag g.yon smug dbus ljang sngon// phyag mtshan ri rab phur bu ni// sku stod zhal gsum phyag drug khro bo bcu'i gzugs can la// sku
smad lcags kyi phur bu zur gsum bsnams// 'dzin byed gtun khung ma dang gnyis med bzhugs// nub byang mtshams su khro bo chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa// zhal gsum phyag drug sku mdog dmar skya la// sku
stod zhal gsum phyag drug rdo rje gshog pa can// sku smad zhabs drug brkyang bskum gyed kyi 'dor thabs kyis// bgegs kyi rgyal po rlung len gdon gyi tshogs rnams gnon// zhal nas g.yas ser g.yon ljang
dbus dmar skya// phyag mtshan rdo rje ri rab phur bu ste// sku stod zhal gsum phyag drug khro bo bcu'i gzugs can la// sku smad lcags kyi phur pa zur gsum bsnams// 'dzin byed mda' byed mda' bsnyems ma

dang gnyis med bzhugs// byang shar mtshams kyi khro bo chen po khams gsum rnam par rgyal// zhal gsum phyag drug sku mdog ser po la// sku stod zhal gsum phyag drug rdo rje gshog pa can// sku smad zhabs drug
brkyang bskum 'dor thabs kyis// bgegs kyi rgyal po dbang ldan gdon gyi tshogs rnams gnon// zhal gsum g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus ser zhal// phyag mtshan rdo rje ri rab phur bu ste// sku stod zhal
gsum phyag drug khro bo bcu'i gzugs can la// sku smad lcags kyi phur pa zur gsum bsnams// yum chen gsod skyen ma dang gnyis med bzhugs// 'og gi phyogs su khro bo chen po stobs po che// zhal gsum
phyag drug rdo rje gshog pa can// sku smad zhabs drug gyad kyi 'dor thabs kyis// bgegs kyi rgyal po sa bdag gdon gyi tshogs rnams gnon// zhal ni g.yas pa ljang nag g.yon dmar nag/ dbus ni dud kha sku

dang mthun// phyag mtshan rdo rje ri rab phur bu ste// sku stod zhal gsum phyag drug khro bo bcu'i gzugs can la// sku smad lcags kyi phur ba zur gsum bsnams// yum chen skul byed ma dang gnyis su med par
bzhugs// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje gsang ba las kyis rgyud las/ khro rgyal bzhugs tshul gyi le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje gzhon nu dais/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad
kyi che ba bsdus pa'i phyir/ rang gi dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu nas hUM gsum gyis/ bskal pa'i me 'bar ba/ gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba/ zla gam dbang gi tshul dang/ zlum po zhi ba'i tshul dang/

rgyas pa gru bzhi'i dkyil 'khor bsdus te/ dpal rdo rje gzhon nu nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las/ A+oM aM hUM hUM sgra sgrogs pas chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha'i khams kun khyab pas/ lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas

kun mnyes te/ hUM gis bsdus te rang rang gis dkyil 'khor thams cad sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las kyi phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan par gyur to// nyid kyi dbu ni rigs lngas brgyan// rigs lnga phyag rgya bzhi

dang ldan// ye shes kyi sras khro bo bcu rnams kyang// rang rang gi sku ni rgyan chas rdzogs par bzhugs so// de nas dpal rdo rje gzhon nus 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye chos sku skye ba med pa las// skye ba'i cho
'phrul sgra byung ba// a a la sogs sgra yis ni// chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i khams kun tu grags pa'i sgra de'i/ dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang// lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// khams gsum
'khor ba 'joms pa dang// srid pa 'joms pa'i bdag po ru// bdag gis dkyil 'khor byung ba ste// khams gsum sgrol ba'i dbang bskur ba// sku mdog phyag mtshan yan chad kyang// khro bo sgrol bar dbang

bskur cig/ 'joms byed ye shes khro bo bcu rnams dang// 'dzin byed khro mo chos dbyings bcu rnams la// gnyis su med pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi ni// rdo rje 'phrul chen sprul pa 'jig byed dang// gsod byed

'byin par byed pa'i khro mo rnams la dbang bskur cig/ rdo rje 'phra men rdo rje 'jigs byed la// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten 'dul bar dbang bskur cig/ dus gsum sangs rgyas lhun gyis grub pa yis// phyag rgya

bzhi dang ldan pa'i gnas su ni// sku lnga gsung lnga thugs lnga yon tan lnga// 'phrin las lnga yis sangs rgyas don mdzad bzhin// sangs rgyas che ba'i yon tan lnga po 'dis// khams gsum 'khor ba sgrol ba'i dbang
bskur cig/ ces dus gsum lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas la dbang nos so// rdo rje gsang ba las kyi rgyud las/ khro rgyal sgrol ba dbang nos kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas chos kyi dbyings dang/
nam mkha'i khams na mo'i sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus te/ gru gsum mthing nag bskal pa'i me 'bar ba'i gnas der/ dpal rdo rje gzhon nu la/ dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i 'phro 'du yis// sku gsung yon tan 'phrin
las thugs// rgyal ba rigs lnga byin brlabs ni// khams gsum sgrol ba'i dbang 'byin no// 'joms byed khro mo bcu rnams dang// 'dzin byed khro mo bcu rnams la// phyag rgya bzhi yi 'bru bkod nas// khams
gsum sgrol ba'i dbang bskur ro// 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams// khams gsum srid pa'i chos 'di ni// phyag mtshan rdo rje ri rab tu// byin gyis brlabs te dbang yang bskur// ye
shes khro bo lha bkod nas// khams gsum sgrol ba'i dbang yang bskur// rdo rje gsang ba las kyi rgyud las/ khams gsum sgrol ba'i dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas sangs rgyas thams
cad kyis// khro rgyal 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// thams cad la gsung drag po'i 'phrin las kyi dbang bskur ba 'di gsungs so// kye dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu dang// ye shes khro bo bcu rnams dang// chos

dbyings khro mo bcu rnams dang// sprul pa 'phra men tshogs rnams kyis// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big nan baM hUM hUM phaT/ drag po'i gsung sgra 'di zlos shig/ 'di yis khams gsum sgrol bar byed// de yang ji

ltar sgrol zhe na// drag po sgra 'di bshad par bya// ma skyes pa yi snying po a// cho 'phrul 'byung ba o ru snang// yan lag rdzogs pa A+oM du snang// A+oM ni sku yi snying po ste// bde bar gshegs pa sku'i snying por

bshad// badzra na ni rdo rje ste// rdo rje'i rang bzhin skye 'jig med// rdo rje khro bo khro mo rnams// skye 'jig med pa'i sku yis ni// kI li kI la phyag na bsnams// kI li kI la ya zhes pa// rdo rje ri rab phur pa ste// ya
ni chags med byang chub sems// thugs rjes 'gro ba sems can gyi// don la chags pa med par mdzod// sarba na ni thams cad de// 'khor ba'i chos dang mya ngan 'das// snang srid snod bcud thams cad
yin// big nan na ni bag chags te// rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags kun// baM ni dbang gi snying po ste// bag chags thams cad dbang bsdus nas// hUM ni bsdus pa'i snying po ste// hUM gnyis yang nas yang

du'o// thugs ni gsang ba'i dbyings rum du// gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba yis// ye shes sems dpa'i sras bskyed pa// ye shes khro bcu sku ltar bskyed// phaT ces bya ba spros pa ste// chos dbyings nam mkha'i

khams spros pas// lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// sras dang spun du de bzhin ngam// khams gsum sgrol ba'i sku 'byung snyams// de las che ba rnam pa lngas// 'gro ba'i don dbang de la bskur// des ni

khams gsum sgrol bar byed// ces dpal chen rdo rje 'khor tshogs la drag po gsung sgra phog ste dbang bskur ro// de nas rdo rje kun tu bzang po des/ dpal rdo rje gzhon nu 'khor dang bcas pa la/ bsgo ba'i
gsung 'di gsungs so// kye bcom ldan rdo rje gzhon nu dang// khams gsum ma lus rgyas 'debs dang// 'joms byed 'dzin byed gsod byed tshogs// dus gsum sangs rgya thams cad kyis// khams gsum
sgrol ba'i dbang bskur nas// cho ga lnga dang bsnyen bsgrub bzhis// rang lus rdo rje go cha bgos// sangs rgyas che ba thob byas la/ khams gsum sgrol ba'i las gyis shig/ bsnyen bsgrub cho ga gang

zhe na// ting 'dzin rnam gsum gsal ba ni// rdo rje cho ga dang po ste// bdag sku lha ru shes pa ste// bsnyen pa ru ni shes par bya// phung po khams dang skye mched de// ye nas lha ru gsal ba ni// rdo rje cho ga gnyis
pa ste// nye ba'i bsnyen par shes par bya// phung po khams dang skye mched de// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// mkha' la 'phro 'dus lhar gsal ba ni// rdo rje cho ga gsum pa ste// mkha' las dkyil

'khor rdzogs ston pas// rdo rje cho ga bzhi pa ste// bsgrub pa ru ni shes par bya// dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i lha rnams la// phyag rgya chen po bzhi bzhir ldan// rdo rje cho ga lnga pa ste// sgrub pa chen po nga yis
bshad// sgrub pa chen po de yis ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas rgyas lhun grub la// sku gsung yon tan 'phrin las thugs// re re la ni lnga lnga ste// gang gis 'dul ba'i dus tsam na// thugs ni mi rtog don
mdzad bzhin// rdo rje tshogs kyi don mdzod cig/ 'phrin las rnam bzhi rdzogs par gyis// zhes gsungs so// de nas rdo rje kun tu bzang po des/ khams gsum sgrol ba'i dbang bskur ro// nyid dpal rdo rje
gzhon nu'i skur bsgyur te// nyid kyi 'khor la dbang 'di bskur te bsgo'o// hUM bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas// gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// rdo rje srin po 'joms

byed khro bo bcu// rdo rje srin mo 'dzin byed khro mo bcu// 'jigs byed za tshogs mgyogs byed 'gugs pa'i tshogs// shar lho nub byang steng 'og phyogs mtshams nas// sprul pa bye ba mang po'i tshogs kyis

ni// sku ni sna tshogs chos nyid sangs rgyas sku// zhal gsum phyag drug rdo rje gshog can gyis// rdo rje gshog pas khams gsum dbang du sdud// phyag mtshan rdo rje ri rab phur bu ni// sku stod zhal gsum phyag
drug khro bo bcu'i gzugs can la// sku smad lcags kyi phur pa zur gsum ni// rtse mo drag po zur gsum phaT nag gis// khams gsum sgrol la dug gsum rtsad nas chos// rdo rje ri rab phur ba dril ba
yis// stong gsum 'jig rten khams ni brdar thag gcod// 'og gi rdo rje gtan la blangs pa yis// dmyal ba'i 'jig rten gtan nas len// sgrol cig khams gsum ma lus sgrol/ khams gsum 'khor ba
sgrol ba'i dbang bskur ro// srid gsum gdug pa sgrol ba'i dbang bskur ro// dug gsum rtsad nas chod cig dbang bskur ro// dug lnga stongs par mdzod cig dbang bskur ro// gzung 'dzin rnam rtog sgrol
cig dbang bskur ro// zhes 'khor ba sgrol ba'i dbang bskur ro// rdo rje gsang ba las kyi rgyud las// bsgrub pa gsum gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// rdo rje gsang ba las kyi rgyud rdzogs
saho//// lha mo gnas mkhar gyi rgyud/ lha mo gnas mkhar skal chen ma// grub pa'i rnal 'byor mar bstan ma// lha chen lha mo gnas mkhar skal chen ma// grub pa'i rnal 'byor

mar bstan ma// lha chen de la gnas pa'i tshe// gangs ri'i bu mos yongs zhus pa// blang bar bgyi ba ji lta bu// spang bar bgyi ba ji lta bu// mtshan nyid rnam pa du zhig mchis// smad par bgyi ba du zhig
gsungs// 'jigs byed kyis ni tshig gsungs ba// e ma lha mo blo chen khyod// sems can kun la phan byed ma// bzhin bzang las la ma rtogs pa// brgya byin ser skya dga' byed dang// tshangs dang khyab 'jug

dbang chen gyis// bdag la 'di skad tshig mi dris// lha mo khyod la da bshad kyis// rtse gcig pa yi yid kyis nyon// bdag gis bshad pa gang zhe na// dum bu gcig dang dum bu gnyis// gsum pa dang ni bzhi pa

lnga pa dang// drug pa dang ni bdun pa dang// dum bu brgyad par rab tu grags// bram ze rgyal po rje rigs dang// dmangs rigs bud med rigs ma nges// dkar dmar dang ni dkar sngo dang// sngo dang de bzhin

ser skya ste// thal ba'i mdog dang mdog sdug dang/ kha dog drug tu kun tu grags// nyi rim dang ni glang po'i rgyab// 'khor lo de bzhin bya rog rjes// dung sngo ba dang dung gnyis dang// chags pa dang ni 'tshams

bye ba// 'di dag thams cad rab rtags te// kun tu brtags nos sbyang ba bya// shin tu mnyam pa'i sa phyogs sam// snyi ba'am ni yangs pa'i sar// sngags kyi sngags te gnam du bskyor// lhung ba'i mtshan nyid
rig par bya// shar gyi phyogs bltas bdag nyid gsod// me yi phyogs bltas shi'u shun med// lho phyogs kha bltas bram ze'i med// srin po'i phyogs bltas ban lang rtol// chu yi phyogs bltas rigs ngan
yin// rlung gi phyogs bltas gsang mi thub// byang gi phyogs bltas phyug por 'gyur// dbang ldan phyogs bltas sngags sgrub gter// shar tu bltas na bdag nyid gsod// 'og tu bltas na rkun po mod// steng
du bltas na bud med gsod// lho ru bltas na rigs ngan gsod// snod kyi mtshan nyid 'di rnams so// de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya ste// dge bar sprul pa'i snod dag ni// dum bu gcig pa sa la

dbang// gnyis pa de ni rgyal phran 'gyur// gsum pa de ni yang nor la dbang// bzhi pa de ni sngags 'grub 'gyur// lnga pa de bzhin mchog kyang 'grub// drug pa drug de ni slong pa yin// bdun pa de ni brtul
zhugs gsod// brgyad pa yongs su spang bar bya// bu ga gcig pa bram ze'i rigs// gnyis pa de ni rgyal rigs te// gsum pa rje'u rigs yin pas// bzhi pa de ni dmangs rigs so// bu ga med

dang mang ba ni// mkhas pas shin tu spang par bya// bong chung ba dang srab pa dang// gang dag ser por gyur pa ni// bud med yin par shes par bya// bud med rang du rmos pas na// de bas rab tu spang bar

bya// rigs ma nges kyang spang bar bya// ser skya dang ni dkar ba dag/ kha dog sna tshogs spang bar bya// dung med pa dang dung gnyis dang// lha mo'i sprul pas mi blang ngo// dung sngo bdag ni sdug bsngal che// bya rog

rje ni 'thab rtsod 'gyur// nyi rim gyis ni gsod 'gyur te// glang po'i rgyab ni nad du 'gyur// 'di las gzhan yang bshad bya ste// gsang pa'i grub thob mtshan nyid ni// yal ka che 'phra mang ba'i bdag/ dpag
bsam shing ni yong gyur na// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thob 'gyur te// sngags pas de las the tsom med// dbus na shong bu bzhi yod na// de ni 'dod pa'i ba zhes bya// mdun na shong bu gnyis yod na// yid bzhin

nor bu zhes bya'o// 'di 'dra'i mtshan nyid ldan pa'i snod// su dag rtag tu 'chang ba ni// longs spyod thar pa thob par 'gyur// de la lha mo the tshom med// de nas rigs ni rnams bshad de// snod rnams kyi ni bye

brag tu// dung dang kun dang mda' 'dra ba'i// snum la blta na sdug pa'i ni// sngags rnams thams cad grub pa ste// dbang phyug chen mor shes par bya// thal ba'i mdog la bongs kyang che// pad+ma dbyings la pad+mas

brgyan// tshangs pa'i skud pa gsang ba yod// de ni tshangs mar rig par bya// sbrang rtsi ser skya'i mdog 'dra la// zhi ba'i thig les rnam par brgyan/ khyab 'jug ma yi snod yin te// rtag tu dgra rnams 'joms

par byed/ kha dog dmar zhing lnga pa la// pad+ma dmar pos brgyan pa dang// zum pa shin tu snum pa yis// snod 'di gzhon nu ma zhes bya// cung zad sar zhing zags// gang dag rdo rje'i mtshan yod pa// 'di 'dra'i

snod kyi mtshan nyid ni// dbang phyug ma yi rigs can yin// b+ha ga'i mdog dbyibs 'dra ba la// bar du mkhregs shing mu tig mdog/ sha yi dri ngad mnam pa ni// snod 'di phag gdong ma zhes bya// thal ba'i
mdog la bong che ste// thig le dmar po rnam par brgyan/ khrag 'dzag pa yi dri mnam na// 'jigs byed ma yi snod ces bya// snod kyi khyad par shes par bya// sngags pas 'di dag rtags bcas na// bdag gi

bka' ni bzhin bzang ma// de la bgegs ni mi tshugs te// 'di las gzhan yang bshad bya ba// snod kyi dngos po'i khyad par ni// tshangs ma bram ze bcangs par bya// rtag tu dngos grub sbyin par bya// sgrub pa yi
ni dus dag tu// dbang phyug chen mo bcang bar bya/ khyab 'jug ma ni sbyor kun la// rtag tu las rnams 'grub par byed// rgyal rigs kyi ni gzhon nu ma// pha rol yul ni rnam par 'joms// rje'u
rigs ni dbang chen mo// blo dang ldan pas bzlog phyir bcas// gsad dang sdang dang bskrad pa'i phyir// dmangs rigs kyi ni phag gdong bcas// las dang rigs rnams thams cad la// 'jigs byed mas ni

grub pa ste// re ba med pa'i bdag nyid ma// sgrub pa'i khyab par 'di shes pas// 'dud pa med par bdag bsams te// rtag tu 'di dag spyad cing bcang// gang gi dngos grub skye ba yi// de nas sngags ni bshad

par bya// A+oM na mo b+ha g+ha wa ti/ ma hA bai ra pa du ba yang sma shan pa si ni/ yi dang ka la ma na ya bya sha hUM phaT/ swa hwa thal ba'am/ me tog gam/ chu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis btab ste snod la gtor nas blang bar
bya'o// rdzogs saho////
rgya gar skad du/ bar pa ta mu ti ri ti dka'/ baM ri thod pa mkhar/ bod skad du/ lha mo gnas mkhar/ dpal he ru ka 'byung ba'i nang nas 'byung ba/ pad+ma b+han d+ha la snod gsum du bstan te/ dus gsum

dang sbyar ro// snga rabs ni thal chen dang thod pa skam po la bya'o// da ltar bzhugs pa ni ban d+ha rlon pa la bya'o// slad kyis 'byon pa ni ru tra la bya ste/ ban d+ha skra dang sha ra raM can la bya'o// de la snga rabs 'das

pa sna la bshad de/ bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po 'khor dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// lha mo gsum pa/ yul ni rgyal ku ku ra tsa'i yul lo// ri ni mi ri me ri 'bar zhes bya/ ri baM ri bya'o// ri de'i rtse la

ston pa ni dpal chen po shrI he ru ka'o// 'khor ni kro d+hi shwa ri dang/ khro bo bcu dang khro mo bcu dang 'phra men ma bcu drug dang/ rgya mtsho cig 'tshogs pa las/ 'khor rgya mtsho cig la bka' stsal pa/ de nas 'khor

tshogs rgya mtsho rnams la/ ston pas bka' stsal pa/ shin tu rnal 'byor lha yi lha/ yang dag dbang phyug dbang phyug che// de bzhin gshegs pa theg chen che// nyan thos mdo sde bsam gtan gsum// tshul dang
spyod pa so sor bstan// de bzhin spyod lam rnam bzhi yang// 'jig rten rim pa so sor bstan// kri ya u pa yo ga gsum// tshul dang spyod pa so sor bstan// bskyed dang rdzogs dang rdzogs chen
gsum// spyod lam rnam bzhi so sor bstan// de nas de bzhin spyod lam bzhi// 'jig rten khams ni gsal bar bstan// rgyu drug gnas pa'i sems can rnams// gnas dang zas dang gos
dang spyod// 'di bzhi tshang bar yod pa las// thams cad mkhyen pas gzigs pa yin// byol song gcig la gcig gsad nas// de dag bzang bar 'jigs pa dang// 'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa'i// dbang
phyug chen po 'khor dang bcas pas// gnas dang yo byad las dang tshul// spyod lam bzhi po 'di byed de// 'dod khams 'jigs shing skye ba'i lam// dngos po lta la chags zhing 'khor// de nas ston pas 'khor
rnams la// bzhad pa'i zhal ni 'dzum bstan nas// gsang ba'i lung 'di bka' stsal to// nga ni thams cad mkhyen pa yis// spyod lam rnam bzhi 'di bstan no// skye shi lam gnyis dgag par bya'o// thugs rje

gzigs nas 'gro don du// 'ga' na dang ni sta na'i gnas// de tshe dgos pa sku'i brgyan// yon tan rmad du bstan pa yin// shri mur ha ma ta pa la// bkra shis dpal ldan lcang lo can// pan tsi gu la lcang lo
can// bkra shis dpal ldan lcang lo can// dbyangs kyi nang yang dpal ldan lcang lo can// mi 'gyur sra mkhregs rdo rje lcang lo can// ma ta gangs dpal ldan lcang lo can// u ya la la dpal ldan lcang lo

can// kha sa kha'i dpal ldan lcang lo can// mi la de byi dpal ldan lcang lo can// phan tsi gu la lcang lo can// khu ba su mi'i dpal ldan lcang lo can// bkra shis don 'byung dpal ldan lcang lo can// bde
gshegs mtshan ldan dpal ldan lcang lo can// gnya' na mur ti dpal ldan lcang lo can// gtsug phud dge cug dpal ldan lcang lo can// yang dag don ldan dpal ldan lcang lo can// a pi ru ka dpal ldan

lcang lo can// phug skyid tshe ring dpal ldan lcang lo can// gnyis med don thob dpal ldan lcang lo can// bu tra mang 'phel dpal ldan lcang lo can// kro ta ta gu li dpal ldan lcang lo can// e ke tsa ra 'dza ti
dpal ldan lcang lo can// si ti pa la dngos grub bder gnas dpal ldan lcang lo can// gnyis med don thob dpal ldan lcang lo can// bu tra mang 'phel dpal ldan lcang lo can// bram ze rgyal rigs rje rigs

bzhi// mchog tu bsgral ba'i ni nyi shu rtsa brgyad do// de rnams bzang ba yin no// de la yang nang gi ri mo ngan pa bcu drug yod do// ngan pa lnga ste nyi shu rtsa gcig go/ 'di yan chad gleng gzhi bstan to// 'di man

chad khungs kyi bye grag gi gtan tshig dang/ baM gyi bshad pa kun gyi brda dang/ rgya gar skad du bstan to// kengs pa la tso la/ khra kha'u/ 'da' na/ de dang po ru tshe ring ba dang/ thung ba'i khungs bstan te/ skyes pa

pan d+ha lcang lo can la mtshan ma rnam pa lnga tshogs pa yod pa ni skra gnag cing 'tsher ba'i lcang lo 'jam pa ni/ keng zhes bya'o// hUM zhes bya ste smin ma gnag pa la stug pa'o// kha rna bya rna bya ste rna ba che

la ring ba'o// tsa kru zhes bya ste mig dkar la zlum pa'o// kha bu zhes bya ste mkhur tshos rus pa mtho pa'o// de ldan pa'i ban d+ha ni/ pan tsa ku la dpal ldan lcang lo can zhes bya ste/ su 'chang ba de ni btsan zhing skyid

par 'ong ngo// shri ma dang zhes bya ste/ bong che la skye sbom pa'i ban d+ha cang lo can 'di ni bkra shis shing dpal ldan lcang lo can zhes bya ste/ phyug btsan gong ma dang 'dra'o// baM lung zhes bya ste/ lhag pa'i rus mdud

'bur 'bur por 'jug pa la/ lus logs su nye bar 'dug la/ nye na rgyab tu nye ste/ ban d+ha 'du su 'chang ba phyug btsan par 'ong/ ma hA' ba la bkra shis dpal ldan lcang lo can zhes bya ste bkres so// pa la

dpyad ces bya ste mchog ma'i rus pa 'bur 'bur 'dug/ zur zur por 'dug pa'i ban d+ha 'di dgra bsad na/ na sha stam pa ya zhes bya ste/ su 'chang ba mthu che ste khro bo bsgrub par bzang ngo// kha rna ha ra zhes bya

ste rna ba'i rgyud 'dzin pa'i skra dang mnyam pa rna ba'i 'jug mas kha'i thad khar phyin pa'i ban d+ha ni tshe ring phyug par 'ong ngo// ra smi 'bu zhes bya ste/ hri la phar te rna ba'i nang nas spu ring po yod pa skyes pa'i ban d+ha de

ni sa dang po non par byed pa'i dang/ srid pa la dbang byed pa'i bdag po ste/ bkra shis dpal ldan mtshan ldan lcang lo can zhes bya ste bzang ngo// rna ba'i drung nas mkhur tshos kyi bar du rus rgyud ma chad par

'bur 'bur breng nge 'dug na bzang ngo// hUM ri pa zhes bya ste sa bcu bdun non cing dbang rdzogs par byed pa'i ban d+ha ste bzang ngo// ta thA g+ha ta na ban d+ha zhes bya ste so sum cu yod pa lce ring ba'i ban d+ha de ni/ sa

ma ya'i dam tshig skongs pa yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgrub pa'i ban d+ha yin te/ bde gshegs sgrub byed dpal ldan lcang lo can zhes bya ste bzang/ gnya' na zhes bya ste ye shes 'byung byed rdzu 'phrul can

zhes te ye shes 'byung byed dpal ldan lcang lo can zhes bya ste bzang ngo// mur sti 'du hi zhes bya ste spyi bo gtsug drang por gnyis sgril mar byung ba de ni/ rge gtsug klu gtsug ste klu yin pas klu sgrub par bzang

ngo// bkra shis phud yul dpal ldan lcang lo can zhes bya ste bzang/ ba ra ha zhes bya ste spyi bo gtsug yon na bar chad yong ste ngan no// ba li rma zhes lhag pa'i rus pa tsog tsog po'i 'og gnas gnya' ba shur po

gnyis yod na/ g.ya' chu ba breng breng 'dug pa la srid pa dbang byed pa'i ban d+ha yin te/ btsan zhing kun la dbang byed pa'i ban d+ha lcang lo kun la dbang byed ban d+ha lcang lo can zhes bya ste bzang ngo// a ru ka
zhes bya ste ltag pa'i spu drang po byi gzhug gam/ skyeg 'jug ltar 'dug pa'i ban d+ha ni blo rno ba thos pa 'dzin pa 'grub pa yin pas las rnams 'grub byed dpal ldan lcang lo can zhes bya ste bzang

ngo// ke sa smi li 'bar zhes bya ste skra li ba ni gyen du 'khyil ba ni ye shes lnga'i dngos grub thob ste bzang/ shrI khra dang zhes bya ste/ kun d+ha li zhes kyang zer te/ skra g.yas gyen du 'khyil ba'i ban d+ha ni/ khro bo 'khyil

pa ste/ las drag po thams cad 'grub pa ste bzang ngo// yang dag don ldan dpal ldan lcang lo can zhes bya ste bzang ngo// sbra mi e ka bi ra zhes bya ste/ smin ma'i bar na spu ring ba cig skyes pa'i ban d+ha de ni tshe

ring dpal chen phyug por 'gyur pa de 'dod pa'i don 'grub dpal ldan lcang lo can zhes bya ste bzang ngo// dpral ba'i dbyes na 'dzer pa yod pa'i ban d+ha de ni/ mi mang por 'gyur te sa gcig non par bzang

rab bo// ba ta ro ke zhes bya ste dngos grub bde gnas dpal ldan lcang lo can zhes bya ste/ bi d+ha d+ha ri tsak+Shu zhes bya ste mig gnyis kyi bar tshon gang yod pa'i ban d+ha de ni ban d+ha'i rgyal po ste/ 'gro ba mang po'i don

byed nus pa'i cong cing yang ston pas gnyis med don thobs dpal ldan lcang lo can zhes bya ste bzang ngo// skra ring thung can ngan/ mche ba rno ba ngan/ so ring zhing thags ngan pa ngan/ smin ma log pa ngan/ nang gi
mdog kyang lnga ste/ dkar po/ ser po/ dmar po/ ljang ku/ dum bu'i grangs la/ gcig pa/ gnyis pa/ gsum pa/ bzhi pa/ lnga pa/ drug pa/ bdun pa/ brgyad pa/ dgu pa/ nang la bya rog rjes/ sum rjes

nas shong ba/ sran chung yungs kar shong ba/ sreg pa'i rjes byi ba'i so bong 'dzin 'dra ba/ ti ste khung 'dra ba/ phying pa la dud pas bdugs pa 'dra ba dud pa'i mdog/ khab lcags rna ba lhan pa nang thag thung can

bam gyi ri bo bshad pa la brda dang/ rgya gar skad 'di nas mar/ karma ka tsa kru ka la mtha' na/ mi sri kha hUM shrI mur ti/ khengs pa la ti/ tshongs pa ste/ na hongs/ 'dzin dzi ha/ tan ta/ gri ba/ bri sha/ khar bye la/ su

su ru sha/ be la/ su sha/ na ra ha/ tsha ra ma baM ri a ka/ dbang ba re/ bri tu a gung/ ti ri sa tar/ ma te ma/ a na mo/ i na de/ u ta rab de/ badzra ga na/ sa ra sa ra ta ne/ tsid ta/ hid de/ a ta re/ na ga tsit+ta/

sho ga pir pa ta/ a badzre na/ go ro tsa na/ a hUs ti/ de nas khro rgyal 'khor bcas kyis// pad+ma ban d+ha bshad par gsol// dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa/ khro rgyal 'khor bcas khyed nyon cig/ dpal dang ldan
pa'i snod brtag pa// srubs gcig pa dang srubs gnyis pa// dum bu bzhi pa ye shes 'grub// lnga pas bsam pa thams cad 'grub// mang na thod pa gang ba dag/ ban d+ha dpal dang ldan pa ni// ma gas ma chag
khyad par can// rnam dag chos nyid snod kyang yin// mkhyen rab ye shes dbyings kyang yin// chags pas rak+ta dbyings kyang yin// de dag ma lus kun kyang yin// sku rgyan rdzogs pa'i ban d+ha

ste// che ba don gyi ban d+ha ste// sgrub pa las kyi ban d+ha ste// mtshan ma rtags kyi ban d+ha dang// 'bras bu 'og min ban d+ha dang// bde gshegs gdung can ban d+ha dang// de la dpal ldan ban d+ha'i don lngas bshad
nas bstan to// thugs rje byams pa chen pa'i dpal dang// ltung ba mi mnga' ba'i dpal dang// yon tan rdzogs pa'i dpal dang 'khor ba'i 'dod pa chen po las sgrol ba'i dpal dang ldan pa'i snod gzhag par
bya'o// de ltar dpal dang lcang lo can la don bdun no// gzhag pa la yang/ mi g.yo ba'i chos nyid dang/ me 'gyur ba'i bdud rtsi gnyis so// snod la don bzhis bstan te/ rtogs pa gzhom pas the tshom gyi
mtshan ma bcad pa dang// don rtogs nas don grub pa dang/ yin nges pa dang/ de lta bu yin pas sngags pa'i snod du dpal chen pos byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// rus sbal/ bram ze/ rgyal rigs/ rje rigs/
dmangs rigs/ 'di rnams byin gyis brlabs pa yang don bzhis bstan te/ dpal chen po'i ra sa ma ti'i dgongs pas byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ bcing ba lag gis phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa dang/

gsang ba'i sngags kyi yi ge'i 'bras bus byin gyis brlabs dang/ khro bo dang/ khro mo dang/ 'phra men ma la dbang bskur ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa dang ngo// de'i sngags a mri ta la bsngags te ban d+ha la gtor

ro// phur bu la bsngags te kha 'am rna ba'i bu gar gdab bo// ud dar ya ma di rangs gan/ phra mi da ra dang/ ha ra phaT swA hA/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bar du bzlas te/ ban d+ha skam po sngar bzlas pa yin pas

mdun drang por bskur/ ban d+ha lo gnyis lon pa lcang lo can da ltar bzhugs pa yin pas bdag gi g.yas su bsgyur ro// bu chung skad byung ba bu tra khu zhom/ lo lnga man chad thod pa skra rings chags pa man chad
slad kyis 'byon pa yin pas lhag pa dang rgyab tu bskyur ro// de yang gong du bsgrubs pa'i thabs dam tshig gi rdzas dang/ gsang ba'i mig dang/ skyon dang/ yon tan dang/ gsang ba yid ches pa'i man ngag

bzhis bstan to// de yang gang zhe na/ yang nyid kyi lus sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du yid ches pa dang/ gang brjod pa las 'das par yid ches pa dang/ sems ye nas ma skyes par yid ches pa dang/ bsgrubs rdzas don

ban d+ha gnyis kyang brtags pa dang/ brjod pa las 'das par lung gis yid ches pa'o// de ltar ma gyur na skyon bzhi la/ rang gi mtshan nyid dbang du ma gyur pa dang/ dam rdzas mtshan nyid byin gyis ma rlobs pa
dang/ sgrub pa'i lung nges par ma thob pa dang/ sgrubs pa chen po'i dbang dam pa'i drod tshad ma thob pa rnams kyis thas zlas dang/ thugs thub dang/ rang byan du ngar tsam la brten nas byas na

bdag nyid dus men par 'chi zhing/ glo bur gyi bag chags mang zhing/ ngan song dang yi dgas kyi gnas su 'gyur zhing/ ltung ba'i gnas su skye'o// don yid ches pa bzhi/ byin gyis brlabs pa bzhi/ skyon gyis

bar chad 'byung ba bzhi ste bcu gnyis kyi byin gyis brlabs pa bstan to// de la ban d+ha cang lo can gyi gnas ni/ brtul zhugs khros pa'i gnas yin no// sna tshogs su ldan pa brtul zhugs kyis gnas pas yin

la/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang gi gnas kyang yin no// de la baM gyi ri bo bshad pa'i gnas lus la rus pa'i dum bu dgu brgya rtsa drug yod do// sha'i nya mgo lnga brgyas 'ga'i brdus so// don snying lnga ni/ glo snying/

mkhal ma/ mchin pa/ mtsher pa/ mkhris pa'o// nang khrol rnam pa drug ni/ pho ba/ grod pa/ rgyu ma/ gnya' ma/ long ka/ sul mang drug go/ de la dang po mig chags de nas lte ba la bsdus so// de dag kun 'jug

shun pas bsdus so// shun pas g.yogs nas bsdus pa ste/ de bshad par bka' stsal to// pad+ma ban d+ha la don rnam pa bzhis ston te/ me tog pad+ma dang/ dkyil 'khor pad+ma dang/ nang yum gyi pad+ma dang/ gsang

ba pad+ma ban d+ha lcang lo can no// pad+ma'i dbus zlum pa la mtha' rgyas pa la bya'o// ban d+ha ni lcang lo la bya'o// pad+ma ni nang gi snod la bya'o// ban d+ha ni phyi'i yul lcang lo can la bya'o// lha mo gnas mkhar gyi le'u
rdzogs saho//// rgya gar skad du/ badzra b+ha ra hi ku ku pa ra gu ha tan tra ra tsa nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje phag mo bram ze lcam dral gsang ba rgyud kyi rgyal po/ pho thems mo thems zhes bya ba/

rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bram ze blo ldan mchog sred ces bya ba/ u rgyan gyi yul na yum gyi b+ha ga la rje btsun ma nyid la byin rlabs zhu zhing snyom par

zhugs so// de'i tshe bkra shis byin rlabs 'byung ba'i gnas ni/ 'di lta ste/ gnas dang nye ba'i gnas/ zhing dang nye ba'i zhing/ dur khrod dang nye ba'i dur khrod/ 'dus pa dang nye ba'i 'dus pa/ mtshan d+ho dang nye

ba'i mtshan d+ho/ u rgyan yul gyi lho nub/ rgyal po dza'i khang 'gram tshangs pa klu gnod gyi lha khang rtsub 'gyur tshal gyi dur khrod na/ shing dang/ me tog dang/ bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pa/ rnga dang cang te'u pi

wang// sil snyan la sogs pa'i sgra dang/ sgra sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ lce spyang dang/ ba zhad dang/ ne tso dang/ dur bya/ kang ka/ khra dang 'ug pa la sogs pa mang po ni/ la la ni lding/ la la ni 'phur/ la la ni
mchong/ la la ni rngam/ 'tshigs pa dang/ rgyug pa dang/ 'dral ba dang/ kun kyang sgra skad sna tshogs kyi sgra gyen la sgrogs pa/ ri bo kun ni keng rus kyi ri la/ ka ra ka ra dang/ ha ha dang/ he he

dang/ spyug pa'i sgra sna tshogs sgrogs pa'i dbus na/ bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje phag mo de/ sku mnyam pa'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang sprul sku gdug pa 'dul ba'i don du/ ro'i gdan la brjid pa'i gzi mdangs
dang bcas nas/ sgeg mo'i tshul du bzhugs so// yul dang/ gnas dang/ sku bzhugs pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bram ze mchog sred kyis/ lha rnams dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ srin po

dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri za dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas 'khor rnams kyis me tog dang/ spos dang/ mar me dang/ byug pa dang/

zhal zas dang/ sgra la sogs pa sna tshogs kyis mchod do// de nas bram ze mchog sred kyis/ mkha' 'gro ma'i gtso mo rdo rje phag mo la 'di skad bstod nas zhus so// dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// mkha' 'gro
ma yi 'khor lo sgyur// bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od// mkha' 'gro khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das spangs shing// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das la bzhugs// kun rdzob don dam gnyis su

med// gnyis med gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo// g.yas pa rtog med phag gi zhal// g.yon pa chags tshul khro mo'i zhal// zhal gnyis su ni sprul mdzad ma// sgrub pa po la grogs mdzad ma// rdo rje rnam 'byor ma la
bstod// phag mo khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// g.yas g.yon brkyang bskum thabs dang shes rab 'brel// spros med chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos kyang// thabs kyis gang la gang dgos 'dul ba yi// smon lam
dbang gi 'gro ba'i don mdzad ma// yid bzhin nor bu khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// g.yas pa skyon kun gcod byed gri gug bsnams// shin tu dkar ba'i thod pa g.yon na bsnams// pad+ma'i gdan la ya bdud zil

gyis gnon// rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal bstod// lan gsum skor ba byed cing phyag btsal nas// spyan sngar thal sbyar dpus btsugs mig gdangs te// ngag tu 'di skad ces zhus so// kye rje
btsun rdo rje phag mo khyod// 'gro ba sems can gdul slad du// sprul sku 'gro ba'i don du bzhengs su gsol// kye ho rdo rje 'dzin pa bskul ma 'debs// kye ho thod pa dgu brtsegs chos 'byung gzhal yas

nas// chos nyid don rtogs chos sku'i phag mo sku bzhengs 'tshal// bde ba byin rlob longs sku'i phag mo sku bzhengs 'tshal// sna tshogs ston zhing sprul sku'i phag mo sku bzhengs 'tshal// nag mo'i cha lugs bdud
mo'i phag mo sku bzhengs 'tshal// legs nyes stangs 'dzin dam tshig phag mo sku bzhengs 'tshal// dgra bgegs bdud mdzad bstan srungs phag mo sku bzhengs 'tshal// sku yi sprul pa dkar mo nyi

khri sku bzhengs 'tshal// gsung gi sprul pa dmar mo nyi khri sku bzhengs 'tshal// thugs kyi sprul pa nag mo nyi khri sku bzhengs 'tshal// 'jig rten pa dang ye shes lha// ma lus par ni sku bzhengs 'tshal// zhes bskul
lo// brdas bskul ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// mnyam pa'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang// rdo rje phag mo 'gro ba'i don du sku bzhengs pa bstan te/ g.yas kyi phag zhal phye

ste/ spyan g.yas pa las/ sprul sku'i yi ge A+oM bskul bar ston te/ ti sta ra pra na ye/ dpal ldan rgyal po yul 'khor srung// chos sku rnam dag don du sku mdog dkar po sprul// nges don sgrogs phyir pi wang rgyud

mang bsnams// shar phyogs dri za'i gdon rnams bsrung ba dang// zhi ba'i 'phrin las mdzad pa'i don du sprul// spyan g.yon longs sku'i tshul du a ston te// bi ta ra sha ga to me/ dpal ldan rgyal po spyan mi
bzang// 'gro ba'i don la ma chags sku mdog dmar// 'khor ba bcings pa'i zhags pa phyag na bsnams// nub phyogs klu yi gdon rnams bsrung ba dang// dbang gi 'phrin las mtha' ru dbyung du gsol// spyan
ni dbus ma chos sku hUM ston te// be du rag sha be/ dpal ldan rgyal po 'phags skyes po// che ba'i yon tan rgyas pas sku mdog ser// 'khor ba'i bag chags 'joms phyir be con bsnams// lho phyogs grub bum

gdon tshogs bsrungs ba dang// rgyas pa'i 'phrin las mtha' ru dbyung du gsol// de gsum ngo bo nyid kyi tshul du rab gri ste// mtha' gnyis 'joms mdzad be he she na ma re ye// dpal ldan rgyal po rnam thos
sras// mdzad pa'i 'phrin las mthar phyin sku mdog ljang// 'khor ba'i bag chags 'joms phyir be con ral gri bsnams// byang phyogs gnon sbyin tshogs rnams bsrung ba dang// drag po'i 'phrin las mtha' ru

dbyung du gsol// chos kyi rgyal po dung lta bu dang/ dmar po sgrib sel me lta bu dang/ 'jigs skyob gser lta bu dang/ gdug pa 'dul byed mun nag lta bu dang/ de las gyad bzhir sprul/ de las lnga brgya rtsa
gcig sprul/ de las dmag dpon bzhi ru sprul thabs kyi tshul du sprul pa yin/ g.yas kyi phag zhal las dpa' bo sprul pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// de ltar de rnams sprul pa

las// bram ze mchog sred ngo mtshar skyes// e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// 'khor ba bud med gdul ba'i phyir// sprul pa 'gyed pa ngo mtshar che// g.yas kyi phag gdong nag mo las// rtog med ro dang bcas pa DA
ki 'bum// g.yon gyi khro zhal dmar mo las// bde chen las la 'khor ba'i DA ki 'bum// sbyi gtsug thod pa dum bu bdun pa las// sangs rgyas rab bdun ldan pa'i DA ki 'bum// rin chen rnam
lngas dbu rgyan byas pa las// rigs lnga yab dang ldan pa'i DA ki 'bum// g.yung drung dmar po g.yon du 'khyim ba las// nyon mongs bag chags sreg byed DA ki 'bum// dga' ba'i tsa kra myur du 'khor ba
las// bde chen gnyis med rtogs pa'i DA ki 'bum// bskal pa'i me chen 'ur 'ur 'bar ba las// tha dad rtog pa sreg pa'i DA ki 'bum// g.yas na zangs gri rnon po bsnams pa las// rnam rtog dri ma gcod
byed DA ki 'bum// g.yon pa thod pa phyi dkar nang dmar bsnams pa las// bde ba yab kyi zhal du stob pa'i DA ki 'bum/ kha T+wAM rtse gsum rab tu 'bar ba las// dug gsum rtsad nas gcod pa'i DA ki

'bum// thod pa gsum gyis rab tu 'bar ba las// dur khrod rgyal mtshan 'dul ba'i DA ki 'bum// Da ma ru yi sgra chen sgrogs pa las// snyan brgyud gdams ngag ston pa'i DA ki 'bum// drang cing yu ba dkar po
'dril ba las// lha men g.yul ngo bzlog pa'i DI ka 'bum// mi mgo lnga bcu'i do shal byas pa las// 'du byed lnga bcu rtsa gcig sprul bar mdzad pa'i DA ki 'bum// g.yon brkyang g.yas bskum zhabs kyi
bzhugs tshul las// 'khor ba'i 'dam las sgrol ba'i DA ki 'bum// ro yi gdan la brjid par bzhugs pa las// dur khrod sha la mi pod rdzi ba'i DA' ki 'bum// phyag gnyis gser gyi gdu bu khrol ba
las// srog gcod nyon mongs spong byed DA ki 'bum// dpung pa'i rgyan rnams rab tu 'bar ba las// nyon mongs gnyen pos 'dul byed DA ki 'bum// mche ba zla tshes dkar po gtsig pa las// 'khor ba rtsad
nas gcod pa'i DA ki 'bum// phag zhal gyen la spyan gsum gzigs pa las// sku gsum lhun gyis grub pa'i DA ki 'bum// rtsa zhal spyan gsum thur du gzigs pa las// khams gsum zil gyis gnon pa'i

DA ki 'bum// snyan cha gser gyi rna rgyan mdzad pa las// dam tshig gzhung ltar bsrung ba'i DA ki 'bum// pad+ma'i gdan la rab tu brjid pa las// bde chen gnyis med rtogs pa'i DA ki 'bum// spyi bo ha las gyur

pa'i DA ki las// lta ba nyams su len pa'i DA ki 'bum// mgrin pa ri las gyur pa'i DA ki las// ma bsgoms byin gyis brlob pa'i DA ki 'bum// snying kha ni las gyur pa'i DA ki las// spyod pa sna tshogs bsgyur

pa'i DA ki 'bum// lte ba sa las gyur pa'i DA ki las// 'bras bu gser khung rdol ba'i DA ki 'bum// gzhan yang sku yi sprul pa pra ma ha ti dang// gsung gi sprul pa pad+ma da ri dang// thugs kyi sprul pa lang kun da

ri dang// yon tan sprul pa kha sran ma kun dang// 'phrin las sprul pa rdo rje DA ki dang// rat+na DA ki dang/ pad+ma DA ki dang/ karma DA ki dang/ de las sprul ba'i rigs kyi pho nya mang po sprul// g.yung mo

DA ki ma dang/ ko ta ma dang/ gu gu d+ha ri ha dang/ gzugs can ma dang/ khwa gdong ma dang/ 'ug gdong ma dang/ khyi gdong ma dang/ phag gdong ma dang/ gshin rje sreg byed ma dang/ gshin rje mche ba ma dang/

gshin rje pho nya ma dang/ gshin rje 'joms ma dang/ rab tu gtum mo dang/ mig btsum ma dang/ 'od ldan ma dang/ sna chen ma dang/ dpa' bo blo gros ma dang/ mi'u thung ma dang/ lang ka'i dbang phyug ma dang/

shing grib ma dang/ sa srungs ma dang/ 'jigs byed ma dang/ rlung shugs ma dang/ chang 'thung ma dang/ sngo bsangs ma dang/ shin tu bzang mo dang/ rta sna mo dang/ gtsug phud can dang bya gdong ma dang/ 'khor

lo shugs can ma dang/ dum skyes ma dang/ sho na ding dang/ 'khor lo go cha ma dang/ shin tu dpa' mo dang/ stobs chen mo dang/ 'khor lo sgyur ba mo dang/ brtson chen mo dang/ de la sogs pa mkha' 'gro ma bye
ba phrag 'bum phrag mang po sprul lo// rdo rje phag mo'i sku las mkha' 'gro dpa' mo sprul pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas mkha' 'gro 'bum gyis bstod pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma'i sku bstan te/ spyan
'khor la gzigs nas/ zhal 'dzum pa mdzad de/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'khor ba'i sems can gdul slad du// thabs kyis 'dul ba'i rim pa dang// rgyal po gsang zhing bsgrub par bya'o// bcom
ldan phag mo bsam mi khyab// ces gsungs nas thugs de nyid las ma g.yos bzhin du/ 'gro ba'i don du las kyi phag mor sku sprul te/ sku la rgyan gsol te/ sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las lnga las/ yi

ge ma sngon du bstan te/ ma ha ra ni sa/ yi ge bzhi pa dang lnga pa dang/ gsum pa dang/ gnyis pa dang/ gcig pa dang/ drug pa dang/ bdun pa dang/ de las yi ge lnga pa la// dang por mngon par sangs rgya ba'i yi

ge dang/ gnyis pa thun mong gi zas tshogs 'du ba'i yi ge dang/ gsum pa 'byung ba ro snyoms pa'i yi ge dang/ bzhi pa lha 'dre dpung bskyed pa'i yi ge dang/ tshe sring bar byed pa'i yi ge dang lnga'o// de'i dang po la

bzhi/ zhes sdang gi sgo nas sangs rgya bar byed pa'i yi ge dang/ 'dod chags kyi/ gti mug gi/ gnyid dang bsam gtan chos skur sre bar byed pa'i yi ge'o// thun mong gi zas tshogs 'du bar byed pa'i yi ge la/

nor sgrub pa dang/ chu sbyin pa dang/ tsha tsha dang thang sku la mchod pa byed pa dang/ dpal bo'i ston mo dang/ ga'u'i sbyor ba/ sngags kyi sbyor ba/ phag mo chang dgug pa/ lha mo'i mtshan dgug pa/ chu la mi bying ba/
mngon par shes pa'i sbyor ba/ mes mi tshig pa/ bcud 'phel bar byed pa/ rma sngags/ mdze gso ba/ zho chang bsrung ba/ sri'u gso ba/ ser ba bsrung ba/ 'chi ba bzlog pa/ rmi lam ngan pa bzlog pa/
lam 'jigs pa bsrung ba phyogs ngan bzlog pa/ mig mthong/ pra dbab pa/ 'go nad bzlog pa/ sha ro dbyung ba/ yi dam lha'i zhal mthong bar bya ba/ byin brlabs dbab pa/ bsrung ba gdags pa dang/ sa

'og gi gdon mthong ba dang/ rgyal po chen po dbang du bsdu ba dang/ pho brang grong khyer g.yo bar bya ba dang/ btsun mo g.yo bar bya ba dang/ mi dang rtsod pa rgyal bar bya ba dang/ rta phyugs bsrung ba dang/ rkun mo

mi 'byung ba'o// de rnams phan gdags pa'o// tshar gcad pa la/ mthu dang/ klu la gtad pa dang/ thog ser dbab pa dang/ smyo ba dang/ 'byed pa dang/ bza' mi 'byed pa dang/ zor dang/ ltas ngan dang/ bya dmag dang/ khyi
dmag dang/ zhing sel dang/ khang sel dang/ dur sel dang/ lkugs pa dang/ rengs pa dang/ rmugs pa dang/ dbu rdeb pa dang/ brtul zhugs pa la sogs pa'o// las tshogs kyi le'u ste lnga
pa'o//// lha 'dre dpung bskyed pa'i yi ge la brgyad de/ brtul zhugs kyi dpung dang/ lha'i/ glu'i/ sngags kyi/ 'byung ba bzhi'i/ sbyin sreg gi/ rdzas dang sngags kyi dpung/ rig pa ye shes kyi dpung

ngo// dpung bskyed pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// 'byung ba bzhi ro snyoms pa'i yi ge la drug ste/ tsa kra bzhi la brten pa'i yi ge bzhi dang/ lha mo bskyed pa'i yi ge dang/ lta sgom bzhi'i yi ge dang/ yi ge 'gro

bzlog gi yi ge dang/ 'byung pa ro snyoms kyi yi ge bzhi dang/ mngon shes 'char ba'i yi ge bzhi'o// 'byung ba ro snyoms kyi yi ge bzhi'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// tshe sring bar byed pa'i yi ge bzhi la/ phyi nang
gsang ba de kho na nyid kyi bcud len no// phyi'i bcud len ni/ srid pa pho'i bcud cong zhi'i bcud len dang/ srid pa mo'i bcud brag zhun gyi bcud len dang/ 'byung ba pho'i bcud chu'i bcud len

dang// 'byung ba mo'i bcud sa'i bcud len dang bzhi'o// nang shi bcud len ni/ bdud rtsi lnga ste/ dri chen/ dri chu/ sha chen/ pad+ma rak+ta/ byang sems dang lnga'o// gsang ba'i bcud len ni/ bu mo lo bcu drug lon

pa'o// bla na med pa'i bcud len ni/ lta sgom spyod gsum mo// tshe bsring ba'i bcud len gyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas bram ze mchog sred ngo mtshar skyes nas/ ye shes DA ki ma la bstod pa/ A+e ma ho/

rdo rje phag mo bde gshegs yum// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug skal ldan ma// mkha' 'gro chen mo rnal 'byor gtso// rdo rje dbyings kyi DA ki yum// phyag rgya chen po rdo rje'i sku// he ru ka dang yang dag sbyor// dbu stong ma
la spyan stong ma// stong phrag bcu yi zhal gdong can// nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi brjid can// spyan mig dmar ser glog stong 'gyu// kha gnyer mche ba rab tu gtsigs// dbu skra gyen brdzais thog ser
'bebs// seng ge'i gzugs can 'dab bzangs gzugs// glang po chen po che ba'i gzugs// 'jig rten gsum po lto ba can// rgya mtsho'i mtha' dag ske rags can// thod pa dang ni kha TAM 'dzin// rdo rje zangs
gris 'byung po 'joms// mi rus 'phreng ba'i rgyan chas can// mi mgo skam po'i do shal can// bde gshegs 'bum ni khyod kyi 'khor// che ba'i lha tshogs khyod kyi bran// rig pa'i rgyal po gdon gzugs

can// rnal 'byor che ba'i dngos grub 'bebs// dpa' bo dngos grub cher gsal nas// hUM dang phaT kyi 'brug sgra can/ khro bo'aM gzugs kyis khams gsum sgrol// rgya mtsho'i gling rnams skems par byed// sna
tshogs chos rnams zil gyis gnon// srid pa gsum ni za bar byed// zas su ma hwa mang sa gsol// ma hA rak+ta bde bar gshegs// ma lus gdug pa skrag par byed// 'jigs par mdzad cing gsod par
byed// dmag gi dpung rnams rengs par byed// ngo mtshar 'dod pa'i gzugs mnga' ba// yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub gsol// phag mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gis khyod la gang gsol ba// don
