bzhugs pa/ gcer bu rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par bsgom/ thugs khar pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la ha ri ni sa bsam/ A+oM sa ma ya DA ki ni ha ri ni sa ru tra ru tra mu mu/ shig shig phye phye ston ston/ zhes bzlas shing
sman dang spos chis khrus bya/ rab mngon sum/ 'bring nyams/ tha ma rmi lam du legs nyes thams cad ston to// dam tshig mkha' 'gro'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// sna tshogs mkha' 'gro bsgrub pa ni/ bdag

nyid thams cad mkha' 'gro ma sku mdog sna tshogs 'od du 'bar ba/ g.yas rdo rje rgya gram/ g.yon thod pa/ kha TAM kha mchan khung du bcug pa/ zhabs g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum pa/ rdo rje rgya gram gyi gdan la

bzhugs par bsgom/ snying khar pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la ha ri ni sa bsam/ A+oM bud d+ha bud d+ha/ badzra badzra/ rat+na rat+na/ pad+ma pad+ma/ karma karma Da ki ni ye/ ma ma ha ri ni sa hUM hUM phaT phaT/ ces bzlas shing rig pa la ci

shar cu byed sny-ing 'dod pa bya/ mkha' 'gro mas dngos grub sna tshogs ste ro// me mchod bya zhing bdud rtsi bsnams pa bsreg/ sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// 'jig rten mkha' 'gro bsgrub pa

ni/ bdag nyid rdo rje phag mor bsgoms la/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mkha' 'gro mas gang bar bsgom/ ha ri ni sa war lam ni hUM hUM hring hring/ sa ni re he/ DA ki mi d+ha ko hUM dza/ sa ni ri ha/ ri mi sang kri
ta hUM/ sa ni ri ha sa phe ma dza la ta swA hA/ zhes bzlas shing gcer bu bya/ gar bya/ ri ka la bsdad/ mi tshil gyi dud pa btang/ mkha' 'gro ma thams cad 'khrugs nas bka' nyan gsung sdod par
'gyur ro// mkha' 'gro ma'i dkrug yig 'jig rten mkha' 'gro'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// thams cad mkha' 'gro bsgrub 'dod na/ bdag nyid rde rje phag mor bsgom/ snying khar pad+ma 'dab bzhi la/ ha ri

ni sa bkod la/ mkha' 'gro bzhi'i ngo bor bsam/ ha ri ni sa/ sa ri ni ha/ ri ha sa ni/ ni sa ri ha/ war ma ni hUM hUM hring/ DA ki mi d+ha ki hUM dza/ ri mi ye ta kri hUM/ sa pheM dza la ta swA hA/ zhes bzlas/ snang ba thams
cad mkha' 'gro ma'i rang bzhin du bsam mo// snang ba la ci shar bya/ 'gro 'dug bskor ba/ ldang 'dug lha phyag/ 'bod gcog gtor ma/ brgyab kyis dogs pa dang bsad kyis dogs pa la sogs pa mi bya/ re

dogs dang nyam nga med par brdzi'o// g.yang la mchong pa dang/ me dang chu la sogs pa la sems 'gyur ba med par brdzi'o// gdon gnod sbyin pho mo dang/ lha klu gdug pa can dang/ bar chad kyi rkyen bgegs

la nyam nga med par brdzi'o// thams cad mkha' 'gro'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// mkha' 'gro sde lnga bsgrub pa ni// rang nyid rdo rje phag mor bsgom// spyi gtsug bde chen 'khor lo ru// rdo rje mkha' 'gro sku mdog

mthing// g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon thod pa// mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo ni// rin chen mkha' 'gro sku mdog ser// g.yas pa rin chen g.yon thod pa// snying kha chos kyi 'khor lo na// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro sku
mdog dkar// g.yas pa 'khor lo g.yon thod pa// lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo na// las kyi mkha' 'gro sku mdog ljang// g.yas pa ral gri g.yon thod pa// gsang ba bde ba'i 'khor lo na// dam tshig mkha'

'gro bde stong gnyis med gnas// mkha' 'gro rnam bzhi'i snying kha na// pad+ma 'dab bzhi gnas pa la// ha ri ni sa gnas par bsgoms// ngag tu sngags 'di bzlas so// A+oM AH hUM swA hA/ ha ri ni sa hUM phaT/ lus
mi bsdad bsgul bskyod bya/ ngag mi bsdad sngags bzlas/ sems mi bsdad mi rtog pa la bsdad/ lus la bde ba 'byung/ ngag la nus pa 'byung/ sems la rtogs pa 'byung ngo// mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i le'u ste bcu
gcig pa'o//// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro sgrub pa'i thabs ni/ skad cig ma las bdag nyid rdo rje phag mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ rdo rje gri gug thod pa kha T+waM kha 'dzin pa'o// zhabs g.yas

brkyang g.yon bskum gyis 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan man pa/ rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ me dpung nang na bzhugs par bsgom/ snying khar pad+ma 'dab bzhi la/ ha ri ni sa bkod la/ de las 'od zer 'phros
pas mkha' 'gro dpa' bo dang dpa' mo thams cad spyan drangs te rang gi lus la gzud par bya'o// rtsa dang ba spu'i bu ga thams cad mkha' 'gro mas gang bar bsam mo// A+oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki ni ye

badzra war N+Na nI ye/ badzra bai ro tsa ni ye ha ri ni sa hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ snying kha'i dbus na gtso mo'i sngags pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la yi ge bzhu gnas pa la dmigs la bzlas/ lus mkha' 'gros gang nas sngags de
ri ri zlos par bsam/ rtags lus la bde ba/ ngag la nus pa/ sems la rtogs pa 'char/ mkha' 'gro ma grub pas thun mong gi dngos grub sna tshogs 'byung ngo// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma'i le'u ste bcu gnyis
pa'o//// 'jig rten dbang phyug bsgrub 'dod na/ bdag rdo rje phag mor bsgoms la/ spyi bor pad+ma 'dab bzhi'i steng du ha ri ni sa bkod la/ ngag tu yang ha ri ni sa bzlas pas/ 'khor lo las 'od zer
dkar po'i 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ dpa' bo dang/ dpa' mo thams cad kyi sku'i yon tan thams cad bsdus nas bdag gi spyi bor thim pas bdag gi lus
mdangs dang stobs dang ldan par bsgom mo/ 'jig rten gyi mi thams cad kyis bkur gnas su 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// ngag gi dbang phyug bsgrub 'dod na/
bdag rdo rje phag mor bsgoms la/ mgrin pa pad+ma 'dab bzhi'i steng du ha ri ni sa bkod la/ sngags bzlas pas 'khor lo las 'od zer dmar po 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems
dpa' dang/ dpa' bo dang dpa' mo thams cad kyi gsung gi yon tan thams cad bsdus nas mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo la thim pas bdag gi ngag la gsung dbyangs drug cu dang ldan par byin gyis brlabs

pa bsgom mo// 'gro ba thams cad ji ltar bsgo ba ltar bka' nyan par 'gyur ro// ngag gi dbang phyug gi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// thugs kyi dbang phyug bsgrub na/ bdag rdo rje phag mor bsgoms/ snying khar
pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi'i steng du ha ri nis bkod la sngags bzlas pas 'khor lo las 'od zer mthing ka 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ dpa' bo dang/ dpa' mo de
dag thams cad kyi thugs kyi yon tan thams cad bsdus nas bdag gi snying kha'i yi ge 'khor lo la thim pas/ mi shes pa'i rmongs pa'i dri ma thams cad bsal nas chos thams cad kyi don shes par byin gyis
brlabs par bsam/ chos thams cad kyi don khong du chud par 'gyur ro// thugs kyi dbang phyug gi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// 'phrin las kyi dbang phyug gi bsgrub pa ni/ bdag nyid rdo rje phag mor bsgoms
la/ lte bar pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi'i steng du ha ri ni sa bkod la/ sngags bzlas pas 'khor lo las 'od zer dkar po/ ser po/ dmar po/ nag po 'phros pas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang/ byang
chub sems dpa' dang/ dpa' bo dang/ dpa' mo rnams kyi 'phrin las kyi yon tan thams cad bsdus nas bdag gi lte ba'i yi ge la thim pas bdag gi nad dang/ gdon bgegs zhi ba dang/ tshe dang bsod
nams rgyas pa dang/ log par lta ba'i mi dang mi ma yin pa dbang du 'dus pa dang/ dgra bgegs tshar bcad par bsam mo// 'phrin las rnam pa bzhi 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'phrin las kyi dbang phyug bsgrub
pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// bde ba'i dbang phyug bsgrub par 'dod na/ bdag rdo rje phag mor bsgoms la/ gsang bar pad+ma 'dab bzhi'i steng du ha ri ni sa bsam/ sngags bzlas pas phyogs bcu'i sangs
rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ dba' bo dang/ dpa' mo rnams kyi sbyor mtshams nas byang sems dkar dmar thabs shes rab kyi bcud thams cad tshur bsdus te bdag gi gsang bar thim nas bde

bas lus rgyas nas bde ba dang stong par bsgom/ bde stong gnyis med kyi nyams skye bar 'gyur ro// bde ba'i dbang phyug gi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// snang stong gnyis med kyi don bsgom na/ bdag rdo rje

phag mor bsgoms/ snying pad+ma 'dab bzhi la ha ri ni sa bkod la/ yi ge bzhi pa bzlas pas snang ba 'di me long gi gzugs brnyan nam/ 'ja' tshon nam/ sgyu ma 'am/ smig sgyu 'am/ snang la rang bzhin med par

bsgoms/ de ltar bsgoms na snang ba 'di bun bun lang long 'ong ste snang bzhin du stong/ stong bzhin du snang/ snang la rang bzhin med par bsgom/ snang pa la thog rdugs med par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// snang stong
gnyis med kyi don bsgom pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// gsal stong dbyer med kyi nyams bsgom na/ bdag rdo rje phag mor bsgoms/ snying khar pad+ma 'das brgyad la ha ri ni sa bkod la yid kyis
bzlas/ shes pa bzlas pa'i rjes mi bcad/ ma 'ongs pa'i sngon mi bsu/ da ltar gyi shes pa skad cig ma 'di rkyen khar mi btang bar shes pa sal le sing nge gsal la ma 'gag pa rang 'byung rang gsal du
bzhag/ de la dang po yid tsam/ de nas skad cig tsam/ de nas yun je ring rje ring las rig pa gsal dngas phyed par 'gyur ro// gsal stong dbyer med kyi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// bde stong dbyer med
kyi don bsgom pa ni/ bdag rdo rje phag mor bsgoms la/ snying khar pad+ma 'dab bzhi bkod la/ ha ri ni sa bzhi bsam/ yid kyis bzlas te shes pa glod la bde 'ba' le shig ge lhod de bzhag/ rnam rtog mi
bcos/ mi bsgyur/ mi dgag/ rang byung rang dngas su bzhag/ de la gnas pa dang/ lus bde ba dang/ ting nge 'dzin gtong mi phod pa dang/ lus yod pa mi tshor bar 'gyur ro// bde stong gnyis

med kyi le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// rig stong dbyer med kyi don bsgom pa ni/ bdag rdo rje phag mor bsgoms/ snying khar pad+ma 'dab bzhi la ha ri ni sa bkod la yid kyis bzlas/ rig pa skad cig ma 'di hrig

hrig bun bun lang lang yer yer gzhi la ma bzhag par 'ur 'ur bskyangs pas rig pa 'ur te khrog ge shes pa 'ur re sgyangs se/ tha mal gyi shes pa 'gyur/ bag la nyal las khog rig pa'i rtsa ba stong par shes pa
'di kho na lam du bgyer ro// mkha' 'gro mas rig pa byin gyis brlabs pas rnal 'byor pa snang ba'i chags zhen las grol bar 'gyur ro// rig stong dbyer med kyi le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o//// bla ma'i

byin rlabs kyi don bsgom pa ni/ bdag rdo rje phag mor bsgoms la/ spyi bor bla ma rang gi yi dam lha'i cha byad can yum dang snyoms 'jug mdzad pa pad+ma dmar po 'dab bzhi'i steng na bzhugs par bsgoms/ yab
yum gyi sbyor mtshams nas byang chub sems rtsa rar babs pas/ bdag gi spyi bo tshangs pa'i bu ga na mar song bas bdag gi sdig sgrib dang dam tshig nyams chag thams cad nag nyil nyil dag nas dkar sangs

la rkang pa'i mthe bong dang bshang lam mar song bar bsam/ de la nyin gsum mtshan gsum du bsgom mo// thun tha ma la bla ma yab yum 'od du zhu nas spyi bo tshangs pa'i bu ga na mar thim rang lhar bsgoms pa

'od du lhan gyis zhu nas de'i ngang la 'od gsal du bsgom mo// bla ma'i byin rlabs thams cad rang la 'jug pa yin no// bla ma bsgom pa'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o//// rdo rje phag mo'i sku bsgom pa ni/ phag

mo'i thang sku cig mdun du bkram la/ phyi nang gi mchod pa bshams la/ thang sku de la nyin mo gcer zin du bsgom/ nub rang rdo rje phag mo'i skur bsgom/ gsal ba'i 'phro la bzhag/ yang thang sku de dran par

byas la skad cig gis rdo rje phag mor bsgom/ nyi mo'i thang sku la sems gzung/ 'dris su gzhug/ nub mo yang bsgoms pas goms tsa na dran pa yer la lha gsal ba yong ste/ de ltar byung tsa na snang ba 'gro ba pho

mo thams cad rdo rje phag mo dang mkha' 'gro pho mor bsgom mo// de yang snang la rang bzhin med pa rmi lam sgyu ma lta bur bsgom mo// 'jug tu snang ba lha'i dkyil 'khor mkha' 'gro mar mthong bar 'gyur ro// rdo

rje phag mo dbyibs la bslab pa'o// rdo rje phag mor bsgom pa'i le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o//// rdo rje phag mo'i bzlas pa la bslab pa ni/ rang rdo rje phag mo'i sku ru gsal ba dang/ pad+ma 'dab ma 'dab ma
bzhi'i nang na dbus nam dmar mo/ pad+ma 'dab bzhi la ha ri ni sa bzhi la rnam pa yi ge lnga la ngo bo mkha' 'gro ma lnga yin pas/ yi ge lnga rlung la zhon nas ngag tu 'thon pas ring la 'khug pa mkha'

'gro ma'i gdungs 'dzab tu na ra ra drangs pas/ rlung tha mal du ma song yig 'bru'i sgra ru grags pas/ yid de la chags pas sems gsal stong gi nyams skyes pas rgyun du na rar bgrang ngo// ma mo dang mkha'
'gro ma rnams kyis byin gyis rlob ste/ sems bde gsal mi rtog pa'i nyams skyes so// bzlas pa la bslab pa'o// rdo rje phag mo'i bzlas pa'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o//// rlung dang 'od gsal gnyis med la

bslab cing bsgom pa ni/ bdag rdo rje phag mor bsgom/ spyi bor bla ma bsgom rlung ni snying gi nang na 'byung ba lnga yi rlung kha dog lnga'i ngo bor gnas/ srog 'dzin pa'i las byed/ rgyu ba sna sgo gnyis re mos su rgyu ste/

g.yas nas rgyu tsa na nyon mongs pa'i rlung yin pas mi bsgom g.yon nas rgyu tsa na ye shes kyi rlung yin pas bsgom/ gnyis ka nas byung tsa na chos nyid kyi rlung a wa d+hU te nas rgyu ba yin pas/ de'i dus su chos nyid

rang chas su 'char ro// rlung sum gnyis gnan sum cha btang la/ phyi nas sor brgyad tsam du g.yung drung g.yon du 'khyil pa kha dog dmar po gcig bsam/ rlung phyi ru 'byung ba'i dus su hUM du 'gyur/ g.yung drung

'khril pa la drag tu phog pas g.yon du drag tu sgo ro ro 'khor bar bsam/ rlung nang du 'jug tsam na A+oM gyi rnamapas nang du 'jug/ bar na gnas tsam na A:'i rnam pas bar na gnas/ rlung nang du zin tsam na

rtog pa'i 'gyu ba chad de/ g.yung drung ris tshur je nye je nye la sna rtse tsam du 'khor ba dang/ mi dmigs par bsam/ de'i ngang la rtog med 'od gsal du gsal ba ni/ rlung sems 'dres pa'i rlung dang 'od gsal
zung 'jug yin no// rlung dang 'od gsal zung 'jug gi le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o//// yig 'bru 'od gsal zung 'jug bsgom pa ni/ bdag rdo rje phag mor bsgoms/ rang snying pad+ma 'dab bzhi la ha ri ni sa bkod
la/ yid kyis yi ge bzhi pa bzlas pas yi ge 'od du sgo ra ra 'dug par bsam la/ yi ge bzhi 'od du lam ste zhu nas lus sems gang yang med par chos nyid kyi 'od gsal ngos gzung ste/ gsal la ma 'gags
pa sa la le bal bzhag go/ de la goms pas mkha' 'gro mas mchog gi dngos grub ster bar 'gyur ro// yi ge 'od gsal zung 'jug gi le'u ste nyer drug pa'o//// phyag rgya chen po zung 'jug bsgom pa ni/

phyi las kyi phyag rgya/ nang dam tshig gi phyag rgya/ gsang ba chos kyi phyag rgya/ de kho na nyid kyi phyag rgya chen po'o// de la phyi las kyi phyag rgya ni/ las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad ma bkag rang byung du shar ba las kyi
phyag rgya/ nyon mongs pa la rang bzhin med par shes pas nyon mongs pa bde bar skyed par byed/ nyams myong ni las kyi phyag rgyas las snang srid bde ba chen pos nyams su myong/ rtogs pa ni las

kyi phyag rgyas 'khor 'das gnyis su med par sems su rtogs so// nang dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni/ bdag phag mor bskyed pa ni bskyed rim/ de la rang bzhin med pa rdzogs rim/ bskyed rdzogs gnyis la mi 'da'

'o// las ni dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bskyed rdzogs zung 'brel de nyid mi stong par byed do// nyams myong ni dam tshig gi phyag rgyas/ bdag gzhan gnyis su med pas mnyam pa rim med du rtogs so// gsang ba chos

kyi phyag rgya ni/ chos thams cad sgyu ma gnyis su med pa'i don la sbyor ro// las ni chos kyi phyag rgyas thams cad sems su rtogs pas/ chos ma yin pa sel bar byed/ nyams myong ni chos kyi phyag rgyas/ chos nyid

sems zung 'jug yul bral du nyams su myong ngo// rtogs pa ni chos kyi phyag rgyas rlung sems gnyis med du rtogs so// de kho na nyid phyag rgya chen po ni skye med dang gnyug ma gnyis su med/ blo bral ngos bzungs

dang bral bar don la gnas/ las ni phyag rgya chen po'i don bsam brjod dang bral ba ci yang med par rtogs/ nyams myong ni skye med rten dang bral bar nyams su myong rtogs pa ni phyag rgya chen pos blo dngos
gnyis med chos sku bde ba chen por rtogs so// phyag rgya bzhi zung 'jug gi le'u ste nyer bdun pa'o//// rdo rje phag mo'i sku brdar bshad pa/ sku mdog dmar mor bzhugs pa ni// 'gro don thugs rje chags

pa'i brda// khro mo'i tshul du bzhugs pa ni// thugs rdo rje khros pa 'dul ba'i brda// phag gdong gyen la bltas pa ni// rnam rtog thams cad za ba'i brda// khro zhal thur la gzigs pa ni// 'khor ba'i 'dam nas

'don pa'i brda// spyi gtsug g.yung drung ris su 'khor ba ni// chos rnams 'gyur ba med pa'i brda// dbu la thod pa dum bu bdun pas brgyan pa ni// sangs rgyas rabs bdun dbu la brgyan pa'i brda// rin chen

rnam lngas dbu la brgyan pa ni// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dbu la brgyan pa'i brda// rna ltag me long cod pan btags pa ni// lha mos tshul du khros pa'i brda// rna ltag rna rgyan btags pa ni// 'gro drug chos sgras
'dul ba'i brda// mgul du mgul rgyan btags pa ni// gsung la 'gag pa med pa'i brda// dbu skra sil bur 'dug pa ni// chos rnams ma 'dres rdzogs pa'i brda// spyan mig dkar nag phyed pa ni// snang ba
zil gyis gnon pa'i brda// mche ba dkar po gtsigs pa ni// srid gsum zil gyis gnon pa'i brda// g.yas pa gri gug thogs pa ni// 'khri ba thams cad gcod pa'i brda// g.yon pa thod khrag bsnams pa
ni// bde stong dbyer med nyams ldan brda// kha TAM mchan khung bcug pa ni// sku gsung thugs dang ldan pa'i brda// phyag la phyag gdub gsol ba ni// srog gcod gnyen po spong ba'i brda// dpung pa

la dpung rgyan btags pa ni// nyon mongs gnyen pos 'dul ba'i brda// mi mgo lnga bcu'i do shal byas pa ni// rnam rtog lnga bcu sprul skur 'char ba'i brda// mi skra skud pas thag pa byas pa ni// skye ba gsum la
mnga' bsnyems brda// sked la sked rgyan btags pa ni// phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa'i brda// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum bzhugs pa ni// sgeg mo'i tshul du bzhugs pa'i brda// nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa
ni// thugs la gsal 'grib med pa'i brda// zhabs la zhabs gdub btags pa ni// 'khor ba dong sprug mdzad pa'i brda// 'jigs byed dus mtshan mnan pa ni// mi phod rnam gnyis brdzi ba'i brda// pad+ma'i
gdan la bzhugs pa ni// 'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos brda// me ri'i nang du bzhugs pa ni// rnam rtog thams cad bsregs pa'i brda// rdo rje phag mo'i sku brdar bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer brgyad

pa'o//// gsung gi brda rnams sngags yin te/ hUM/ pad+ma chen po'i gdan stengs na// rdo rje phag mo'i thugs kha na// sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab bzhi la// sku gsung thugs kyi sngags gsum gsal// phar 'phros pa

ni sku la thim// sku ni 'gyur ba med pa'i sku// tshur 'dus pa ni gsung la thim// gsung ni 'gag pa med pa'i gsung// gnyis su med pa'i thugs la thim// thugs ni skye shi med pa'i thugs// dngos grub stsol

cig sku gsung thugs// byin gyis rlobs shig rnal 'byor ma// 'phrin las mdzod cig mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// A+auM sarba b+hu d+d+ha DA ki na ye ha ri ni sa hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra wa rna ni ye ha ri ni sa hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra bai ro tsa na

ni ye ha ri ni sa hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra yo gi ni ye ha ri nis hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra ba ra hi ha ri ni sa hUM phaT/ ces sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las kyi sngags so// gsung brdar bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer dgu

pa'o//// thugs kyi brda ni chos nyid don/ rdo rje phag mo'i thugs ni mtshan ma'i skyon bral bas// nam mkha' lta bur zhi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab ngo bo nyid// gdod ma nyid nas thugs ni ma bcos lhun gyis
grub// bde ba chen po 'od gsal dri ma med pa'i dpal// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa yum gyi mchog/ skye 'gag med pa spros pa nyer zhi ba// thugs kyi rdo rje phag mo'i thugs la 'dud// rje

btsun lha mo khyod ni me long ye shes ngo bo nyid// chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bur gsal ba ni// so sor rtog dang bya ba nan tan ye shes rab brgyan pa'o// chos dbyings rnam par dag pas dri med ye shes
mchog/ mnyam nyid ye shes don ldan thugs la 'dud// rje btsun lha mo khyod ni sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas pa ste// mkha' 'gro kun gyi ye shes rdo rje sangs rgyas che// rdo rje mnakha' 'gro rgyu
ma'i gzugs can ma// rin chen mkha' 'gro dngos grub kun gyi gter// pad+ma mkha' 'gro ge sar yid du 'ong// las kyi mkha' 'gro srid gsum 'khor lo 'chang// skye med thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'chang// skye
med thugs kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu mdzes// rigs rnams 'dus pa'i mkha' 'gro thugs la 'dud// rdo rje phag mo'i thugs kyis byin gyis rlobs// hUM hUM hUM/ thugs kyi brda'i le'u ste sum cu
pa'o//// mchod pa'i brda phyag rgya bzhi yis dbul ba ni/ dag pa ye shes b+ha ga nas// rdo rje mkha' 'gro gshegs su gsol// mi 'gyur gnas pa'i b+ha ga nas// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro gshegs su
gsol// shes rab btsun mo'i b+ha ga nas// las kyi mkha' 'gro gshegs su gsol// u rgyan dur khrod rang byung nas// 'jig rten mkha' 'gro gshegs su gsol// dgongs sam rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// rdo rje
mkha' 'gro skad pa de// phyag rgya chen po ma lags sam// snang ba thams cad mchod par 'bul// byin gyis rlob cing gshegs su gsol// dgongs sam ye shes mkha' 'gro ma// ye shes mkha' 'gro skad pa
de// chos kyi phyag rgya ma lags sam// 'dus byas thams cad mchod par 'bul// byin gyis rlob cing gshegs su gsol// dgongs sam las kyi mkha' 'gro ma// las kyi mkha' 'gro skad pa de// las kyi phyag
rgya ma lags sam// phung po lnga yi mchod par 'bul// byin gyis rlob cing gshegs su gsol// dgongs sam 'jig rten mkha' 'gro ma// 'jig rten mkha' 'gro skad pa de// dam tshig phyag rgya ma lags

sam// bdud rtsi lnga'i mchod par 'bul// byin gyis rlob cing gshegs su gsol// badzra DA ki ni/ bud d+ha DA ki ni/ d+harma DA ki ni/ karma DA ki ni/ ma hA mu tra/ d+harma mu tra/ karma mu tra/ sa ma ya mu tra/ kha kha kha hi kha hi/

mchod pa brda'i le'u ste so gcig pa'o//// mkha' 'gro'i rtags kyi bstan pa ni// ma dang sring mo'i cha lugs ni// snying nye myur du 'go ba'i brda// grogs mo mdza' mor 'ong ba ni// gsang thub dngos grub

ster ba'i brda// bran mo khol mor 'ong ba ni// dbang bsdus bkol du btub pa'i brda// chung ma mna' mar 'ong ba ni// phrag dog 'khor lo 'phreng ba'i brda// btsan mo jo mor 'ong ba ni// dbang du ma 'dus mi

'grub brda// g.yu dang rgyan cha mdzes pa ni// thugs dam bskongs nas dag pa'i brda// shon dang phyag 'tshal byed pa ni// dam tshig skyon med 'grub pa'i brda// bud med mang po zas nor ster// dngos grub nor
tshogs 'du ba'i brda// thod pa chang gis bkang nas ster ba ni// mchog gi dngos grub ster ba'i brda// bud med tshogs kyi nang na 'dug/ mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams 'du ba'i brda// rin chen

gter rnams rnyed pa dang// mchod cha sna tshogs rnyed pa dang// na chung phyag rgyar 'bul ba ni// thugs kyi dngos grub thob pa'i brda// la dong gru rnyed chos rnams rnyed dang bltas pa ni// chos kyi dngos grub thob

pa'i brda// rdo rje dril bu rnyed pa dang// bdud rtsi chu la 'thungs pa dang// rang la nyi ma shar ba ni// tshe yi dngos grub thob pa'i brda// shes dang rin chen rnyed pa ni// dam tshig ma nyams bsam 'grub brda// rnga

chen brdungs dang dung chen 'bud// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan 'phyar ba ni// chos kyi snyan grags thob pa'i brda// gangs dkar rtse la 'dug pa dang// ri bo'i rtse la 'dug pa dang// mchod rten rtse la 'dzeg pa
dang// mgo la nyi ma shar ba ni// mchog gi dngos grub thob pa'i brda// bzang po'i brda rtags le'u ste so gnyis pa'o//// ngan pa'i brda rtags bstan pa ni// mun nag 'thibs dang rmugs bas
gtibs// sa sros nub mor 'dug pa ni// las sgrib che ba'i brda dang rtags// bud med 'thab cing 'dzin ba dang// yug sa mo dang mdze ma dang// rkub dang mo mtshan ston pa dang// bud med nyal po byed pa

dang// bud med pho mtshan ston pa ni// nyams grib bar chad 'ong ba'i brda// bud med mang po 'khrug pa dang// rgol du 'ong dang the les 'debs// ngu dang brang rdung 'o dod bod// mkha' 'gro 'khrugs dang khrod

pa'i brda// bud med slong du 'ong ba dang// ston mo'i 'dod dang khral 'dod drang// rang yang ltogs dang skom pa ni// mkha' 'gro ma bskongs pa yi brda// rgyang glu len cing phyir 'gyes dang// rta dang bong bu mthong

ba ni// mi 'grub phyi thal yin pa'i brda// khyo ba'i tshogs su 'ong ba dang// skya bshar zhib can mang po 'ong// pho yis bar chad byed pa'i brda// mi rang lag cha med pa dang// bdag dang gzhan 'thabs kho rgyal

dang// cho long rgyan byas 'pham pa ni// bar chad 'ong ba'i brda dang rtags// yul ngan kha ba bu yug dang// 'dam rdzab mi gtsang phyi sa dang// blo dang rnag khrag 'gos pa ni// nyams grib mi gcang ba yi

brda// bud med ngo mi shes pa dang// skya bshar ngo mi shes pa dang// gri la yu ba med pa dang// mda' la mde'u med pa dang// phur ba rtse mo chag pa ni// gdam ngag lhag chad byung ba dang// sngags la sel yig
zhugs pa'i brda// ngan pa'i rtags kyi le'u ste so gsum pa'o//// ngan rtags bzang por ston pa'i brda// rtsi shing mes bsregs rgya mtsho bskams// lus la rnag khrag 'byung ba dang// yar skyug mar
bshal 'byung ba dang// rang lus rang gis bgos pa dang// don snying nang khrol rang gis mthong// gcer bu byas nas mchong rgyug dang// las dang sgrib pa zad pa'i brda// bzang rtags ngan par

ston pa'i brda// gser dang zas ni rnyed pa dang// lha khang nang du phyag btsal dang// mchod rten nang du 'dug pa dang// gsung rab mang po 'don pa dang// rta rgod zhon du ma btun dang// rta pa mang po khros pa

dang// btsun pa btsang po dge shes dang// mya ngan kha mchu phyi thal rnams// rgyal po'i bar chad 'ong ba'i brda// phyi rtags 'chol bar ston pa'i brda// sngon la pho yi cho 'phrul 'ong// grub rtags nye ste 'khu ldog

che// skye bo'i tshogs kyis phyag 'tshal dang// bud med mang po 'dud pa dang// ri bo'i rtse la 'dug pa dang// chu bo che las brgal ba dang// gru dang gzings la 'gro ba dang// me chen 'bar dang rlung chen

'tshubs// dmag dang ltad mo byed pa dang// rgya gar skad ris mig cig pa// chos 'chad smyo ba'i tshul ston dang// zang zing 'du long mang po ni// mkha' 'gro pho mo 'chol pa rnams// bdag la 'go zhing 'grub
pa'i brda'o// brda rtags gsum gyi le'u ste so bzhi pa'o//// nyams dang mngon sum par rtags ni// chos byed snying 'dod pa dang// sngar bas lus yangs bde ba dang// byin dang byin brlabs thibs shing
'ur// bag dro nyams dga' mkha' 'gro mthong// chos nyid don la sems gnas dang// chos rnams mthong bas don shes dang// gnyid dang bsam gtan 'dres pa dang// rmi lam na yang chos dang

'grogs// smras pa thams cad chos su 'gro// bka' bsgo tsam gyis lha 'dre nyan// byin brlabs byas pas gdon zhi dang// nyams dang rtogs pa khong nas 'char// nyon mongs dug lnga zhi ba dang// skye 'chi'i sdug

bsngal rtag tu dran// 'khor ba las ni blo log pa// DA ki'i byin brlabs zhugs pa'i brda'o// nyams dang byin brlabs kyi brda rtags le'u ste so lnga pa'o//// slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis// dur khrod

chen po dga' ba'i tshal du/ mkha' 'gro ma zhi ba'i mtsho la zhus pa/ DA ki ma'i snyan brgyud dgongs don 'byung ba'i las sna tshogs/ bskyed rim gnyis kyi man ngag gi rgyud/ slob dpon pad+mas jo mo mkhar chen
bza' mtsho rgyal la gdams pa rdzogs so// rgya rgya rgyaH////

rgya gar skad du/ badzra mi phyed rtsa g+hu gu h+ya tan tra na ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje stong gsal snying po gsang ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos
pa'i dus gcig na/ ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i gnas// ma bsgribs gsal ba'i gzhal yas nas// rdo rje stong gsal ma zhes te// 'dus pa'i 'khor la snying po'i don// chos nyid gsung gi brda

mdzad do// snying po gsang ba'i rgyud las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// 'khor rnams rang gi gnas bzhengs pa// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma las// de bzhin ye shes chos nyid dang// sprul pa'i mkha' 'gro rong
bzhengs nas// mkha' 'gro mi 'gyur mas zhus pa// kye mkha' 'gro chen mo yis// don gyi rang bzhin bstan du gsol// spyi btud thal sbyar zhus pa las// stong gsal ma yis bka' stsal ba// gsang ba don gyi

gsung bsgrags pas// la la mnyam pa'i ngang la bzhugs// la la nges pa'i don kyang mthong// la la bde ba chen por 'bar// la la ye shes nang nas shar// la la chos nyid don la spyod// la la 'khrab cing la
la sprug/ la la brgyal zhing la la skrag/ snying po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// kye ma mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i bdag/ don gyi rang bzhin bstan du gsol// stong gsal ma

yis bka' stsal ba// nyon cig mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i tshogs// snying po hUM gi rang bzhin ni// dug lnga ma lus sreg pa'i me// snying po hUM du drang bar bya// sdug bsngal ma lus 'khru pa'i chu// snying po hUM du drang bar

bya// 'khor ba'i zhen pa chags pa'i rlung// snying po hUM du drang bar bya// mkha' 'gro'i pho brang bskyed pa'i phyir// snying po hUM du drang bar bya// mkha' 'gro thams cad 'dus pa'i gsung// snying po hUM du drang bar

bya// byin rlabs thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyu// snying po hUM du drang bar bya// dam chos thams cad 'du ba'i don// snying po hUM du drang bar bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs// snying po hUM du drang bar bya// bde
gshegs thams cad gshegs pa'i lam// snying po hUM du drang bar bya// snying po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ don gyi rang bzhin bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// kye ma mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i bdag/ lha gnas
snying po bstan du gsol// mkha' 'gro ma yis bka' stsal pa// dam tshig sems dpa'i lhar gsal bas// 'khor lo bzhi yi gnas dag tu// snying po hUM du drang bar bya// klad pa bde chen 'khor lo na// bcom
ldan 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi pa// gshin rje khro mo yum dang sbyor// rigs bzhi gshin rje 'khor dang bcas// mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo na// bcom ldan pad+ma
dbang gi lha// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi ba// pad+ma khro mo yum dang sbyor// rigs bzhi rta mgrin 'khor dang bcas// snying kha chos kyi 'khor lo na// bcom ldan badzra he ru ka// zhal gsum

phyag drug zhabs bzhi pa// badzra khro mo yum dang sbyor// rigs bzhi badzra 'khor dang bcas// lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo na// bcom ldan rdo rje gos sngon can// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi pa// rdo rje khro mo yum

dang sbyor// rigs bzhi phyag rdor 'khor dang bcas// 'khor lo'i srog shing 'du ti rtsa// spyi gtsug gsang gnas bar du rgyu// rdo rje hUM gi lam du byung// 'og min zhes bya'i spyi gtsug na// bla ma bde gshegs mos

gus rten// rlung sems hUM gi sbyar bar bya// ye shes sprul pa'i 'phro 'du yis// phyi shur nang shar thog rdzis ldan// phyi nang grong khyer lha'i dkrogs// bsod nams tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor// 'od gsal stong pa

lam du blang// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhi bar bsdu// lte ba snying kha mgrin pa dang// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo ru// bstan pa'i mnga' bdag shAkya thub// mthu stobs bdag po rdo rje sems// thugs rje'i bdag

po spyan ras gzigs// mkhyer rab mnga' bdag 'jam pa'i dbyangs// lha rnams kun gyi thugs kha nas// gser gyi rdo rje mtshon re la// rdo rje lte ba'i bum nang du// hUM gi rang bzhin ba thag tsam// stong gsal
hUM du drang bar bya// dgongs pa chos nyid klong du bzhag/ snying po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ lha gnas bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// kye ma mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i bdag/ nyon mongs gnas sa bstan du
gsol// mkha' 'gro ma yis bka' stsal ba// spyi bo gti mug gnas sa yin// mgrin par 'dod chags gnas sa yin// snying kha zhe sdang gnas sa yin// lte ba nga rgyal gnas sa yin// gsang ba phrag dog
gnas sa yin// de na gdon gang gnas pa ni// bdud dang ma mo spyi bor gnas// btsan dang dmug mo mgrin par gnas// lha dang rgyal po snying khar gnas// dmu dang bse mo lte bar gnas// klu dang sa bdag
gsang gnas gnas// gdon gyi rkyen las nad byung ba// 'dus pa mgo nas 'jug pa yin// khrag nad mgrin pa dag nas bskyed// tshad mkhris snying khar gnas pa yin// bad kan pho mtsher dag na gnas// rlung
gi gsang ba'i gnas nas 'phel// las kyi 'tshams sbyar skye gnas ni// gti mug las kyis byol song du// 'dod chags las kyis mi yi gnas// zhe sdang las kyis dmyal ba ru// ser sna'i las kyis yi dgas
gnas// nga rgyal las kyis lha gnas skyes// phrag dog las kyi lha min gnas// snying po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ nyon mongs 'khrug pa bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// kye ma mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i
bdag/ bde gshegs gnas sa bstan tu gsol// mkha' 'gro ma yis bka' stsal pa// sku yi lha tshogs spyi bor gnas// gsung gi lha tshogs mgrin par gnas// thugs kyi lha tshogs snying khar

gnas// sprul pa'i lha tshogs lte bar gnas// rigs lnga'i lha tshogs kha dog ni// dkar po dmar po ser po ljang// lha dang ldan pa'i mkha' 'gro ni// rin chen rigs dang pad+ma'i rigs// rdo rje rigs dang las
kyi rigs// mkha' 'gro ma rigs dmar smug yin// ye shes rim po'i bskyed lugs ni// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes dang// me long lta bu'i ye shes dang// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang// so sor rtogs pa'i

ye shes dang// bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so// lha dang mkha' 'gro'i ye shes de// rlung sems hUM du dril la btang// bde chen zung 'jug gnad du btang// snying po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ bde bar gshegs pa'i
gnas bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// kye ma mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i gnas// rlung bcu'i gnas sa bstan du gsol// mkha' 'gro ma yis bka' stsal pa// rig pa 'dzin pa sa yi rlung// rig pa sdud pa chu

yi rlung// rig pa smin pa me yi rlung// rig pa g.yo ba rlung gi rlung// rig pa khyab pa nam mkha'i rlung// skyes par byed pa pha yi rlung// bsdud par byed pa ma yi rlung// smin par byed pa bu yi rlung// gsal bar

byed pa las kyi rlung// thog par byed pa 'bras bu'i rlung// rlung bcu dril te lnga ru bsdus// mi rtsom lhun grub rlung du bsdus// gsal ba ye shes rlung du bsdus// mi phyed gnyis med rlung du bsdus// rang byung mi

'gag rlung du bsdus// stong gsal rig pa rlung du bsdus// rlung pos gcig tu dril ba de// mkhar la nyi ma shar ba 'dra// snying po hUM gi 'khor lo bskor// ye shes thog ser nyams su blang// snying po gsang ba'i
rgyud las/ rlung bcud dbang du bsdu ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// kye ma mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i bdag/ yid kyi mngon sum bstan du gsol// mkha' 'gro ma yis bka' stsal pa// yid kyi mngon sum nga

las byung// rdo rje 'chang chen khro bdag gang// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin nga// thabs dang shes rab ye shes nga// thams cad yid kyi lam du byed// na tsha'i sdug bsngal yid

kyi lam// tsha ba'i nad rigs ci na yang// lus kyi 'khrul 'khor bsgul bskyod bya// ngag tu hri hri drangs la ston// lus ni rtswa spyil lta bu la// nad ni du ba lta bu ste// ba spu kun gyi bu ga nas// nad rnams phyi ru thon
bsam ste// rlung sems dril la drag tu bsgom// bsil bar bsdad cing mal cha srab// bsil zas bsil sman bshad la bza'// khong pa rgyu ma na ba na// rkang pa bsnol te pus mo btsugs// bus mo'i snyan gong
lag gnyis bsnol// lus bsdam dmigs rtsugs rlung mnan la// lag ngar gsus pa shud shud bya// sems bzung dbugs ni hUM bcas btang// ro stod glo snying mi bde na// ro stod dgye dgu bya

zhing sprug/ dbugs ni dam la ring bas bton// na sar 'od gsal stong par bsgoms// pho mchin gsum pa 'gyings shing na// skyug mer zos pa mi 'jug na// gsus pa'i 'khrul 'khor shes pa yin// yid la rlung drung
rlung sems dril// ma yengs rtse gcig nyams su blangs// grang ba'i nang ni lci na yang// lus bsdam mgo gtums rlung gzung la// ha ha hus drod bskyed la// nad kyi steng du gsal btab ste// ma yengs

bsgom pa gnad du che// nad rlangs mgo bo na ba na// 'jing ba bkug la 'khrul 'khor bya// hri hri drang zhing stong gsal sgom// grang rlung tsha zhing skyug pa na// lus smad bsdams te hri hri drang// 'od gsal med dang
bcas la sgom// tshad nad rig pa phyi ru bzhag/ grang nad rig pa nang du sgril// ji ltar rma ni gang yin yang// rma nang a dkar gsal ba las// a de zhu nas bdud rtsir sgom// lus kyi gar dang ngag gi
sgra// yid kyi dmigs pas nad rnams ston// rnying po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ mngon sum bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// kye ma mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i bdag/ tshe grib 'chi rtags bstan du gsol// mkha'
'gro ma yis bka' stsal pa// dus bzang yar ngo'i zla grib la// gzugs brnyan brtags na 'di ltar 'chi// ro gtugs 'dra na za ltar 'chi// mgo bo med na zla gsum 'chi// yan lag ma tshangs zla drug
'chi// de ni nam mkha'i brtag pa yin// lus kyi gnas gzhan brtag pa ni// gnas sa sbrel thag chad dam lta// glog lcam dmar mo sring ngam brtag/ chu rta lam na rgyug gam brtag/ ri rab srin chen yal lam
brtag/ gangs dkar 'od dang bral lam brtag/ mkha' 'gro sgra skad chag gam brtag/ snying po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ 'chi rtags bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// kye ma mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i
bdag/ gnas skabs 'chi slu bstan du gsol// mkha' 'gro ma yis bka' stsal ba// mi rta khyi yi rus pa la// thum po byas te dong du sba// gtor ma btang zhing dge las bya// des kyang bzlog par ma gyur

na// chos 'khor tshogs 'khor chen po bya// des kyang bzlog par ma gyur na// 'khor gsum yongs dag spongs dag bya// des kyang bzlog par ma gyur na// bla med mchod pa chen po bya// chos nyid don gyi ngang la

bzhag/ dus min 'chi ba byung srid na// bdud kyi bar chad srog 'phrog yin// nang du rig pa btson du gzung// phyi ru snang pa rang sar bzhag/ ma bcos chos nyid ngang la 'pho// don gyi 'chi ba med pa yin// snying
po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ 'chi ba bsla ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// kye ma mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i bdag/ rnal 'byor nyams snang bstan du gsol// mkha' 'gro ma yis bka' stsal pa// rig pa
rang byung gtan la phebs// rig pa ye shes rang la shar// don mthong yid ches bde bar 'bar// rlung sems las su rung ba yis// yid dam lha yis lung bstan 'byung// mkha' 'gro rnams kyis byin gyis
rlob// gnod sbyin pho mo zhi bar byed// na tsha sdug bsngal sran yang tshugs// thun mong mchog gi dngos grub thob// cha mthun mngon par shes pa 'char// rig pa rang grol chos sku thob// 'khor dang
longs spyod thams cad 'du// lus bde sems bde bde bar ldan// ngag la nub pa sna tshogs 'byung// tshe ring nad med gnod pa bral// lta sgom spyod 'bras shugs las 'byung// snying po gsang ba'i rgyud las/
phan yon bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// kye ma mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i bdag/ 'di phyi'i 'char lugs bstan du gsol// mkha' 'gro ma yis bka' stsal pa// gdeng dang ldan pa'i rnam 'byor
la// 'di dang bar do phyi ma la// rig pa'i 'char lugs 'di ltar mchis// dus 'dir 'od gsal rtogs pa yin// lta ba 'od gsal stong par rtogs// sgom pa 'od gsal yengs pa med// spyod pa 'od gsal
'gag pa med// nyams nyid 'od gsal zhen pa med// 'bras bu 'od gsal 'bral ba med// zhing khams 'od gsal rnam par dag/ de ltar rtogs pa'i bar do ru// rig pa rang byung gcer bu de// gling pa yu ba

med pa la// rjen pa rang sar 'char ba yin// zag med bde ba kho na nyid// ye shes bde rlung kho na nyid// shes pa rang snang kho na nyid// rig pa rang byung kho na nyid// sems nyid rang grol kho na nyid// dran pa rang
stong kho na nyid// nang gi 'gyur ba dwangs sangs grol// phyi yi dngos po bden med grol// lus ni longs sku'i mkha' 'gror grol// ngag ni sprul sku'i mkha' 'gror grol// sems ni chos sku'i mkha' 'gror
grol// snying po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ 'char lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// kye ma mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i bdag/ phyi nang bsdu ba bstan du gsol// mkha' 'gro ma yis bka' stsal
pa// rang lus rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor la// gzhal yas khang du bstan pa yin// dkyil 'khor lha rnams rang la 'dug/ sha dang rus pa sa'i dkyil 'khor// khrag dang chu ser chu'i dkyil 'khor// drod kyi rang

bzhin me'i dkyil 'khor// dbugs kyi sdang 'jug rlung gi dkyil 'khor// nang gi don snying lnga po ni// lha yi pho brang dam pa yin// mig dang rna ba sna dang lce// sgo bzhi dag gi bkod pa yin// kha dog lnga ru gsal
ba ni// pany+tsa re ga'i rtsig pa yin// sgal tshigs khyams su bcas pa la// rtsib ma gdung dang phyam du bkram// pags pa thog tu phub pa yin// tshogs drug 'dod yon lha rnams la// tshil bu rin chen
pha gu yin// ba spu dra ba dra phyed de// yan lag rta babs rang bzhin no// sor mo rnams kyi lcags ris bskor// de ltar dkyil 'khor yod pa la// rtogs tshogs lha yi rang bzhin bzhugs// gzhan yang gsang

ba'i rtsa rnams ni// las kyi mkha' 'gro gnas pa na// lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo na// rtsa 'dab drug cu rtsa bzhi na// mkha' 'gro drug cu rtsa bzhi gnas// snying kha rtsa 'das brgyad pa la// mkha' 'gro brgyad du gnas
pa yin// mgrin pa rtsa 'dab bcu drug la// mkha' 'gro ma yang bcu drug gnas// klad pa bde chen 'khor lo la// rtsa 'dab sum cu rtsa gnyis na// mkha' 'gro sum cu so gnyis gnas// phyag mtshan bum pa
bsnams pa ste// kha dog dmar ser sna tshogs ldan// lha 'khor rigs mthun lha tshogs ni// dpa' bo dpa' mo 'jigs pa'i tshogs// sgeg po sgeg mo mdzes pa'i tshogs// khro bo khro mo grams med

bzhugs// phung po khams dang skye mched dang// rnam shes tshogs brgyad la sogs kun// ye gsal ye shes chen po yis// dam rdzas rang chas yod pa yin// bsgul bskyod byas pa phyag rgya che// phyi ru mi mchod nang

du mchod// snying po hUM du di ri ri// rlung sems hUM du hri li li// 'od gsal stong pa lam du slong// snying po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ phyi nang du bsdu ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// kye ma mkha' 'gro gsang
ba'i bdag/ tshogs mchod dbang bskur bstan du gsol// mkha' 'gro ma yis bka' stsal pa// mtshon pa tsam du dam bris la// bum pa rdzas dang ldan pa dang// mchod rdzas rnams ni legs par
bshams// mchod rdzas byin gyis brlabs nas ni// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro dang// phyi nang bde bar gshegs pa rnams// spyan drangs bzhengs bskul bzhugs gsol nas// yan lag bdun gyi mchod pa
'bul// bum pa byin gyis brlabs nas ni// bum ba bla mas blangs pa de// spyi gtsug la sogs sgo bzhir bzhag/ a b+hi Shany+tsa'i sngags brjod la// dbang bzhi legs par bskur ba dang// tshogs kyi yo byad
btegs nas ni// thod pa mtshan ldan dpa' dang bcas// 'dod yon lha mor byin brlabs te// tshogs 'khor bskor la dbang bskur zhu// 'dod pa'i don 'grub gsol ba gdab// bla mas thod pa blangs nas

ni// rigs lnga yab yum snying po brjod// hUM ni rgyun chad med pa'i bar// badzra sid d+hi sid d+hi hUM/ b+hud d+ha sid d+hi sid d+hi hUM/ rat+na sid d+hi sid d+hi hUM/ pad+ma sid d+hi sid d+hi hUM/ karma sid d+hi sid d+hi hUM/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/
ban d+ha'i dbang bzhi bskur bar bya// gsang ba'i mchod pa phul nas ni// gsang ba'i dbang bzhi bskur bar bya// don gyi mchod pa phul nas ni// don gyi dbang bzhi bskur bar bya// shi ba'i ro la

dbang bskur bya// gnod pa'i lha 'dre dag la yang// snying rje yid kyis dbang bskur bya// ha ha he he tshar bcad btang// lte ba a a sgra ru btang// glu ru hUM nga hUM nga blang// hUM ring hUM thung 'gog pa dang// shib bu
rdo rje ting 'dzin bzlas// snying po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ tshogs mchod dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// kye ma mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i bdag/ phyi nang gsang ba bstan du gsol// mkha' 'gro ma

yis bka' stsal pa// phyi stong nang stong gsang pa stong// stong pa'i dbyings las yangs dog med// yangs dog med pa b+ha ga'i klong// stong gsal bde chen sangs rgyas yin// phyi gsal nang gsas gsang bar
gsal// gsal ba rang byung 'gag pa med// 'gag pa med pa nges med shugs// stong gsal bde chen sangs rgyas yin// phyi shes nang shes gsang ba shes// ye shes ma bcos btsal ba med// btsal ba med pa

'gyur med dang// stong pa ye shes sangs rgyas yin// phyi rig nang rig gsang ba rig/ rig pa rjen pa dri ma med// dri ma med pa zangs thal che// stong rig bde chen sangs rgyas yin// phyi bde nang bde zag med
bde// bde chen rgyun mi 'chad pa yin// ye shes gsal ba'i nyi ma shar// ma rig mun pa rang sar dag/ rang sems chos sku gtan la phebs// dug lnga dug gsum rtsa ba rul// sangs rgyas zhing du da ltar
bsleb// khams gsum 'khor ba'i g.yang sa chod// skye med dbyings su brtsa nas zin// mngal kha brgya yis thebs pa yin// snying po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ phyi nang gsang ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga
pa'o//// de nas mkha' 'gro chen mo yis// mkha' 'gro rnams la rgyud gtad pa// rgyud kyi rgyal po lung gi 'grel// man ngag kun gyi rtsa ba yin// theg pa yang rab bla na med// dngos grub thams cad
'byung ba'i gnas// mkha' 'gro rnams kyis 'di zung zhig/ zung la legs par bcang bar bya// nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed// de skad ces gsungs gtad rgya mdzad// 'khor rnams legs pa'i don mthong
nas// mkha' 'gro la lags btud de// e ma ho ste legs par gsungs// legs so legs so legs par gsungs// don gyi snying po rgyud kyi bcud// legs par gsungs pa yi rang ngo// mi 'gyur rtsal
la sogs pa dges// snying po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ yongs su gtad pa dang/ gtang rag gi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// rdo rje stong gsal gsang ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ mkha' 'gro mas gsungs pa
rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ dz+nya na DA ki ni tsit+ta sarba g+hu ya bin du na ma/ bod skad du/ ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi thugs gsang ba'i thigs pa zhes bya ba/
dpal ldan mkha' 'gro sde lnga la// rnam par btud de phyag 'tshal lo// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyis// ye shes rgya mtsho rab zab thugs// bsam gtan man ngag mdor bsdus don// gnas

lugs thabs dang mngon gyur pa'o// gnas lugs byang chub snying po ste// rgyu rkyen bral ba'i byang chub sems// snang med stong mthar mi gnas pa'o// thig le chen po yi sangs rgyas// thabs ni lam yin rnam

gsum ste// thag chod nyams med spyod rigs kyis// dmigs med kun 'byung de bzhin nyid// shes thob byed pas thabs lam bya'o// lta ba'i ngo bo mtshan nyid dang// lta bzhi rnam grangs rtogs tshul dang// yon

tan rnam pa drug shes bya// ngo bo cir yang mi dmigs pa'i// mthar 'dzin rtog pa kun grol ba'o// mtshan nyid chos rnams thams cad kyis// spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid rnams// ma 'dres yongs rdzogs rtogs pa

dang// ma 'dres yongs rdzogs dbyer med do// lta gzhi snying po byang chub dang// de las byung ba'i chos rnams te// rnam grangs brdal ba chen po dang// gsang dbang chen po'i lta ba dang// mkha' klong rnam par
dag pa'o// rtogs tshul brdal ba chen po yis// rang las ma g.yos ye shes rtogs// gsum pa ma skyes ma 'gags dang// gnyis med yul bral ye shes gsal// gsum pa mkha' klong rnam dag pa'i// thig le
chen po chos skur bshad// mkha' ltar dag pa'i sems nyid la// phyi nang gsang ba yang gsang dang// 'du 'phro la sogs mi dmigs pas// ngo bo ma skyais stong pa'i mkha'// byang chub sems kyi thig le
las// rol pa'i phyag rgya kun shar pas// stsal snang ma 'gags ye shes klong// yid bzhin nor bu 'od 'bar bzhin// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni// ma skyes ma 'gag ro gcig pas// dbyer med gter
chen po nyid do// ji ltar sprul mdud grol ba bzhin// stong mthar mi gnas cir yang gsal// gsal ba nyid na ma skyes stong// gsal stong dbyer med spyod yul bral// yon tan skyes pa gnyid sad ltar// sdug

bsngal ma spangs bde chen dang// 'khor ba ma spangs ye sangs rgyas// ting 'dzin sngon 'gro bslab thabs dang// brten par bya dang bogs dbyung dang// thob pa'i rtags dang gsal ba'i tshad// bcos thabs yon

tan brgyad shes bya// sngon 'gro byang chub sems bskyed do// ston pa chu bo bzhi ldan pas// rgyud bkrol ba dang dbang thob nas// bar chad med pa'i gnas mchog tu// cha rkyen rnam gnyis 'tshogs pa dang// rdo rje
go cha bgos par bya'o// bslab pa'i thabs la rnam bzhi ste// thob par bya dang mtshan nyid dang// rang bzhin thun gyi 'phel 'grib bo// thob pa'i man ngag ni// dpe dang bskyed rim thog babs
dang// log gnon stobs kyis thob par 'gyur// dpe las thob 'dod rnal 'byor pas// ran byas byi dor ldan pa'i sa// bsam gtan khang pa yid 'ong bar// bde ba'i stan la chos bdun tshul// ston pa man

ngag gsum ldan pas// mtshan ldan 'od dang gzugs sku zhig/ rnal 'byaur de la rdzogs par sbyin// snang dang mi snang thabs kyi bslab// rlung sems gcig tu dril byas la// snang ba thams cad phyag rgya ste// phyag

rgya thabs dang gsal brtan nas// mi snang tshe na'ang thob par bya// de nyid gsal rdzogs gom brten nas// lus la gzud pa'i sbyor ba yang// bde chen gnas su spyan drangs la// thig le chen por bzhu brtul

bya// thig les 'khor lo drug rgyas pa// rkyen gyi stobs kyis lhar gsal phyir// bdag nyid phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor du// yongs su rdzogs pas bde ba che// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor ni// rtsa ba'i yi ge hUM muM

dang// ha he ma byo phaT rims las// dpal chen yum drug rje mo dang// sman mo lnga bcu rtsa drug gis// ting 'dzin sngags kyi skur gsal ba// rlung sems 'dres pa'i skyes bu yis// ma yengs rgyun du gnas par

gyis// thog babs lung bstan rnal 'byor pas// stong nyid sngags kyis lus sbyangs la// sems kyi ye shes chen po nyid// ma bskyed rdzogs pa'i phyag rgyar bsgom// log non snang med g.yung drung du// sems kyi
'du 'phro kun spangs te// rig pa stong nyid lcags su bzhug/ gti mug gnyid kyis tshims par byos// lnga bdun ngag gis rtags rdzogs nas// gsal la dben pa'i sa phyogs su// rten gyi rnal 'byor sgor

zhugs nas// ye shes chen po'i phyag rgyar gsal// mtshan nyid don dang rtag ldan pas// tshad dang sku mdog bzhugs thabs dang// phyag mtshan rgyan sogs ye shes sku// chags tshad skabs kyi bye brag gis// khru

brgyad bzhi dang gnyis pa dang// mchod bzhi gang dang phyed ma las// che dang chung bar ma bshad do// sku mdog gtso 'khor khyad par gyis// gtso gzungs ye shes rnam lnga'i phyir// mthing ka'i khyad par rnam lnga
la// 'khor rnams rigs kyi bye brag gis// mthing kha dkar ser dmar ljang sogs// mkha' la 'ja' snang ji bzhin du// shin tu gsal la ma 'dres pa'o// bzhugs thabs zhi dang khro bos te// skyil krung phyed

dang 'gying tshul gyis// gdul bya sems can thams cad la// rang gi ngo bos chos ston to// phyag mtshan ye shes rang snang bas// khro bo rdo rje dril bu dang// dril zhags ban d+ha la sogs te// zhi ba rnam thar sgo
gsum dang// thugs kyi dkyil du bka' rkan tshogs// gdul bya dbang po'i bye brag gis// gcig las gnyis su phye bar zad// rgyan yang rin chen dur khrod sogs// rang gi yon tan rgyas phyir

brgyan// 'od zer kun tu mtha' yas pas// thugs rje chen po'i sprul pa nyid// rang bzhin chu zla'i dkyil 'khor ltar// yod pa ma yin spyod yul bral// med pa ma yin phyag rgya'i sku// yod med dbu mar mi rtog

pa'i// lhun grub ye shes rang snang phyir// sems nyid ye shes sgyu ma'i sku// snang la rang bzhin med par ro// thun ni rnal 'byor gnyis dbang gis// gsar bu rnams kyis bslab pa ni// mtshan mo mi sgom bde

bar nos// nyin mo rtsol dang mi rtsol ba'i// thun chung brgyad gnyis bcu drug tu// phyi nang gsang ba'i thun tshod kyis// shes par byas la thun tu gzhug/ de la brtan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// 'bris yang chen por

dril byos la// rang gsal rtog med ye shes sku// thun bzhi'i rnal 'byor brten par bya// rnying pa rnams kyi nyams len tshe// mtshan mo yang ni bsgom par bya// nyin mo bzhi dang mtshan mo bzhi// bsam gtan

brgyad pa'i rnal 'byor bsgom// de nas nyin zhag phrugs gcig la// thun 'bring gnyis gnyis bsgoms pa yin// thun bzhi sgom pa'i rnal 'byor te// cung zad yengs kyang ye shes sku// de nas rnal 'byor chen po

ste// nyin kyang nus la mtshan kyang nus// nyin mtshan gcig tu dril nus pas// rnam par smin ces de la brjod// phyi nang gsang ba'i rtags gsum ni// yi ge thug mtshan phra mo yis// nam mkha'i khams kun gang

ba dang// gzungs su 'ja' dang 'od 'byung dang// gti mug med dang bde yang ldan// rang lus rgyal pa'i phyag rgya che// dbugs kyi rgyu ba mi tshor zhing// snying rje che dang chags pa chung// chos kyi sgo mo nang nas
'char// spyod yul ye shes sgyu mar gsal// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyis mchod byed cing// nyams pa re dogs med par 'byung// bsam gtan sbyor dngos rjes gsum

las// gsal ba'i tshad ni 'byung ba ste// dang po ma bu'i 'du shes bzin// mi ngal ba yi sems kyis ni// snang stong dbyer med ye shes sku// bde gsal ngang la gnas pa'i rkyen// bde ba bum gzugs til sgron
bzhin// sems nyid ye shes sgyu ma'i sku// rigs dang sku mdog phyag mtshan sogs// shin tu gsal la mi rtog pa'o// tham bcud la na bu 'phang ltar// gnas pas mi ngoms gtang bar dka'// dmigs pa dag

gi rjes la ni// mi dmigs chos nyid shugs las 'char// yongs su brtan pa'i cho ga ni// rang bzhin mtshan nyid chog shes dang// stong rims rje shes rnam lnga ste// rang bzhin dmigs med de bzhin nyid// chu
zla'i dkyil 'khor ji bzhin du// shin tu gsal la mi rtog pa// thog ma nyid nas gnas pa yin// mtshan nyid dkyil 'khor rang snang ba// dngul dkar me long bzhin ltar snang// gsal la

rdzogs par bsgom bya ste// phyal ba rab 'bring thun rkyang spang// chog shes ye shes sgyu ma'i sku// gsal ba'i che na thun bskyungs te// khams sogs nus pa mdzad pa'i rgyu// thun ches pa dang grags pa spangs// stong
rims mkha' sprin mkhar dengs bzhin// rims kyis gtang bar bya ba las// mi rtogs ye shes 'gag pa'i rgyu// skad cig drag pos ma gtong ngo// rjes shes thun tshad gcig dag tu// dmigs pa kun gyi gzhir

gyur pa'i// gnyis med ngang la blo bzhag la// spyod yul kun dang bsre par bya// bogs 'byung phyi nang gsang ba yi// rig pa'i rtsal sbyong rnam gsum gyis// rang snang dbyer med rdo rje'i sku// ngo bo nyid kyis rgyas

par 'gyur// dang po gdeng ldan rnal 'byor pas// mnyam pa'i ngang la bzhengs nas ni// snyan pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa yis// bskyed dang spyan drang mchod rim sogs// chu zla lta bur shes pas ni// de bzhin
nyid las mi byed pa'i// lha tshogs sgom pa'i grogs su 'gyur// de nas rnal 'byor chen po yis// lus ngag bya ba kun spangs te// dmigs pa med pa'i ngang nyid las// mi gsung mnyam pa'i sngags tshig
gis// rigs kyis yang na cig car du// dpal ldan mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams la// ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam dag gis// mnyes par bya zhing 'du 'phro bskul// sems kyi cho 'phrul rang snang ba'i// rang bzhin
dkyil 'khor bsgom bya ste// brjod du med pa'i 'phrin las dang// mnyam pa chen po'i dam tshig gis// bsam gtan yongs su 'phel ba zhes// yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bshad// rnal 'byor bla na med

pa yis// lha bdag gnyis su dbyer med ba'i// ye shes chen po'i phyag rgya la// dri ma med pa'i blo gzhag ste// 'du 'phro med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// ngang la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ni// rgyal ba rnams kyi sku
gsung thugs// phyogs dus kun las 'khyil ba'i dpal// bcos thabs spyi dang khyad par las// spyi skyon bying rgod ldengs gsum ni// zas dang spyod lam dus tshod dang// khams dang ting 'dzin 'phel 'grib
kyis// gnas skabs kun tu gang babs pa'i// skyon deng yongs su spang bar bya// khyad par dmigs pa 'byams pa dang// ma thob pa dang 'gyur bas te// mtshan nyid ldan pa'i gzugs sku la// ma yengs pa yi
bsam gtan gyis// so so'i skabs dang sbyor shes pas// de dag kun las grol bar 'gyur// phan yon rnam pa gnyis bshad de// sgrib pa byang dang tshogs rdzogs pa'o// mkha' ltar dag pa'i sems nyid
la// 'ja' ltar gsal ba'i lha bsgoms pas// kun rtags 'khrul snang dag pa'i phyir// 'das pa'i sa la phyir sgrib cing/ kha cig mtho ris tsam 'gog pa'i// nyi shu rtsa gcig sgrib byang

nas// sgyu spyod bsod nams tshogs chen sku// lha yi ting 'dzin gsal rdzogs te// lus kyi rgya mdud grol ma thag/ ye shes sku yi phyag rgyar gsal// phyag rgya nyid ni rang snang ste// rang snang spyod yul bral ba

dang// rgyu 'bras dbyer med rtogs goms pas// sangs rgyas sa la sgribs byed pa'i// shes dang lta sgrib phra ba dang// phra ba'i phra ba'ang dag gyur nas// 'bras bu ye shes tshogs kyi sku// rang lus rgyal ba'i phyag
rgyar gsal// mtshan dang dpe byad ma 'dres rdzogs// sangs rgyas kun dang cung zad mnyam// spyod pa'i nges tshig rnam grangs dang// spyad pa'i thabs dang nyes dmigs dang// phan yon rnam pa lngar shes

bya// nges tshig longs spyod 'gro 'dug tshe// thag gcod pa dang nyams len gyis// shugs las byung dang mgo mtshungs par// mi 'bras spyod pas spyod shes bya// rnam grangs thabs lam grol lam gyis// phye bas

gnas skabs gnyis su gyur// spyad thabs dang po thabs lam ni// skye shi med pa'i stan dang// 'ching grol med pa'i 'ga' na la// gdengs ldan skyes bu chen po yis// grol lam phyi nang gsang ba yi// kun spyod
yon tan rnam lngar yang// ma 'gag pa dang gsal ba'i phyir// spyad par bya ba'i longs spyod des// chos kyi dbyings kyi rol pa las// ma 'dres gsal bar longs spyod che// rang bzhin med dang ma skyes

pas// chags par byed pa gnas ma yin// thig le chen po'i rang bzhin la// ma skyes ma 'gags dbyer med dang// gsal dang stong par mi dmigs pas// spyod bya spyod byed tha dad min// rang rgyud spyod lam ma
grol bar// thar pa chen por dam bcas kyang// brkam chags lnga yi me dpung gis// byang chub myu gu bsreg par 'gyur// de las grol ba'i yon tan ni// nyon mongs sdig pas ma gos pas// thabs dang tshad

dang dgos ched do// thabs kyi rlung gi 'khor lo nas// rdo rje kha tong gzhu bdungs te// shes rab ye shes med 'u las// spros pa'i thig le dgu rnams 'phangs// chags tshad thun dang bstan pa'o// thun ni rab
'bring tha ma ste// drug dang bzhi dang gnyis par bsgom// brtan pa las dang ye shes kyis// gtum mo lus la 'bar ba'o// dgos ched dpal ldan rigs lnga yi// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor
du// gdod ma nyid nas gnas pa'i don// rang la 'bar bar byed pa'o// rjes shes thun tshod gcig dag tu// bde ba gsal ba mi rtog pa'i// ngang la mnyam par gzhag nas ni// spyod yul kun dang bsre bar
bya// mngon du gyur pa'i 'bras bu ni// bdag dang gzhan don grub pas te// nges pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs// yon tan 'phrin las rnam pa lnga// byang chub sems kyi bde klong du// gcig tu

'khyil ba bdag gi don// he ru ka yi thugs las ni// sprul pa'i yi ge hUM du shar// hUM gis 'gro ba sems can gyi// bag chags sbyong ba gzhan gyi don// mkha' 'gro ma tshogs thams cad kyis// rgyud chen rgya mtsho
mtha' yas pa'i// dgongs pa kun 'dus gsang ba'i bcud// byang chub sems kyi gter du sbas// dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal du/ o rgyan gyi mkhan po pad+ma 'byung gnas la/ ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma
rnams kyis dngos su lung bstan pa'i dgongs nyan sa rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che nyid do// bsam gtan sgron ma zhes bya ba rdzogs so////

rgya gar skad du/ bod+hi tsit+ta badzra sa ma ti na ma/ bod skad du/ byang chub kyi sems rdo rje lta bu'i bsam gtan ces bya ba/ kun bzang he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// chos rnams ma lus 'byung ba'i gzhi// thig le

chen po'i rang bzhin ni// rdo rje snying po rang 'khrungs dpal// snang dang brjod pa'i mtha' las grol// rgyal ba'i dgongs pa 'byung ba'i gnas// rnal 'byor gsum gyi me long du// spros bral sems kyi ngo bo

nyid// dbyer med nyid bzhi ngo sprad pas// ngo bo nyid de mthong gyur nas// rtog bcas yul las grol ba dang// mi rtog ye shes shar ba'i phyir// bde ba chen bo'i rtags gsum 'char// 'du 'phrod dbyings su

dag pa dang// rig pa ye shes yul med pas// chos nyid ma dang phrad pa'i phyir// dgongs pa kun gyi mchog ces bya// dbyings kyi mkha' 'gro rnam lnga yis// dgongs pa'i ngang las rig pa ni// gzi ldan 'bar

ba'i snying po bzhin// de nyid ma bcos ngang la zhog/ rigs dang sku mdog phyag mtshan dang// yi ge snying po 'phro 'du yang// ma bkag dbyings su grol ba'i phyir// kun tu bzang po nyid du zung// dbyings kyi snying

po ye shes nyid// sems kyi dkyil 'khor dngas pa la// ye shes lnga ru shar ba'i phyir// kun tu bzang po nyid du zung// bde gsal dbyings dang ye shes kyis// ngang las ma spangs rtog pa yi// mthu dang bral
ba'i ngo bo la// bde ba chen po nyid du zung// bying na ye shes 'char sgo lta// rgod pa dbyings kyi ngang la zhog/ bying rgod med par snyoms pa na// dbang po mi bsdam yan du dgyer// sku dang gsung

dang thugs yon tan// 'phrin las nyi shu rtsa lnga yang// ngo bo nyid du gcig ba'i phy-ir// 'bras bu mngon du gyur ba'i mchog/ blang dor bral ba'i snying po la// mtsho dang 'o ma'i dpe bzhin tu// dri ma med pa'i ye shes
kyis// ma nor snying po dmigs nas zung// chos dbyings ye shes mkha' 'gro yi// bsam gtan man ngag mdor bsdus 'di// skal ldan rigs kyi bu mchog dang// mtha' yas sems can 'dren par
shog/ rgyud lung le'u gnyis pa'i gdams// u rgyan gyi mkhan po pad+ma saM b+ha ba'i thugs dam rdzogs so//// dge'o////
rgya gar skad du/ sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta/ bod skad du/ thams cad bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bshad pa'i dus gcig ste/ bcom
ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor na// shin tu rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs// skal ldan rnams dang thabs gcig ste// mdo sde'i byang chub sems dpa' dang// dgra bcom nyan thos rang rgyal

dang// theg dman ming yang med nang du// gsang sngags gsang ba'i snying po 'di// bdud rtsi mchog gi lta ba dang// spyod pa bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// bsam gyis mi khyab bstan pa dang// brgyad khri bzhi stong
rnam grangs kyang// theg pa'i sgo ni gsum du gsungs// gsang nyid thig par bsdus dang bzhi// ldem por dgongs pa'i mdo don yang// kri ya'i don te sangs rgyas yin// rna brgyud ston pas thugs brtol

to// nges pa'i lung yang sangs rgyas la// sangs rgyas mnyam dang dbyings su 'gro// byang chub sems de kun tu dag/ rdzogs pa'i ye shes de bzhin nyid// ma rtog sbyong ba'i yul ma yin// ma lus mtha' dag nyid

kyi rgya// ye nas bya med bya mi dgos// rgyu dang 'bras bu 'khrul ba'i sgra// byang chub nyid de ltung gnas med// b+ha ga ji bzhin bde bar gnas// rgyud dang lung dang man ngag dang// dmangs dang rje dang rgyal po'i
tshul// khrud par rtsal 'phang thag ring yang// gcig la gcig brten gcig gi ngang// gcig ste rnam pa yongs kyis med// de bas sku gsung thugs kyi bdag/ sku dang brgyan dang 'khor lo
yang// lung chen zab mo'i nang nas gsal// lnga bzhin nang du 'khor ba yang// ye nas sangs rgyas bde chen nyid// lta ba 'di la gnas pa'i// rnal 'byor 'di ni skal ba bzang// ci spyad bsgoms shing ci
bsgrubs kyang// bdud rtsi nyid de sman gyi mchog/ bde gshegs kun gyi thugs dam nyid// byin brlabs ngo mtshar rgya cher 'byung// rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams kyi gsos// sangs rgyas de bzhin nyid las
'byung// mtha' yas sems can don gyi phyir// rang la mchod cing rang gis bza'// bsgrub pa po ni nan tan bya// bcom ldan 'das dang gnyis med phyir// las 'di lung gis bsgrub byas na// mi spang ba dang

dang du len// spyad pa'i dam tshig bco lnga bsdu// de yang ma hA sa ma ya// bzhi pa rdzogs nas kun tu bzang// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang// gnan bzlog drug ni gcig tu'o// sta na g+ha na'i lung bshad

de// bcom ldan 'das ni nyid kyi bka'// lha yi bdud dang phung po'i bdud// nyon mongs bdud dang 'chi bdag bcom// phyag rgya chen po bzhi dang ldan// byang chub 'khor ba mya ngan 'das// sangs rgyas sems
can thams cad dang// mtshan mar brtags pa thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid las gzhan ma yin// de bzhin nyid las gzhan pa'i chos// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi mkhyen no// phyi nang ma lus snod bcud
kyang// yab yum bde ba'i ngang du gsal// 'di ni snying po byang chub lung// yang dag ma rig 'khyam 'gyur ba// khams gsum thams cad bsgral ba'i zhing// ma skyes bas na 'jig pa med// bdag dang gnyis

med mnyam pa'i// thugs rje chen po cir mi mdzad// yang dag nyid la yang dag sgrol// yang dag bsgral na bde ba thob// stong gsum ma lus bskyab pa bas// skyes bu chen po rnal 'byor gyis// bsgral ba 'ba'

zhig snying rje'i mchog/ mi ldog dbyings su yang dag nyid// thig le chen pos dbang bskur te// zla gsang dbus na byang chub sems// rdzogs sangs rgyas la som nyi med// rnam dag dri chen snang ba'i mchog/ mi

bskyod byang chub sems nyid de// rin chen mang ba 'byung ldan gtso// snang ba mtha' yas rak+ta'i thugs// don yod dri chu las grub pas// thams cad ma lus sangs rgyas lnga// lus pa med pas ye shes dang// ma

bcos ye nas 'di nyid do// de phyir sman chen dngos grub mchog/ bdud rtsi zhes ni 'di la bya// rtog pa'i klong du su 'dris pa// mi zhes mi bya sangs rgyas yin// bcom ldan 'das ni gud na med// rigs lnga bde
bar gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo// byin brlabs mtshams bcad bstan par bya// yid 'ong gnas su 'dug nas ni// bya ba med pa'i las 'di bsgrub// maN+Dal brgyad pa gzhung bzhin
du// dpal dang ldan pa'i snod bzhag ste// stong las 'byor bas ye nas dag/ bcal dang btsag dang btag pa yis// nyi zla gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor du// 'bru lnga ye shes 'phro 'du las// stong khams khyab par
don byas te// bcud kyi dam pa kun bsdus nas// dus gsum sangs rgyas mchod pa'i phyir// mu tig dkar po dri med ltar// bsgrub pa pos ni nan tan bya// gu h+ya lag pa'i phyag rgya yis// gzhung bzhin bstan
nas 'phro 'du bya// de dbus klu bdag sa bon gyis// dngos grub dam pa blang bar bya// dgu pa'i sngags kyis btab nas ni// le lo med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis// bar chad med pa'i 'phro 'du bya// gsal ba

'byung 'jug lhan ne seng// rtags dang mtshan ma bdun gyis 'byung// 'od dang du ba dri dang sgra// lha mo'i gzugs kyang ston par 'gyur// mang du 'phel na grub rdzas yin// de la ya mtshan bskyed mi bya// mtshan

ma 'di dag ma byung na// bskang gso'i cho ga rgya cher bya// spogs thabs bskyar zhing rtsal shugs dbyung// rdzas rnams kyang ni gsar bar bya// de nas mchod cing dngos grub blang// slob ma la yang dbang bskur

ro// tshe dang bskong dang yid du 'ong// nad med bran dang ci 'dod pa'i// bgegs rnams zhi ba la sogs pa'i// yon tan rtsa brgyad 'di yis 'thob// snying po tshim byed bcud kyi mchog/ gtso bo lnga dang 'bras bu

lnga// 'di dag rab tu bskyab pa'i phyir// dri zhim bcud ldan thams cad kun// mang po 'dus pa mthu byin che// yangs shing rgyud la goms pa dang// slob ma dpa' brtul gtsang sbra can// zla gsang dkar dmar

rlung kar lci// nyungs yang pany+tsa yan chad kyis// mi phyed pas ni bdud gnas pa'o// thugs kyi dngos grub dam pa 'di// re ba med pas grub pa blangs// 'di tshe 'bru ni brtag par bya// ma dag pa ni mtshams
gcad do// las kyi gtsor ni bskang ba dang// dbyangs dang bstod dang mchod pa yi// nan tan gyis ni brtson 'grus bya// the tshom med na nges par 'grub// ces bka' stsal nas shin tu rnal 'byor gyis dbang
phyug kun yi rangs te// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// e ma gsang ba las byung ba/ byang chub bde chen nyid la rdzogs// ma rig mun sel ye shes sgron// dpa' bo khyod la skyabs
su mchi// bdud rtsi mchog gi lung rdzogs so////
de nas rdo rje kun tu bzang po sku kun tu 'gyur ba'i rgyal po des/ nyid kyi 'khor de rnams skyes ba med cing rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba/ bdud rtsi chen po thob par bya ba'i phyir/ nyid mi
snang bar byas te/ nam mkha' sgra sgrogs pa'i gsung/ a A zhes pa'i sgra byung bas/ 'khor gyi chos thams cad skye ba med par rig go/ e e zhes pa'i sgra byung bas chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar gsal

lo// o o zhes pa'i sgra byung bas/ chos thams cad skye ba'i cho 'phrul 'byung bar gsal lo// oM oM zhes pa'i sgra byung bas/ rdo rje kun tu bzang po nyid kyi sku/ che mchog yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku/ rigs lnga dang/

yum khro mo gnam zhal dang/ khro bo chen po bcu dang/ 'jigs byed dang/ 'phra men dang/ khro mo brgyad dang/ 'phra men brgyad dang/ sgo ma bzhi dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs rdzogs pa'i gsal lo// de nas rdo

rje kun tu bzang po des/ dang po snod bcud kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa 'di gsungs so// e yaM khaM su bruM/ zhes dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par bskyed/ de nas bdud rtsi char phab nas// thams

cad rgyas shing smin par byas// thams cad rang byung bdud rtsir smin// de nas snod bcud bsdu ba'i phyir// shun chen gnas gzhi gdan stengs su// ban d+ha mtshan ldan rnam lnga la// dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i 'phro 'du
yis// rigs chen lnga'i 'phro 'du yis// snod bcud thams cad de ru bsdu// snod bcud bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// snod der gsol ba'i sman rnams ni// 'byung ba lnga las skyes pa yi// stong rtsa brgyad dam

grangs med pa'i// la la'i dug kyang la la'i sman// mtha' yang brjod kyis mi lang bsog/ med du mi rung brgya rtsa brgyad// de yang gang dang gang zhe na// rtsa ba brgyad dang 'bras bu lnga// sha lnga dbang po lnga yi

gzugs// de 'phrad shing thog rnams pa lnga// dri sna lnga dang dri rgyal lnga// de bzhin spos chen rnam lnga dang// chu lnga dang ni rus pa lnga// sna lnga dang ni lce lnga dang// rna ba lnga yang med mi rung// de bzhin mig lnga lag pa

lnga// tsha lnga dag kyang rab tu sbyar// rtsit+ta lnga dang klad pa lnga// me tog rnam pa lnga rnams sbyar// rin po che ni rnam pa lnga// dam rdzas lnga'i 'phrad sbyor bas// de rnams me du mi rung ngo// de la rtsa ba brgyad rnams

ni// mgo tsi hA dang leng leng hA// g+hi hang chung ji b+hang ras yan// ga bur mu tig lan tshwa rnams// de la rtsa ba brgyad ces bya'o// nang gi 'bras bu rnam lnga ni// a 'bras rgun 'brum pa na se// ger ya a ru ka dang

lnga'o// seng ge glang chen rta chog sha// rma bya sha dang shang shang sha'o// dbang po lnga'i gzugs lnga ni// mig dang rna ba sna dang lce// gtso bo tsit+ta nyid dang lnga'o// de 'phrad shing thog rnam lnga ni// rgun 'brum dang ni ka ko

la// a 'bras pa se bum sha lnga'o// dri ni chen po sna lnga ni// na ga ge sar shing tsha dang// sug smel g+haM ta pa tra dang// kun du ra dang rnam pa lnga'o// dri bo rgyal po rnam lnga ni// rgya spos 'dza' ti pa la

dang/ ga pur tsan dan li shi lnga'o/ de bzhin spos chen rnam lnga ni// a ka ru dang du ru ka/ pog dang sbrang rtsi lce pog lnga'o// de bzhin chu lnga bstan pa ni// rgya mtsho lbu ba gangs kyi chu// sna tshogs lan tshwa dri chu

dang// bsgral ba'i chu ni rnam pa lnga'o// sra byed rus pa rnam lnga ni// dung dang 'brug rus gdung dang ni// bsgral dang ma bsgral rus pa lnga// sna ni rnam pa lnga rnams ni// rigs las phye ba'i sna lnga'o// lce lnga dag

kyang de bzhin te// de 'phrad me tog kha dog lnga'o// mig lnga sna lnga lag pa lnga'o// rigs lnga gdan khri dag las brtsal// tsha lnga dag kyang sbyar ba bya// klad pa lnga dang tsit+ta lnga// de yang rigs kyi gdan las

btsal// rin po che ni rnam pa lnga// de yang kha dog nges par spyad// de rnams med du mi rung ste// med mi rung gi gtan tshigs ni// grub pa'i rtags kyi dngos grub 'thob// mig dang rna ba sna dang lce// dbang
po tsit+ta rnam lnga yis// mngon shes rnam lnga 'thob pa dang/ dngos po thams cad 'thob pa ni// gzugs sgra dri ro reg la sogs// 'dod yon lnga'i dngos grub 'thob// chu lngas bdud rtsi'i dngos grub

thob// rus pas las kyi dngos grub thob// sna lnga tshangs pa'i gsungs yang 'thob// lce yis gsung gi dngos grub thob// klad pas mdangs kyi dngos grub thob// snying lngas mngon shes lnga yang 'thob// lag

pas phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob// gcig gis chos kyi sku thob la// gnyis thob thabs dang shes rab thob// gsum 'thob rdo rje sku gsum thob// gzhi thob phyag rgya bzhi thob la// lnga yis sku lnga ye shes lnga// de la
sogs te bsam mi khyab// de ni mdo tsam bstan pa yin// rdo rje gsang ba las kyi rgyud las/ med du mi rung brtag pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas dbye zhing dgod pa'i rim pa 'di gsungs so// rigs dang

kha dog dri dang ro// mthun pa bzhi yis dgod par bya// de yang ji ltar dbye zhe na// de la rigs kyi dgod pa ni// dam rdzas lnga ni rim gyis dgod// dbus su byang chub sems chen la// shar du rdo rje dri

chen no// lho ru maM sa sha chen la// nub tu pad ma rag ta dgod// byang du rdo rje dri chu dgod// yang na kha dog lngas dgod de// dbus su ser la shar la shar du dkar// lho ru sngo la nub tu dmar// byang du

ljang ste kha dog mthun// yang na dri zhim 'dod chags pad ma'i rigs// mi zhim zhe sdang rdo rje'i rigs// gnyis ka ma yin gti mug pas// de bzhin rigs su dgod par bya// ngab pa'i dri ni byang du la// bsung
ba'i dri ni lho ru dgod// yang na ro yis dgod par bya/ kha ba dang ni mngar ba dang/ kha tsha ro med rnam pa lnga/ kha ba rdo rje rigs su dgod// mngar ba pad ma'i rigs su dgod// tsha ba las kyi
rigs su dgod// ro med de bzhin rigs su dgod// skyur ba rin chen rigs su dgod// dgod pa de yi snod rnams ni// dbus su ban da sul med la// shar du sul bu 'greng ba bzhag/ lho ru ban d+ha sul

mangs la// nub tu ban da zla kham gzhag/ byang du rdo rje rgya gram ste// shong bu bzhi pa gzhag par bya// yab yum snying po rim bzhin sbyar// rnam gcig mi dbye gsog pa ni// zhing chen g.yang gzhi ma nyams

pa'i// dkyil du dpa' bo 'bru lnga bri// de steng snod bcud spung pa ni// dpa' bo 'bru lnga sku bskyed la// sku lnga'i 'phro 'du byas pa ni// rgyud lnga'i gnas dag sbyangs pa ni// de nyid rigs lngas sbyangs pa yin// rgyal
ba rigs lnga de nyid la// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro// reg la sogs pa'i sems dpas bskor// phyag rgya chen po bzhir bzhir ldan// de yis spro dang bsdu byas nas// dam pa rigs brgyas sbyangs pa
yin// rigs lnga rigs brgyas sbyangs pa yis// snang srid snod bcud thams cad kun// rgyal ba rig chen lnga rnams dang// gzugs sgra dri ro reg sogs kyi// sems dpa' bcu drug sgo ba bzhi// sangs rgyas rdo

rje dbyings su rgyas// ma skyes rdo rje dbyings su rgyas// zhes rdo rje gsang ba las kyi rgyud las// sman dbye gsog bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas rdo rje kun bzang che mchog des/ yongs su rdzogs pa'i
skur bzhes pa 'di gsungs so// nga yis sku ni yongs su rdzogs// nga yi zhabs kyi sprul pa las// khro bo chen po bcu sprul nas// phyogs bcu 'jig rten dbang bsdus nas// bgegs rgyal gnon pa'i sprul pa

yin// nga yi sku gdung 'bar ba las// rigs lnga rtsa ba 'dzin sprul nas/ khamasagasum rgyud drug dab nga bsdus nas// rgyud lnga sbyong ba'i sprul pa yin// nga yi thugs gsang dbyibs rum las// yum chen khro mo

gnam zhal sprul// snang srid snod bcud dbang bsdus nas// bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i yum chen 'tshal// nga yi sku ni rdzogs pa las// sangs rgyas thams cad rdzogs pa'i sku// dbu ni nyi shu rtsa gcig la// phyag ni bzhi

bcu rtsa gnyis te// zhabs ni rnam pa brgyad du ldan// sku gcig yongs su rdzogs pa la// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad tshang// de yang ji ltar dgongs pa mdzad// bdud rtsi sbyor ba'i sku ru rdzogs// de yang

ji ltar rdzogs she na// nga yi zhabs kyis sprul pa las/ khro bo chen po bcu phyung nas// sku mdog so sor rigs dang mthun// phyag rgya bzhi ldan 'phro 'du dang// gu h+ya rta mchog phyag rgya dang/ dgu pa 'dzab kyi 'phro
'du yis// phyogs bcu'i bgegs kyi rgyal btul nas// hU~M gis thugs ni gsang bar sdud// thugs ni gsang ba'i dbyings rum du// bdud rtsi byang chub sems su sbyor// nga yi sku gdung 'bar ba

las// rigs lnga rtsa ba 'dzin pa'i sku// sku mdog so so'i rigs dang 'thun// zhabs bcu khro bcu'i dbu dang sbyor// phyag rgya bzhi ldan 'phro 'du dang// gu h+ya rta mchog phyag rgya dang// dgu pa'i 'dzab kyi 'phro 'du

yis// rgyud lnga sdug bsngal gtan sbyangs nas// hUM gis thugs ni gsang bar sdud// thugs ni gsang ba'i dby-ings rum du// gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba yis// bdud rtsi byang chub sems su sbyor// nga yi thugs kyi

gsang ba las// yum chen khro mo gnam zhal ma// dbu dgu phya ni bco brgyad de// stong pa bco brgyad thabs kyi 'dren// sku mdog smug nag 'bar ba la// zhabs bzhi rigs bzhi dbu dang sbyor// phyag rgya bzhi
ldan 'phro 'du dang// gu h+ya rta mchog phyag rgya dang// dgu pa 'dzab kyi 'phro 'du yis// snang srid snod bcud thams cad kun// hUM gis thugs ni gsang ba'i dbyings rum du// gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba

yis// bdud rtsi byang chub sems su sbyor// rdo rje kun bzang nga sku las// che mchog yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku// dbu ni nyi shu rtsa gcig la// phyag ni bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis so// zhabs ni rnam pa brgyad du ldan// che

mchog yongs su rdzogs sku de// sku ni mthing nag 'bar ba la// zhi ba'i dbu la phyag rgyar ldan// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis nga yi phyag/ zhabs brgyad gnam zhal sbyor pa mdzad// phyag rgya bzhi dang 'phro 'du dang// gu h+ya
rta mchog phyag rgya dang// dgu pa 'dzab kyi 'phro 'du 'di// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ khams gsum sems can thams cad dang// snang srid snod bcud thams cad kun// hUM gis thugs ni gsang
bar sdud// thugs ni gsang ba'i dbyings rum du// gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba yis// bdud rtsi byang chub sems su sbyor// bdud rtsi byang chub sems de ni// mu tig dkar po dri med mdog/ dngos ni chos nyid

byang chub sems// rigs lnga ye shes lnga yi dngos// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs// zhes rdo rje gsang ba las kyi rgyud las// bdud rtsi che mchog gis dgongs pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas rdo

rje kun tu bzang po des/ che mchog sku dang dgongs pa bshad pa 'di gsungs so// che mchog yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku// mi 'dul ba yang ma mchis la// ma btul ba yang ma mchis so// ma grub pa yang ma mchis

so// de yang ji ltar gtul zhe na// sku gcig la ni sku bzhi rdzogs// zhabs ni khro bcu'i dkyil 'khor la// sku gdung 'bar ba'i sku lnga ni// rigs lnga he ru'i dkyil 'khor ro// thugs ni gsang ba'i dbyings rum
ni// yum chen khro mo gnam zhal te// snod bcud 'dzin pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// che mchog rdzogs pa'i sku de ni// zhi khro rdzogs pa'i skur bstan te// sangs rgyas thams cad rdzogs pa'i sku'o// mthing

nag chos nyid 'gyur ba med// smug nag drag po'i las kyang mdzad// kha dog rnam lnga yon tan rtags// dbu ni nyi shu rtsa gcig po// ye shes nyi shu rtsa gcig ste// sems dpa' bcu drug rgyal po lnga// kun tu

gsal bar byed pa'o// phyag ni bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ni// khro bo 'bar gtum phyag mtshan te// dang po gnyis kyi phyag mtshan ni// rang rtags rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// ma skyes rdo rje sgra yang sgrogs// g.yas kyi bar ma
bco brgyad na// kai ri brgyad dang 'jigs byed bcu// g.yon gyi bar ma bco brgyad na// sing ha brgyad dang mgyogs byed bcu'o// g.yas gnyis g.yon gnyis tha ma bzhi// sgo skyong mdong mo 'gugs 'ching

bzhi// zhi dang khro bor bcas pa yi// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sku la rdzogs// dbus kyi gtso bo rdo rje la// gsang ba'i khro bo bzhi yis bskor// spro dang bsdu dang 'gags dang 'joms// sangs rgyas kun kyang

rang re yi// dgongs pa'i 'phrin las rang re mdzad// sems dpa' brgyad gnyis bcu drug dang// rigs kyi gtso bo lnga rnams la// phyag rgya chen po bzhi bzhir ldan// dbus kyi gtso bo rdo rje la// gsang ba'i khro

bo bzhis bskor ba// phyag rgya bzhi bzhi lnga tshan lnga// dam pa rigs su bshad pa yin// che mchog sku la kun rdzogs pas// sangs rgyas thams cad sku la rdzogs// nyid las ma byung sangs rgyas med// ces
gsungs so// rdo rje gsang ba las kyi rgyud las/ thams cad dgongs pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas rdo rje kun tu bzang po des// lta spyod dam tshig 'di gsungs so// kye 'khor gyi drang srong sgrub
pa rnams// dang po lta ba 'di ltar ltos// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ khams gsum sems can thams cad dang// snang srid snod bcud thams cad kun// byang chub sems las byung bar

mnyam// ye nas bdud rtsi yin pa'i phyir// bdud rtsi nyid las gzhan med do// lnga bzhi drug tu snang ba yang// sangs rgyas sku dang ye shes yin// chos nyid dbyings na rang bzhin gnas// ye nas bde chen sangs

rgyas pas// bdud rtsi zhes ni de la bya// lta ba 'di la gang gnas pa// shin tu rnam 'byor skal ba bzang// zhes gsungs so// lta ba de la gnas nas ni// spyod pa'i dam tshig 'di ltar spyod// stong rtsa brgyad kyi

dam tshig ni// mi spang ba dang dang du blang// shes pa lnga dang spyad pa lngas// grub par bya ba'i thabs dag ni// mi 'dod kun kyang spong byed pa'i// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang// nga rgyal phrag don rnam pa

lnga// ye shes lnga yin spang mi bya// dri chen dri chu rag ta dang// maM sa byang chub sems lnga ni// rgyal ba'i sku lngar bsgyub pa'i phyir// mi dor dang du blang bar bya// phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga// rnam shes

dbang po yul dus rnams/ chos nyid dkyil 'khor ye yin pas// ma rmongs shes par bya ba yin// sta na dang ni 'ga' na dang// smad par bya ba'i rdzas lnga'o// ma byin blangs dang mi tshangs spyod// mi rtogs

sgrub pa'i thabs yin pas// dngos su spyod par bya ba yin// bsgrub par bya ba rnam lnga ni// stong rtsa brgyad du gsungs pa de// sku gsung thugs kyis gsungs pa ste// rnam gsum cho ga lnga po yi// bsnyen pa dang ni nye
bsnyen po// sgrub pa dang ni bsgrub chen pos// bzhi po rdzogs nas kun tu bzang// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang mngon spyod dang// mnan bzlog drug ni dus gcig ste// sta nas mnan la 'ga' nas
bzlog/ 'ga' nas bzlog pa'i thabs 'di gsungs// gzungs ma yon tan kun ldan de// byin gyibarlabs pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// dri zhim rnams kyis lus bskus la// gos bzang rgyan chas brgyan pa

ni// ji bzhin bde ba'i stan la bzhag/ de la bsnyen sgrub bzhi bkod la// b+ha ga de nyid byin brlabs la// gnyis med mnyam par sbyor ba yis// bdud ni rnam pa bzhi bcom ste// phyag rgya chen po bzhi dang
ldan// byang chub sems phebs 'phro ba'i tshe// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer des// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa yin// sangs rgyas mnyes nas 'od 'dus pas// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad
kyis// dkyil 'khor lha ni de ru gsal// bdud bcom rtog pa der bzlog go/ sta nas mnan pa'i lung bstan pa// ye nas rgyud dag chos nyid la// nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa yis// rgyud drug khams ni gsum du

'khor/ khams gsum de dag bsgral ba'i zhing/ raM yaM khaM tra tha phaT kyis de bsgral lo// mi g.yo phyag rgya chen po'i ngang// chos sku ngang las bzhengs nas ni/ khams gsum bsgral ba'i zhing gzigs nas// skye shi
mi gnas dur khrod kyi// rang bzhin yin par gzigs nas ni// thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// 'gro ba thams cad bsgral bar mdzad// bdud dang gshin rje zhing bcu kun// ma trang gnas kyi gzugs

byas la// oM sarba pa pha ka ra ke ha hi sa si staM// traM ka ru hUM dza dza/ ma traM rnam shes gzugs la phab// DA ki bdag ni nub tu bltas// gnas kyi sgo su yis bcad// sems kyi bdag pos bcad dam ci// gzung
'dzin rkang pa bsnol ba 'di// yul las 'das pas sgo phye zhig/ ces brjod la sgo dbye'o// ka ta ka ri/ ka ta ka na/ pra ta be sha/ DA ki chen po'i zhabs g.yon gyis// ru tra'i gzugs ni mnan pa
yis// lha chen brgyad kyis smras pa'i tshig/ gnas kyi sgo 'di bcad bzhin du// bde bar gshegs pas bskyab tu gsol// 'tsho ba'i bdag po tshe dang srog/ 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal 'dir byung ngo// DA

ki brgyad kyis bka' stsal pa// dregs pa ma rungs lha chen khyod// sems kyi sgo kun da phye zhig/ rdo rje 'bar ba'i spu gri yis// gnas kyi sgo kun des phye nas// sems kyi bdag po bzung bar bya// zhes gsungs

so// de nas rdo rje kun bzang gis// lha chen rnams la chos bshad pa// skyes pa rkyen gyis 'chi ba yin// sdig pa'i rkyen gyis bcom pas 'chi// nga yi bstan pa 'di la gzung// phung po lnga ni rgyal ba lnga// lha

chen dregs pa khyed rnams kyi// 'byung ba lnga ni yum chen lnga// rnam shes dbang po yul dus rnams// sangs rgyas yin par lung bstan pas// las la bab pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor

du// dus la bab pa'i sems can des// rang lus rdo rje dkyil 'khor mthong// yid tsam thugs rjes gzung zhes pas// rdo rje kun bzang de yis ni// ngan song gsum gyi sgo 'di bcad// ma tha ma tha sarba pre ta ka

te// he du hUM hUM phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa sarba ting ya ga te he tuM hUM phaT/ da ha da ha sarba na ra ga te he tuM hUM phaT/ de ltar ngan song sgo bcad nas// raM yaM khaM ye shes 'bar ba'i mes bsregs te// mtshan nyid mi gnas stong

par gyur// de nas rgyal ba'i sras bskyed pa// dpa' bo 'bru lngas lam lnga bkag/ oM A hUM swA hA/ 'og min bla med byang chub tu// ye shes rlung gis bteg nas ni// sbyor ba'i lhums su phaT kyis 'phang// gsang

ba'i dbyangs su hUM gis bsdu// sku bskyed ye shes skur spros te// dbyings dang ye shes lhun grub pas// sangs rgyas zhing khams rab 'byams dang// bde gshegs pho brang dkyil 'khor du// rdzu'aphrul zhabs dang
ldan pa yis// 'phags pa'i lam gyi rlung zhugs nas// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing gshegs// 'jig rtain lha dang gtso bor bcas// nyan thos rang rgyal sa bcu las// 'jig rten 'das pa'i mchod pas
mchod// rdzu 'phrul zhabs dang ldan pa yis// stug po bkod pa'i sa las 'das// pad+ma spyan gyi sa la gnas// skyed 'jig med pa'i sku thob pas// stong gsum ma lus bton pa ni// 'bum gyi char yang mi phod
do// zhes rdo rje gsang ba las kyi rgyud las// sta nas mnan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas rdo rje kun tu bzang po des/ thams cad bdud rtsir bsgrub pa'i gnas dang/ dus dang/ sgrub thabs 'di

gsungs so// kye tshangs dang drang srong klu rnams dang// shing dang sman gyi lha mo rnams// thams cad bdud rtsir bsgrubs nas ni// rgyal ba rigs lngar grub nas ni// sku lnga grub par 'dod pa'i tshe// gnas dang
