gsum rgyas pa rnams kyi thugs dam bskul/ khams gsum 'gro ba rnams kyi don yang byas// snod bcud 'jig rten kun gyi rtsi bcud bsdus/ bsgrub pa rigs 'dzin rnams kyi rgyud kyang sbyar// yig 'bru phyag

mtshan sku yi spro bsdu yis// dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i rang bzhin 'od du zhu// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rgyal ba yab yum bskyed// gnyis med sbyor ba'i rol pa'i khyad par las// thugs rjes mi gtong 'gro ba drang ba'i
phyir// ye shes lnga yi gzungs thag lnga ru 'phros// gcig ni thabs mchog yab kyi mkha' nas drang// gsang ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// chos dbyings rnam dag ye shes klong// mi rtog thugs kyi sa bon

hUM// zhe sdang mi dor thugs rje'i gzungs// dkar 'tsher dung dang ma mo'i 'od// rdo rje tsha tsha lu gu rgyud// byang chub sems mchog rgyal ba'i thugs// bcud kyi dam pa lus kyi gzungs// dor ba med pas bdud rtsi
mchog/ 'khyol la 'khyug pas rang byung thugs// rgyud bskul 'gro ba dbyings su bsdus// bcud kyi dam pa gong bur bskyil// thabs kyi bye brag yab kyi mkha'// de phyir yab kyi mkha' nas
drangs// rdo rje chen po'i rigs chen 'grub// gcig ni gsang mchog dbyings nas drang/ b+ha ga dgur gyi pad stengs na// kun rtog ye shes gsal 'tsher dbyings// khyab bdal chags pa gsung gi A// 'dod
chags ma spangs dbang gi gzungs// mtshal dang byu ru gdang ba'i mi mdog/ pad+ma'i sku pa ba dag 'khril// chags pa'i dam pa gsung gi dngos// rlan 'bar bcud ni gsang ba'i thigs// bdud rtsi nad sel zhen
pa sbyong// 'bar 'phro dngos po'i skyon kun bsreg/ bsdus shing bstim pas ga 'ur 'khyil// mchod cing ngan song stongs par bsgral// shes rab yang dog 'gyur med bstim// de phyir yum gyi dbyings nas

drang// pad+ma'i rigs chen yang dag 'grub// gcig ni rgyal 'theb thugs kar drang// thugs kar nyi 'bar gdan steng na// me long lta bu'i ye shes nyid// kun khyab go 'byed rmongs pa'i A+oM// gti mug lam nyid
rmogs 'joms gzungs// asma gar b+ha btso ma gser// tsong tsong 'khril ba zur brgyad 'bar// sku mchog mtshan ldan mchog gi gzugs// gnyen 'khril 'khyug la dri ma med// gshang ba'i 'dzin dug thabs kyi
dbyig/ 'phro 'du 'od 'phreng zhen pa sreg/ phar 'phro tshur bsdu gsang ba'i gter// sprin gyis mnyes shing bsdu ba'i dbang// dpal be'u dbus su rab tu 'bar// de phyir dpal be'u thugs las drang// bde
gshegs rigs chen yang dag nges// gcig ni las mkhan kha nas drang// lce dbus pad+ma dmar po'i dbus// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes nyid// rnam bzhis don rdzogs gsal ba'i ha// phrag dog dpyis phyung nges
pa'i bcud// in drA ni la spangs ma'i mdog/ 'ja' tshon dbye srid dang bral 'khyug/ zhi rgyas dbang drag 'phrin las sgrol// bsol 'jam mnyen lcug mu tig 'phreng// dri chugs la dag thig pa shar// 'byung

'jugs dbugs kyis btags pa sbyongs// khyab dang khyab byed gzer 'phreng 'khyil// 'khor ba'i rgya mo dpyis 'byin dpal/ kha yi pad+ma ngang du thim// de phyir karma'i kha ru drang// las kyi rigs kyi gtso mchog
'grub// thugs rje gzungs kyi thag pa cig/ rnal 'byor pho mo lte bar drang/ gzhi ma'i dbus su zur brgyad steng// bya ba nan tan ye shes nyid// brjod bral dbyings phyug gsang ba'i dngos// yon tan dpag

med rin chen sba// nga rgyal bde chen ngang gis gzungs// bai DUr+ya dang spug gi mdangs// thig le gsal ba'i thigs pa 'bar// 'bum phrag yon tan lhun grub ster// gsal khyab 'od kyi dra ba 'brel// sme sha'i
blta sdug dngos 'dzin bral// phar gsal tshur gsal bde ba'i klong// bde khyab dngos med dngos kun grub// mnyes shing tshim pas bde la gnas// lte ba'i rtsa mdor thim pas 'bar// de bas

lte ba'i rtsa mdor drang// rin chen rigs kyi gter chen nyid// bdud rtsi rang byung bum pa ru// dug lnga bdud rtsir sbyar ba las// sgrol ma 'phro 'dus kun la khyab// snang srid thams cad bdud rtsir bzhu// gser
dngul lta bur gyur pa las// yang dag bstan par nges byas te// byang chub thig ler kun sangs rgyas// ma bsags dngos grub bla na med// sgrub pa po yi dngos grub yin// grub na rgyal ba'i sku yang

yin// rtogs na byang chub sems kyang yin// rgyal sar bgrod pa'i lam yang yin// rnal 'byor pa yi srog kyang yin// de ltar shes nas sgrub byed pa// bla med snying po'i gzugs thag go/ de skad thugs rje'i
gzungs thag bdag/ rang byung dpa' bos bka' stsal to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dpal bdud rtsi bde ba chen po rgyan gyi 'khor lo dam pa des/ thams cad bdud rtsir gnas pa nges pa mi 'gyur ba zhes

de kho na nyid kyi dbyings zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gzi brjid bkod pa zad mi shes pa'i 'od thams cad du khyab pa'i gsang sngags 'di sku dang// gsung dang/ thugs dang/ yon tan

'phrin las rdo rje dang// 'khor lo dang/ pad+ma dang/ rin po che dang rgya gram las phyung ngo// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta hUM hri tha/ dus gsum rgyal bas rab bsngags pa'i// bdud rtsi 'od kyi gsang sngags

'di// bzlas pa tsam gyis kun 'grub ste// dug nyid bdud rtsir grub par byed// gzhan yang mi bzad lta ba drug/ nam mkha' rdo rje 'khor lo dang// rin chen pad+ma rgya gram sngags// yangs dog med pa'i gzhal

yas su// gtor khyab sbyang na thams cad 'grub// ye shes lha la phog pas thugs dam bskul// bar chad bgegs la phog na rdul phran rlog/ grub pa po la phog na dam tshig gso// 'gro ba byin la phog na sgrib pa

sbyong// de bas gsang sngags rgyal ba yis// brnags nas 'gro la phan phyir bshad// dpal bdud rtsi bde ba chen po zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ thugs rje mi gtong bar 'dzin pa'i gsang sngags
bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug cu gnyis pa'o//// de nas sems dpa' chen pos yang gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'chi ba med pa'i bdud rtsi'i rgyal po chen po thabs mchog gi snying po mnga' thang yongs
su rdzogs pa nyid kyis/ mchog tu gyur pa'i gsang sngags thams cad bdud rtsir dbang bsgyur ba ni gsungs na/ 'di la yon tan du gyur pa gzhan dag mchis srid na yang bshad du gsol// bstan du gsol/
legs par dgongs te gtan la dbab tu gsol bka' stsal pa/ nga ni thabs chen po yangs pa/ mang ba/ rgya che ba/ zab pa/ dpag par dkar ba ste/ ci nas kyang 'gro ba 'dren pa'i dpal yin
pas bstan gyis nyon cig/ de la 'di'i yon tan ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di til gyis byur bur bkang ste gcig nas bgrang ba las 'das kyi bar du bgrang bar nus kyi/

'di'i yon tan ni brjod cing bgrang bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni 'khor ba'i dug lnga'i bdud chen po nyid/ spang du med par rang byung gi ye shes chen po nyid lngar snang ste/ de las ma byung ba 'am/

ma khyab pa'am/ de las ma gyur pa med de// thams cad du rgyas 'debs par byed pa'i sngags brjod pa tsam gyis grub par byed pa/ rang bzhin gyi mthu chen po dang ldan pa'i rtsi yin pa'i phyir ro// de lta mod kyang

phyogs 'ga' tsam bshad kyis nyon cig/ bde gshegs rnams kyis rab bsngags pa'i// gsang ba 'di ni bla na med// rma bya yi ni sgro dag gam/ sa ra sa sa'am gyi men gyi// sgrol las byas pa'i chun po la// khab
len lcags kyi yu ba can// 'bum phrag bdun du bzlas pa yi// til nag dag gis brab byas te// me 'dra'i 'od ni byung ba dang// sa la brdabs na cher g.yo zhing// brag la brdabs na 'gags par 'gyur// rgya

mtsho la ni brdabs la lud// chu rgyun chen po'ang skam par byed// nags tshal chen po 'tshig pa dang// grong khyer dag la brdabs na yang// rims nad tsha ba 'ong bar nges// rgya mtsho lbu ba di las dang// shu dag

rnam se drang srong khrag/ sgron shing d+ha du ra dang ni// se ra bas dang dung gi rus// li kri ma du lung ga dang// ba hu dang ni ru ta las// srang re bsnyams te btags byas nas// lcags phye de dang mnyam par bya// ha

se'i mar khus sbrus nas ni// rgya sran tsam gyi ri lu bya// lcags gsum bskyis la gong bzhin bzlas// dro dang du ba 'bar 'phro byung/ gung mo zla steng bzhag byas nas// bzlas te bltas na mthong ba ni// stong

gsum skyu ru ra 'bras bzhin// mi mthong mi gsal gcig kyang med// mdzub mo la yang de bzhin no// lha dang lha min klu yi sgra// byol song la sogs thams cad dang/ rlung dang chu dang bral sogs pa// rol mo'i

sgra sogs de bzhin te// ngan song gsum gyi sgra yang thos// mthe bong la bzhag bzlas gyur na// stong gsum dri rnams gyur ba med// zhim dang mi zhim tshor bar ni// 'gyur bar lha dang ro nyags dri// nyams su

bde bar lon par ro/ kha mngar skyur dang lan tshwa bsngal// 'phrig dang gzhan yang ro rnams ni// stong gsum lha mi'i bza' ba'i rjes// skad cig gis ni nyams lon pa// srin lag rtse la bzhag pas so// lha mo
klu mo gnod sbyin mo// mi mo la sogs ma lus dang// grang dro 'jam rtsub bde sdug dang// gos rnams lci yang ma lus kun// mthe'u chung rtse bzhag bzlas pas 'grub// lag mthil bzhag nas
bzlas gyur na// rigs drug 'gro ba bsam yas sems// brgya phrag gcig dang bcu phrag brgyad// gnyis dang bzhi yang dar cig la/ khong du chud nas ma 'dres shes// gtsug bzhag bzlas pas lha yi

gnas// 'gro bar 'dod pa'i rdo rje'i skras/ kha dog lnga yis thag pa ni// bsgoms te rtas par gyur pa dang// rga lag ma nor bzhag 'jus na// skad cig tsam la phyin par 'gyur// dmyal khams lta 'am don byed

na// rkang mthil g.yas g.yon me dang chu'i// steng bzhag gong bzhin bzlas nas kyang// g.yas dang g.yon pa rdo rje yi// 'gros kyis myur ba myur ba ru// song nas chu la me yis sbyar// me la yang ni chus sbyar
te// gshag dang gtub dang 'bral ba las// stong pa'i go cha bla med pa// skon par nus pa gdon mi za// skad cig gis ni byed par nus// gru mo g.yas dang g.yon pa yis// gling khams gzhan dang lha men
'gro// pus mo g.yas dang g.yon pas kyang// byol song 'jig don med byed cing// yi dwags rnams la zas skom char// byams pa'i sems kyis 'bebs par nus// rlung gi bu ga yas bzhag bzlas// me yi
bskal ba 'jig nus te// phyi bshol ji srid 'dod kyi bar// g.yos pas chu yi rgyud gcod nus// rtser bzhag bzlas pas rlung rgyun gcod// lta ba'i dbus su bzhag bzhag ste bzlas// rtsa yi 'khor lo bkag
byas na// mngal rgyas rgyun ni 'phel bar nges// ma sha'i 'bru tsam gsum byas te// gnyis ni khar bcug gnyis gas mur// gcig ni rtse la hUM bkal te// mi brdig dal bu dal bus brud// bye'u ldad dag 'drar
gyur tse// so 'am sen mos gzung byas te// bzlas pa khri gsum bsnyung bas bzlas// brjod pa'i bar chad gzhan med pas// mngal gyi bya ba byed nus te// rigs brgyud med 'dod pa yang 'gyur// khye'u dang bu
mo gang 'dod skye// thams cad kun tu rigs brgyud rgyas/ kha dog dbyibs dang yang dag ldan// 'phong rtsal shes bzhin thams cad rdzogs// de bzhin thams cad 'grub 'gyur te// 'dod na ma ning zha grub
yang// 'byung 'gyur gzhan yang gdon mi za// yungs kar thal chen ldong ros dang// rje'u rigs bu mo'i mo mtshan khrag/ tsan dan dmar po'i 'bras bu la// bzlas te btags nas ri bong dong// rus sbal khrag
gis sbrus nas su// ro yi lce bcad steng bzhag nas// bzlas te gang la bskul ba de// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang// gdon mi za bar dbang 'du na// gar mkhan rol mo mkhan la sogs// dbang du 'du
ba smos ci dgos/ khang pa'am mkhar la bskus byas na// bcud dang bcas par dbang du 'du// yul lam ljongs sam rta glang chen// ma he 'bru sogs gang rung la// bskus pa dbang du 'du bar

bshad// lhag par lha la sogs pa yi// lha men rgyal po'i bu mo sogs// thams cad dbang du 'du bar nges// sha ri ram dang 'bru rus dang// tha skar rdo rje bse ru dang// gser sogs rin chen lnga yi phye// ba yi

mar la sbyar byas te// bar chad med par bzlas shing bza'// 'o ma'ang bag tsam btung bar bya// rus pa sra mkhregs rdo rje 'dra// so yang tshags dam byung yang skye// skra dkar gnyer ma rnam par spong// skad snyan

khu byug gzhon nu 'dra// sha dam yan lag thams cad mnyen// dbang po kun gsal lus dbyibs drang// rta dang glang po cang shes ltar// rA dza lus kyi dbang po mkhrang// de las bzlas shing mang zos na// tshe lo
nyis brgyar bar chad med// nang med bus pa lta bur 'gyur// 'di ltar 'dod na yang yang bza'// nga yis gsungs la gdon mi za// ro langs sgrub par 'dod pa na// a ka ru dang du ru ka/ ga pur gla rtsi bcas

pa las// ri lur byas te dngul gyis dkri// li kri gur kum 'bri ta dang// 'ja' ra dong ka'i me tog dang// shan ti glang po'i khrag 'bru ba// gong dang 'dra ste zangs kyis dkri// g+hi wang yung ba tsan dan ni// sbrul

gyi snying po bab bla ba// 'dan da pa la yungs kar btag/ e n+ya ya yi khrag gis sbru// gong 'dra ri lu ga ser gyis dkri// yungs kar nag dang til nag dang// ske tshe thal chen zangs lcags phye// sran bdun cha

snyams shun chen dril// de la bdun 'bum bsnyen pa bya// dpa' brtul brtson 'grus chen po dang// dad dang dam tshig dbang ldan pa'i// skyes bu lha yi rnal 'byor can// stag ltar mchongs te btsal bya ba// dur

khrod chen po'i gnas nas so// bdun lnga gsum du bar chad med// grib ma'ang de dang 'dra ba la// rigs btsun lang tsho bkrag dang ldan// dri zhim ngag snyan gzhon nu tshod// yan lag mnyen lcug bkrag dang
ldan// 'du ba'i nad kyis ma gtses pa// gsum mam lnga 'am bdun yang rung// ha ha zhes su bgad nas ni// thogs pa med par blang ba'i phyir// mkha' 'gro lta ba 'bri tshugs kyis// 'gyur ba med pa'i brjid

kyis blta// 'phra men ma yi 'jo stabs kyis// ne bar drung du phyin nas ni// dpa' bo gyad kyi shugs kyis su// ha ha bgad de bzung nas kyang// lce spyang tshul 'drar brngam par bya// dur can bgegs kyis mi
'jigs phyir// sa der rus pa'i phur pa gdab// glang po'i shugs kyis khyer nas ni// hUM sgras phyogs bzhir bdun bdun 'gro// thal mo'i sgra gdon rngam tshul dang// brod pa'i stobs kyis dben par
'gro// shar la sogs par bros sbyangs te// byang dang shar gyi mtshams dag tu// rdo leb steng du tsog tsog por// bzhag ste thal bas brab pa ni// hUM bzhi pas su yang yang bya// ro de 'bul lam

rgod 'dra ngu// 'phar g.yo byed na dngos grub nye// de la re dang dogs spangs te// brtan pa'i sems kyis yang yang bzlas// de las dri mchog byung ba dang// bdag chal bcas pa'i chus bkrus te// gsha' te khu

ba kha ru blugs// rang gis zangs kyi ri lu ni/ khar bcug bdud rtsi 'phreng ba bzlas// de yi grangs ni gong ma bzhin// dngul gyi ri lu khar bcug ste// ro de'i stan la 'dug nas kyang// che mchog yab yum
phyag rgya bsgom// de nas 'dar 'phrog tsher ldang na// gser mur mi rtog yun ring gnas// cher g.yo dgod cing lang 'dod na// lce brkyang so yis gzung bar bya// spu gris bcad de lag bzung na// nam mkhar
'phur te ral grir 'gyur// lha min g.yul yang 'pham par nus// bcom ldan gsung gi dngos grub thob// lag bcad rdo rje go cha gyon// khro bos mtshon cha'i char phab kyang// de la mi tshugs sod par
dka'// rkang bcad rkang mgyogs 'grub nges te// dpag tshad lnga bcur dar cig phyin// sa 'og dngos grub 'grub nges te// zad med gter la spyod par 'gyur// skra bcad nor bu rin chen 'grub// rin chen

sil ma char ltar 'bab// rgyal brgya mchod cing 'gro ba skong/ mig phyung mig rnon 'grub pa ste// ye shes spyan sogs bzhi 'am lngas// nam mkha'i mtha' klas sa le ba'o// rnam pa bcad par gyur pas ni// shes

pas zin dang ma zin pa'i// sgra shes sangs rgyas gsung ltar 'gyur// gzhan yang gang bcad de mthun pa'i// dngos grub rgya chen rab 'thob ste// snying phyung chos nyid mngon par 'gyur// de dang de yis gang reg
pa// thams cad rin chen gser du 'gyur// gnas par 'dod na 'chi ba med// 'chi 'dod gnad med bde bar 'gyur// lha yi rgyal srid 'grub pa dang// bstan pa la gnod 'joms pa dang// srol ba las na
ljon shing bskyed// nam mkhar 'phur dang sa la 'dzul// ri bo brag la thogs med 'gro// ci 'dod thams cad 'grub pa ni// bdud rtsi 'phreng ba bla med pa// bzlas pa tsam gyis ros 'grub pa'o// gzhan yang
'di yis 'grub pa ni// ga pur klu shing la bzlas na/ mdze nad bco brgyad sel bar byed// a 'bras til mar ba mar la// bzlas 'thungs rims nad thams cad sel/ kha ba'i rtsa dang li ga tur// shen ta pa
la la sogs la// bzlas bskus rus chag thams cad 'tshob// gser shing mkhris pa gang yang rung// ba tu la yi khu ba la// bzlas bskus mig gnad sel bar byed// ka ra skyur shing mu 'dza' ra// dong ka la
bzlas 'khru dang gcod// ce phog du bas char pa gcod// 'bebs na ma du sing ga'o// pu tse shel gyis ser ba 'bebs// gcod na rgya mtsho'i sgo ngas so// sha tri pa las 'dod chags 'jil// tsi tra
kas ni g.yan pa bskyed// 'di dag las ni mdor bsdus pa'o// gzhan yang 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das// bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa// bdud rtsi 'phreng bas 'grub 'gyur te// dug gzhil gzhon nu gso la
bsngags// 'gro ba'i don du dgongs nas ni// ston pa bdud 'dul dpa' bo yis// yang dag nges par bka' stsal to// dpal bdud rtsi bde ba chen po zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ yon tan mchog
tu bsgrub par bstan par zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug cu gsum pa'o//// de'i tshe bdud rtsi gsang ba'i mchog 'di'i skal ba dang mi ldan pa'i bdud dang/ gshin rje dang/ lha ma yin la sogs pa/ lta ba dman
zhing log pa'i spyod pa la dga' ba mang po dag cig 'di snyam du sems te/ bdud rtsi dam pa kham gcig ni bdag cag gi yang gsol ba/ khams gcig ni mi gtsang pa dang dug yin pa las/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bdag cag la gsungs te/ kham gcig la bdud rtsi dam pa'o zhes gsungs pa 'di/ bdag cag yid ma mos pas 'di brtag cing de lta bu yin na/ bdag cag la ma gnang yang thabs kyis bdag gi dbang
du bya'o bar sems pa dang// de 'dra ba'i log rtog ngan pa de dag mtshams gcod pa'i ched du gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis log pa can dag gi bsam pa khong du stsol te/ bdud rtsi dam pa 'di la
bar chad du bgyid par sems na// de dag mtshams gcod pa'i thams dam pa bshad du gsol// bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i 'khor 'dir de dag gis gnod par ltar ga la nus te/ ma 'ongs pa la phan par bya

ba'i thabs bshad do zhes gsungs nas/ de'i tshe rdo rje'i dra ba rnam par bkod pa chen po sprul pa zhes pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te/ thams cad du 'joms pa'i glog gi 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i snying po

'di thugs las phyung ngo// hUM hUM hUM a mr-i ta dz+wa la badzra kro d+ha phaT phaT phaT ha la da ha pa tsa ma tha ban dza hU~M phaT/ ces phyung bas rdo rje 'bar ba'i tsha tsha las sprin dpung tsam du 'khrigs pa'i mtshon sna tshogs pa'i char
chen po phab nas/ log pa can de la rdul tsam yang ma lus par myangs nas med par byas te sa sar 'du ba 'dus pa las// de dag rdo rje'i brag chen pos mnan to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ hUM/ gsang ba'i thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// bar chad byed dang ngan sems can// 'byung po ma lus bsgral byas te/ mnan te tsham rngam shugs kyis gzir// hUM hUM badzra kro d+ha hUM ka ra hUM/ gardza gardza hUM

phaT/ hUM hUM badzra kro d+ha nI la daN Da hUM da ha da ha hUM phaT/ hUM hU~M badzra kro d+ha ya man ta ka hUM pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ hUM hUM badzra kro d+ha ha ya gri ba hUM hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ hUM hUM badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kun Da li hUM ts+tshin

da ts+tshin da hUM phaT/ hUM hUM badzra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la hUM ban d+ha ban d+ha hUM phaT/ hUM hUM badzra kro d+ha a pa rA dza ti/ hUM tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ hUM hUM badzra kro d+ha kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya hUM b+hin da b+hin da hUM phaT/ hUM hUMbadzra krod+ha ma hA ba la

hUM s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya hUM phaT/ rang rang tsham rngam stabs brjid pas// bcu'i phyag rgya cher gnas te// mnan pa'i las la btson bya ba// byang shar mkha' 'drar thong bas mnan// bdag 'dzin bar gcad tshar
gcad pa'o// gsol ba/ phyi yi bar chad mnan pa'i thabs// thabs mkhas dpa' bos bshad lags na// le lo g.yeng rmugs mi gsal ba// 'byung srid nan tan ji ltar bgyi// bka' stsal pa/ rang gi shes
rab nyi nub pas// 'gal ba gal te byung srid na// nyes byas mi bcas bshags byas te// khyed dag nyid kyis ngag tu glengs// de nas 'khor 'dus pa de dag gis rang rang gi rgyud la brtags na/ bying rmugs

dang/ 'phyar g.yeng dang/ bla ba sprid pa la sogs pa'i nyes byas mang du yod par shes nas rab tu gnod pas ngag tu phyung nas bshags pa// hUM/ kun gzhi rnam shes dbyings nyid du// thig le stong gi 'od 'bar
ba'ang// ma rig bdag tu 'dzin pas bsgribs// yod med bag chags ngar 'dzin pas// g.yung drung ye shes lha khyed kyis// sku gsung thugs kyi mdzod gsum la// sngon chad nongs bgyis grangs mang
bas// 'khor ba mu mtha' med par 'khyams// rang sems dbyings su mngon bya'i phyir// bcom ldan bka' gsang dkyil 'khor 'dir// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bdag cag rnams// nam mkha'i sprin bzhin
'dus tshogs nas// bdud rtsi dam pa'i ngang nyid la// bar chad le lo med pa ru// brtson 'grus rlung ltar thogs med pas// rang sems mngon du bya slad de// mun pa'i g.yung drung 'khyil ba yis// sku
gsung thugs kyi mdzod gsum la// sngon chad nongs bgyis grangs mang bas// 'pham zhing ltung bar gyur pa dag/ de dag mi 'chad mthol zhing bshags// bdud rtsi 'chi med dngos grub stsol// ces 'khor
rnams lus ngag mthun pas smrengs pas/ nang gi nyes byas thams cad sor chud nas bde ba'i rtags dang ldan par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das bdud rtsi bde ba chen po nyid kyang dgyes pa'i ros thams cad du

khyab nas/ mnyam pa'i dbyings nyid la bzhugs so// dpal bdud rtsi bde ba chen po zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ phyi nang gi bar chad bsal ba'i thabs rnam pa gnyis bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u
ste drug cu bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang sems dpa' chen po des/ 'khor gyi nang nas stan las langs te/ yang nas yang du bcom ldan 'das la rig pa las mngon du phyung ba'i me tog gtor nas
phyag 'tshal te gsol ba/ rang byung bdud rtsi sman chen pos// 'khor ba'i gcong rnying bsal byas te// nad med bde bar gyur pa'i mchog/ thabs mkhas sman pas bshad du gsol// de skad zhus pas thams cad
mkhyen// 'tsho byed rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig sems dpa' ngang tshul can// rang sems mun pas bsgribs pa ni// nyid 'od sprin gyis gcod pa bzhin// sprin med mkha' la nyi shar ba'i// 'od kyis
dngos kun rang gsal ltar// rang sems gsal brtan yon tan 'bar// rtags kyi dam pa der bshad do// de 'drar khong du chud byas nas// rdzas la brten pas shes bya ba// thun mong dag tu 'di ltar ro// snod

bcas 'phar zhing 'khor ba dang// snod kyi nang na khol ba'o// 'phar 'khor la yang gnyis su bshad// dge dang mi dge zhes pa'o// mi dge bying rmugs dri mi zhim// sems kyi de nyid mi gsal zhing// dus der

mun par 'khrigs par 'gyur// de tshe rang sems brtan byas te// ngang las rang gi skur gsal bsgom// hUM las mtshon cha'i char phab ste// rdo rje hUM gis rgya bcings pa// bstan pa tsam gyis gzhan pham ste// rdo rje

ra ba dra ba bcing// hUM badzra pa ta a pa lam na// a mr-i ta badzra pany+tsa ra hUM/ dge ba'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste// rang sems 'od gsal shes rgyud dag/ gang 'dod de nyid tsam gyis 'grub// de nyid ci 'drar bdag
dbyer med// dpag tshad tsam mam chung yang rung// gnas khang sa bzhir bcas pa'ang 'dra// gang 'dod gnas su hUM la bstim// g.yas su 'khor na thabs lnga 'grub// gang du brtan pa de yi rigs// mtshams

kyang de dang 'dra ba'o// g.yon du 'khor na shes rab 'grub// dbyings nyid rtogs med yun ring gnas// stang 'phar mchog gi dngos grub 'thob// 'bying ltar byed na thun mong 'grub// 'di la the tsom za ba med/
khol ba'ang rnam gnyis gong bzhin shes// mi dge 'bus bshig lcig sgra dang// tsag zer la sogs dman pa'i sgra// sil sgra khal dang bsing la sogs// nyams dga' gzengs mtho dge bar bshad// lce steng
pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa// nyi zla'i bar nas yig 'brug aM// dmar ser gur kum bzang po'i mdog/ pad+ma mtha' yas sku gsung thugs// rim par spra bsdu pad dbus bstim// rtswa mchog dag la zim chags
bzhin// rtsa yi lam nas lam zhugs te// chu bur rdol zhing 'byung ba bzhin// lus kun khyab par dbyer med de// rang sems dri ma med par bya// des ni rdo rje gsung dag gi/ dngos grub bla med mtha' yas
'grub// tshangs pa'i gsung ltar rab sgrogs te// pad+ma'i snying po dag pa bzhin// snang la rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// de skad bdud rtsi gsang ba'i dbyings// ston pa rgyal mchog dpa' bos

bshad// 'dus pa'i 'khor kun rab tshim ste// bcom ldan 'das la rab tu dga'// sbyi btud thal sbyar 'khod par gyur// dpal bdud rtsi bde ba chen po zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ thun mong gi

rtags gnyis bstan pa dge ba dang mi dge ba gtan la phab pa'i le'u drug cu lnga pa'o//// de nas dpal bde ba chen pos bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ ngas rmad du byung ba'i bdud rtsi dam pa/

grub pa'i rtags 'byung ba'i gzhi/ bla na med pa'i byang chub sgrub pa'i thabs dam pa/ lam gyi nang na nye lam dam pa/ bcud kyi snying po/ 'bras bu dka' ba med pa'i rgyu// gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba// yang

gsang rmad du byung ba khyad par gyi spyod pa dam pa 'di ni rmad du byung ba'i bsod rnams dang yon tan yod de/ bgrang ba las 'das kyang mdor bshad kyi nyon cig/ 'di ni lta ba'i mchog yin te// rang byung
dbyings ni brdal khyab kyang// gsal la ma 'dres ye shes mchog/ dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med pas// thams cad snub pas bdud rtsi mchog/ 'di ni spyod pa rmad byung ste// gtsang dang sme dang dug dang

sman// spang blang med pas dbyings su 'dus// tha snyad 'dzin pa rtog pa'i nad// 'di ni dam tshig mchog yin te// 'di dang mi 'bral dam tshig ste// dang du blangs na dngos grub nye// 'das na mkhas 'gro'i chad
pas 'jigs// 'di ni dbang mchog bla na med// bskur ba'i rnam pa tha dad kyang// gcig gnyis gsum bzhi'i dbye ba yis// thams cad rdzogs dbang thig le'i dbyings// 'phrin las rab mchog 'di nyid
de// bsnyen bsgrub 'bral med lu gu brgyud// dbyings las gcig kyang g.yos pa med// rgyun ma chad pas ngang gis 'brel// mchod pa'i rnam pa bsam yas pas// stong gsum byur bur bkang mchod pas// 'di
yi rdul phran gcig mchod 'phags// thams cad bdud rtsir gyur par rab// mkha' 'gro chad po sor bzhugs na'ang// stong gsum rdzas pas 'di mchog ste// 'di las byung zhing 'di brlabs pas// rang gis
rang bskang thams cad dgyes// rnal 'byor chag pa 'am bskang pa'ang// rang rig ye shes rdzas mchod pas// ye shes kyis ni chos nyid gsal/ khams gsum 'khor ba'i btson ra stongs// de la sogs pa dpag
tu med// gdon bgegs bzhil dang dal yams bzlog/ dregs pa dbang bsdu dkor khang dbrog/ dgra gsad smyo dang brlabs dag mdze// phol 'bras shu ba 'brum bu dang/ khrag skyug la sogs thams cad
dang// tshe bsring longs spyod rgyas bya dang// gzhon nu gso dang rigs 'phel dang// ci dgar thams cad 'grub pa ni// bdud rtsi 'di ldan brtan pas 'grub// ngas gsungs pa la the tshom
med// don kun chud mi za ba yi// 'di la dpyas 'dogs skur 'debs pa// rdo rje dmyal bar de skye ste// lce la lcags kyi gzer chen 'bum// skad cig la btab spu gris gcod// ha la dug gis 'phro bskus
nas// mi bzod cer ldang ngu zhing 'bod// 'chor med yang yang bskal pa 'bum// gal te na'ang 'jig rten gzhan// rab tu mi bzad sdug bsngal myong// kyi hud skyabs med gang bzhugs zer// de tshe phan byed

mi 'byung zhing// dam pa'ang thos par m-i 'gyur ro// gal te'ang yi dwags byol song khams// gzhan pas lhag pa'i sdug bsngal myong// mi nad tshe thung nad mang zhing// phan pa'i sman dang phrad mi 'gyur// de bas

legs nyes rab bsdams te// las kyi khyad par de bas che// de skad yon tan rmad byung ba'i// gsang mchog mgon pos gsungs pa yin// dpal bdud rtsi bde ba chen po zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/
yon tan rmad byung bstan pa dang nyes byas bkod pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug cu drug pa'o//// de nas yang sems dpa' dam pa des gsol ba/ bcom ldan gsang bdag dbang phyug che// kun la dbye bsri mi
mnga' ba// bdag cag 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis// kun la khyab par bgyi lag na// bgo ba'i dgongs pa bshad du gsol// bcom ldan kun snyoms dpa' bo yis// brtse bas gsung 'di bka' stsal
to// mu mtha' med pa'i byang chub sems// rgyal ba sems dpa' thams cad la// gdal khyab ngang du lhun grub pas// snyoms par gnas pa bgos pa'i mchog/ thar pa'i lam mchog sten 'dod pas// bdag
gzhan bya ba rdzogs byed na// 'di la 'bad de brtson 'grub bskyed// blo zhan rmongs pa gtsang la dga'// dad med dam med dbang med cing// nga rgyal dregs dang khengs sems can// bka' slu gdeng med che
dag can// de la gnang ba'i skabs mi dbye// cha cig rgyal ba rdul phran pas// lhag pa'i tshogs la mnyes mchod dbul// de 'khor gnas pa'i rigs 'dzin tshogs// mkha' 'gro mar bcas la mchod

cing// yang nas yang du mnyes par bya// bla ma chen po rgyal ba'i sku// mnyes par bya ba'i phy-ir dbul zhing// shes rab rgyal 'theb karma ging// go phur la yangs dbul byas te// chas dbye shas tsam rigs par

bya// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs thams cad la// shes rgyud tshim par bya phyir sbyin// lhag ma med par khyab bya ba// bkra shis gtsang ma'i snod kyis bya// gor shi sha yi lo ma 'am// yang na shun chen dag tu bya// ka shi
ka yi ras kyang rung// gtsang ma rab mdzes nan tan bya// rgyu ma'i srad bus bcings nas ni// snod ngan gsang phyir rgyas btab ste// pad+ma'i thal mor sbyin par bya// mchod pas lha yi dkyil 'khor
mnyes// gtor na bgegs kyi tshogs las rgyal// bsgrubs na bla med byang chub thob// bsten na 'khor gyi mkha' 'gro dga'// lus bcangs lus kyis bar chad thub// dris ni 'du ba'i nad sel te// yul na
gnas na yul khams bde// dal yams 'khrug pa mi 'byung zhing// 'bru smin sad ser mi 'byung ngo// de skad khyab byed ston pas bshad// dpal bdud rtsi bde ba chen po zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po
las/ thams cad la khyab par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug cu bdun pa'o//// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje rnon pos smin ma rab tu g.yo bar byas te bgad nas/ bcom ldan 'das sgra dbyangs 'brug gi
rgyal po de la mchod cing rab tu bstod nas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdud rtsi sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan mnga' na de dag kyang bshad du gsol/ bka' stsal ba/ sems dpa' chen po nyon cig dang// bdud rtsi
dam pa dri ma med// rab dga' bsgrub pa dam pa yis// rigs kyi dbye bas bsgrub pa ni// nga yis yang dag bshad par bya// bram ze gtsang ma'i rigs dag gam// bde gshegs rigs la mos pa'am// las kyi
bsags pa yod pa'am// bla mas byin rnams sgrub 'dod na// ri rab rtse 'am gang gi ra ba rung// gcan gzan 'khras sa bkra shis par// brtan zhing bar chad med pa ru// yid 'ong phug gam yang thog tu// rang
gi rnal 'byor ma nyams bsgoms// rigs dang mthun pa'i mtshan ldan du// dbus su rin chen sman mchog bzhag/ shar du sems dang lhor sha chen// rak+ta dri chu nub dang byang// bdag nyid rigs kyi mnga'

bdag pas// rnam snang 'khor bcas dbus nyid du// mi bskyod shar la 'byung ldan lho// mtha' yas don grub nub dang byang// dbus su oM hUM shar du bzhag/ swa lho aM nub ha byang du/ kha dog rigs kyi dbye bas
bya// spro bsdu bar chad med pa las// du ba 'thul dang dge mtshan 'bar// yang dag nyid du dpral bar bsdu// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// mchog dang thun mong bla na med// 'bras bu de bzhin gshegs
rigs 'grub// snying po bla med nges pa'o// de bzhin rin chen rigs kyi lha// sha chen bsgrub par 'dod pa na// rgyal rigs bla mas yang dag 'grub// dkyil 'khor brgyad pa'i dbus nyid du// ban d+ha mtshan

ldan sul mangs su// bdud rtsi dam pa sha chen bzhag/ gnas ni nags tshal thibs po 'am// skyed mos tshal du bya ba ste// khang bzangs sum brtseg yang thog tu// shar du byang chub sems kyi chu// lhor ni rin
chen gzhan gong bzhin// rigs kyi bdag po rin chen 'byung// swa las bsam zhing tshom bur bcas// shar du mi bskyod rnam snang lho// mtha' yas nub la grub pa byad// hUM oM swa aM ha las
bskyed// in dra'i mdog dbus rang rang ltar// 'phrau dang 'du bcud bkug pas// dri mchog rmad byung bla med de// dge bas bar chad ming mi grag/ rigs chen bla ma rin chen 'grub// lte bar zur brgyad dbus
nyid du// bsdus bstan bla na med pa'o// rje'u rigs bla mar gyur pa dang// 'di la mong shing yid brtan pas// pad+ma'i tshal dang smad 'tshong gnas// tsan dan dmar po'i shing drung du// dga' ba'i sems

kyis rak+ta bgrub// rang gi rnal 'byor la gnas pas// bsgrub pa bla med byang chub 'grub// brgyad pa'i pho brang snying po la// mtshan dang ldan pa'i sul mangs su// ra ga rak+ta'i rigs chen bsdu// shar du sems

dang dri chen lho// sha chen nub tu dri chu byang// A ni rgya skyegs mdog dang 'dra// shar du hUM dang lho ru A+oM// swA nyid nub tu rnam bsams te// hA ni byang gi phyogs su bya// mtshal ltar rab 'bar kha dog
gzhan// rigs kyi dbye bas rnam par dbye// mi bskyod la sogs tshom bu bzhi// rang rang gi ni gnas bzhag ste// bzlas 'phro 'du dang bya ba byed// gsal bas yang nas yang bskul te// rang gi rigs la
gsol ba gdab// sgra snyan khyad par can dag gis// rigs kyi dbang gis 'byung ba ste// shes nas dge mtshan bsdu ba ni// mgrin par pad+ma'i dbus su ste// aM 'bar rab mchog 'du bas bsdu// 'di ni
pad+ma'i rigs dag gis// dngos grub brtan par 'grub pa yin// dmangs rigs rab tu gyur pa yi// slob dpon dri chu bsgrub mos pas// chu gling rgya mtsho'i 'gram dag tu/ khang bzangs mdangs dga' bar chad
med// ya kha med par bsgrub par bya// las kyi rnal 'byor mnyam gzhag pas// bzlas brjod bar chad med par bya// sa gzhi dge ba byin brlabs par// dkyil 'khor bri byas dbus nyid du// mtshan ldan rgya

gram bzhag dbus nang// dri chu bcud can ma lus blugs// shar du snying bcud dri chen lho// sha chen nub tu rak+ta byang// ha mdzes 'od 'bar ljang ku dbus// hUM dag A+oM gnyis shar dang lho// swa nub AM ni byang du
ste/ kha dog rigs kyi dbang gis dbye// rgya gram rdo rje de bzhin no// 'di kun 'khor bcas dbye bas ni// dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar// dbugs kyi rgyan las 'phro 'du bya// rgyal ba kun las
bskul byas te// de kun 'khor la gsol ba gdab// 'di las lha mo'i gzugs byung ste// gang yin shes nas blang bya ste// gsang ba'i brda yis mtshon par bya// gsang bar gru gsum steng gnas pa'i// ha la
brtan bstim bsdus pas 'grub// las kyi rigs mchog ci 'dod par// yang dag nyid du 'grub par bshad// lnga bzhi sha yang de bzhin te// mtshams bzhi dag la 'gyur ba med// ma phyed rigs
kyi dbang gis bsgyur// gzhan yang khyad par 'od rigs pa// rang gis shes rab rnam par spyad// 'gro ba'i mos pa ji bzhin du// ston pas 'khor la gsungs pa yin// dpal bdud rtsi bde ba chen po zhes bya ba

rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ bdud rtsi rigs kyi dbang bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug cu brgyad pa'o//// de nas 'khor de nas mi'i byang chub sems dpa' li tsa byi gzhon nu sde zhes bya bas/ sems dpa'
de'i zhal du ltas te smras pa/ sems dpa' bdag cag gis ni smra ba'i dam pa 'di la zhu ba spobs pa can ma yin pas/ sems dpa' nyid ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas gnang la spobs pa yang yod pas zhus
shig/ rang byung gi bdud rtsi dam pa bcud kyi snying po ji bzhin par ma rtogs pa// thabs la brten te rtogs par 'dod kyang/ thabs med pa/ chung ba/ dog pa/ mi ldan pa/ mi zas pa/ mi mkhas pa/ thabs mi
'byor ba rnams thabs kyi snying po 'di la brten na ji ltar bya ba de mi mnga' mi srid pas/ de ji ltar thabs la brten pa zhus shig/ sems dpas smras pa/ de ltar bdag gis gsol gyis/ khyed la sogs pa
rnams gus pas nyon cig smras nas/ ston pa la phyag byas te gsol ba/ bcom ldan bdag la gsol ba mchis// thabs med la sogs 'gro don du// thabs kyi khyad par bdag la shod// brtse bas bdag cag
tshim par mdzod// de la ston pas bka' stsal pa// thabs med mun par rab tu 'khyams// de dag mos pa ci rigs pa'o// thabs chung byis pa shed ma byed// dog pa byis pa glen lkugs rmongs// mi ldan rang don
phyogs tsam shes// mi zab dka' thub brtul zhugs sdom// mi mkhas rnal 'byor sbyor bas bcings// de dag 'di yi snod med pas// tshig gi mtshon tsam ngas ma bshad// mi 'byor mos pa'i skal pa
can// de la ngas ni bshad par bya// dbang dang dam tshig ldan pa yis// dpa' bo brtson 'grus brtul zhugs can// slob dpon lung ldan la gus pas// bsgrub par bya yi gzhan gyis min// mdangs dga' kha

dog dbyibs ldan zhing// bkra shis bar chad med par bya// las grub mthar mar rab brtsam pa// zla ba rgyas 'dra lngas brgyan pa'i// dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhag pa ni// shre shing khre'u gyi rten steng du/ kha sbal

kha shi ka pA lar// rtsa ba lnga la sogs pa yi// brgya phrag gcig dang nyi shu lnga// lcags kyu lnga dang ldan byas te// gzhan dag spangs te btags btsags nas/ khu chen gyis ni rab tu dpol// de yi thod pas bla na
dgab// byil ba'i 'bras bus kha brgyan cing// ku sha chun pos dkris nas bzhag/ dkyil 'khor lnga yi ting 'dzin du// gnas nas mchod cing bstod nas gsol// bdud rtsi 'phreng ba'i gsang

sngags ni// bar chad med par dgu 'bum bzlas// 'od kyi 'phreng ba spro bsdu ni// ngas bshad 'di la khyad par med// bde ba'i mtshan ma brtan byas te// dngos grub bdag la brtan par bya// nye ba'i dbang phyug
brtan gyur na// bdag nyid sangs rgyas sa la 'gro// dbyings nyid bde ba'i ngang du 'gyur/ khams gsum thams cad rgya las grol// gzhan gyi bya ba rdzogs byed phyir// mngon shes drug dang bco brgyad
'thob// nam mkha' la yang 'phur bar nus// mchod dang bskang dang gso skrad sbyang// thams cad byed par nus pa ni// sngar bshad dag dang khyad par med// ngas bshad 'gro ba ma lus la// phan par dgongs

par nges pa'o// dpal bdud rtsi bde ba chen po zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ bdud rtsi dman pa'i don du bsgrub par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug cu dgu pa'o//// de nas smra ba dam pa'i mnga'
bdag chen pos bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po mdor bsdus pa'i bsgrub pa rnam pa gnyis bshad kyis nyon cig/ gsang ba'i snod du gyur pa yi// bcud can nges pa'i bla ma yis// dag par gyur pa'i
gnas dag tu// bya ba thams cad rab rdzogs nas// dam pa'i bkra shis dkyil 'khor ni// 'dab ma brgyad pa'i dbus nyid du// bde ba'i khri rten rab mdzes gzhag/ ha nu man ta'i thod pa'am// dum bu gcig

pa bkra shis par// dam pa lnga dang sha lnga dag/ rab dag sbyangs te rnam bkod nas// tho ba'i sbyor bas sbyang bar bya// bcud kyi dam pa sbyang byas nas// dpa' bo ro mchog ldan pas kyang// yang nas yang du bsing

bar bya// lnga yi ras kyis gril byas nas// rdo rje rtse lnga'i phyag rgyas mnan// srad bu lnga dang rab ldan pas// 'phreng ba 'bum phrag bcu gcig tu// bar chad mi med tshig bzlas pa// sgra che ba dang chung ba dang// glal
dang sprid pa grwa chag dang// zur nyams sgra log tu bgad dang// rab rib ma gsal sgra phyogs 'dzin// 'di dag nyes par bcas pa ste// rnam par spangs dang dngos grub nye// lnga yi rnal 'byor bder gnas
pas// mchod bstod bskul ba yang nas yang// dus drug 'dod yon lnga yis su// dngos grub 'dod pas mchod par bya// thun mong gnyis dang khyad par lnga// brtags te spang dang blang ba yi/ khyad par dag ni
shes byas nas// nan tan bde bas bdag la brtan// de nas yang dag bsnyen par bya// des ni thams cad yang dag 'grub// mchog dang thun mong rab nges pas// sangs rgyas sa la gdon mi za// nga yis
gsungs la the tshom med// yang dag la brtson dam pa yi// skyes bu ting 'dzin brtson ldan pas// ting 'dzin bla med gtsor byed cing/ spros pa dag ni rnams spangs pas// phyi rol spyod pa rab tu
spangs// rab tu dben pa'am gar bde bar// gang ltar bder gnad sems kyi dngos// thag gcad rang bzhin mtha' blta bya// rang bzhin mtha' kun rnam par spangs// cha bral cha las 'das pas na// ngang
gis dge gsal spangs med spangs// de phyir tha dad rtog med bde// sgo dgu kun las byung ba'i dbugs// 'byung 'jug dal ba'i sbyor ba yis// je phra je ring nye bar sring// ngang gis zhi bar rab

brtan pas// rlung ni brtan pa rjo rje ltar// snying gi dbus su thim 'bar zhing/ g.yas g.yon bde ba rgyun du 'dzag/ lte ba'i dbus su mi shig pa// nyi ma zla ba'i dbus su shis// sro ma 'dus las bde 'byung
ba// rngub pa'i rgyun las me 'od 'bar// sgrol mas rab bskyod stong gsum brdal/ khyab pa'i thugs rje ser bur g.yengs// phyogs bcur bde gshegs rgyud bskul zhing// sa nas sar 'phar je je
gsal// ris drug rmongs dang chags dang khro// gtum po rmeg med kha rgyud nas// yang yang 'khor ba'i nyes pa rnams// bsil mnyen bde ba'i ros tshim bya// kun kyang nges pa'i sa la
bkod// dal 'byor rnyed nas mi khom spangs// lha mi sems ni gnyis med bskyed// yang dag nges pa'i lam bkod nas/ khams gsum rgya mtsho gting bskams te// nges par byang chub myu gu
bskyed// thugs rje rgyun gyi char phab nas// sngo bskams ljon shing lcug phran rgyas// nges pa'i gal 'gag dga' bas bkrol// dgongs pa mchog gi rlabs gcad de// bya ba med par 'phrin
las rdzogs// bsdams med dam tshig nam mkhar bsdams// gzung ba'i mtha' bral tig le dbyings// b+ha ga yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// phra ba'i sku mchog 'khril 'tsher 'bar// de
nyid brtan pas de la gzung// gal lte srid nas 'phros gyur na// rtog tshogs lha yi dkyil 'khor mchod// gzung 'dzin rtog pa'i rgya mo bsal// rang snang thabs mchog nyams su
blangs// nges pa'i shes sgron khong du chud// bla med bdud rtsi dam pa ste// nges pa'i gdeng rnyed rtags byung bas// rtog med bar chad bgegs zlog go/ rang sems nges rnyed dngos grub
blangs// de 'dra yang dag bdud rtsi ste// bsgrub pa dam pa yang dag bshad// sems de dbyings las lces blangs nas// gur kum dag dang bsres nas ni// dngul chu de yi nyis 'dab
dang// sbyar nas ri lu ci mdzes bya// ta ma lo yi lo ma ru// gril te bdag nyid ci dgar spyad// 'phags pa mchod dang sgrib par sbyang// mkha' 'gro mgu bar bya ba dang// rnal 'byor nges pa sor
gzhug phyir// thabs mchog bdud rtsi bla med de// dpa' bo gcig pur bsgrub pa'o// yang dag thugs kyi bsgrub pa mchog/ 'di gang gnas dus skal bzangs mchog/ rnal 'byor lam la rab gnas zhes// nga

yis nges par gsungs pa'o// dpal bdud rtsi bde ba chen po zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ bdud rtsi nges par bsgrub pa don gcig tu nges pa zhes bya ba dang/ dpa' bo thugs kyi bsgrub pa gcig pa
zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bdun cu pa'o//// de nas sems dpa' nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba zhig 'khor der 'dus te gnas pa las/ de stan las langs te/ sil snyan dang/ rnga bo che dang/ sil krog gi
sgra brgya stong phrag du mas ston pa mchog dang/ sems dpa' dam pa la mchod de/ sems dpa' la smras pa/ sems dpa' chen po nyid ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs las skyes shing
mdzod chen po gyur la/ zhu ba thams cad la ma rmongs pa lags na/ da dung bcom ldan 'das la zhu bar mdzod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ log par rtags pa'i 'khor ba pa'i chos ma lus pa mang/ brtags pa'i

ming la mngon par zhen pa las byung la/ mya ngan las 'das pa zhes pa thar pa dam pa yang de dang 'dra la/ de gnyis kyang bdud rtsi chen po'i dbyings 'gyur ba med cing skye shi dag bral ba'i klong du thag bcad de
gcig ces brjod pa dang bral bar gsungs/ gsung/ gsung bar 'gyur la/ thams cad kyang tshig gis brjod de gtan la phab ste ci lags pa de/ bdag cag gi tshom du gyur pas/ de zhu ba spobs shig/ sems
dpas gsungs pa/ bdag gis ni sngar sngon pa la mang du zhus la/ ci zhus pa de yang bsam pa mthar phyin par mdzad la/ des 'gro ba grol ba de yang/ yang dag pa'i bdud rtsir nges pas/ 'khor ba'i dpyis

phyung bar gyur te yang dag pa'i mtha' la bkod zin pas da zhu bar bya ba ci yang med la/ ci zhu ci gsungs pa thams cad kyang rung/ ma zhus ma gsungs kyang rung bar de kho na nyid g.yos pa 'am/ 'gyur pa 'am/
ldog pa 'am/ gzhan du 'gyur ba ci yang med par da khong du chud pas zhu bar bya ba med do// nyi ma'i snying pos smras pa/ de lta na ci byas pa thams cad stong pa ste/ tshig thams cad kyang

stong la des mtshon du med de stong na snying po med de ci dgos/ slar smras pa/ de lta men te ci bya ba thams cad ni stong pa de nyid las 'byung ste/ dper bya na/ nam mkha' las char pa 'byung bas thams cad kyi gsos su byed pa lta bu'o// nyi
ma'i snying pos smras pa/ ci med pa la yod par mtshon cing 'byung bar 'dod pa ni shes rab 'chal ba ste blun pa'o// smras pa/ ci gtan nas med pa las yod par 'dod pa lta bu ni ma yin te/ med

pa nyid las de ltar brtags kyang gtan nas so sor mi snang ste/ tha dad pa ma yin pas/ cir snang/ ci brjod/ ci ltar rtog kyang de nyid de ltar snang ba ste/ dper na sprin dang/ na bun dang/ 'ja' dang/ khug

rlangs nyid nam mkha' las byung zhing de nyid du dengs pa las mi 'gyur ba kho na bzhin no// de mtshon du 'ang btub ste btags pa'i mtha' la zhen pa'i sgo nas brjod pa gang gis kyang mtshon par nus te dper na

me zhes pas 'tshig mi nus kyang/ dro ba dang/ 'bar ba dang/ 'tshig par brda 'ja' te thams cad du bya ba byed par nges pa bzhin thams cad kyang ngo// de bas na chos thams cad ni tshig go/ tshig thams cad ni

brjod pa'o// brjod pa thams cad ni 'brel pa ste yi ge'o// yi ge ni tha dad pa'o// tha dad pa thams cad ni rang bzhin gyi yi ge a'o// a ni khong nas byung ba ste/ gang la yang ma brten pas thams cad kyi byung

gnas te gzhi'i dam pa'o// de ni bla med snying po bas// spros med khyab pas de bzhin nyid// ma btsal byung bas kun tu snang// don kun sgrub byed rgyur gyur pa'o// brjod tsam nyid na brjod med pas// brjod pa

don gyi gsung mchog go/ nyi ma'i snying pos shes par gyis// nyi ma'i snying pos de skad kyi tshig thos nas rab tu yang dga' zhing 'dun pas/ sems dpa' dam pa de lta bas na brjod pa dang bral ba'i a zhes bya ba
de// don ni ji lta bu zhig/ dbyibs ni ci 'dra ba zhig/ gnas gang 'dra ba zhig na/ kha dog ni ji lta bur snang/ khyab pa ni gang tshun chad tsam/ yun ji srid cig na gnas/ dbye ba ni mchis sam/ don bya

ba'i thabs ni gang ltar lags pa de/ ston pa smra ba'i seng ge la zhu bar byos shig/ de nas ston pa de'i zhal du mig mi 'gyur bar bltas nas gsol ba/ e ma ho/ dngos med brjod bral de nyid las// brjod pa
spros bcas kyis mtshon 'char// ji snyed rjod byed yi ge mtha'// skye dang bcas pa yi ge a// de 'byung dngos rnams thams cad kun// don sogs bshad par mdzad du gsol// de tshe rang byung bdud rtsi

bdag/ yi ge bdag pos bka' stsal pa// a ni skye ba med pa'i dbyings// cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung ba'i gzhi// rang byung dbyer med dngos grub rgyu// nye bar brtan pas yi ge mchog/ chos rnams bya btsal kun

bral te// spros dang bral bas thig le rgya// chos dbyings brdal ba'i ye shes nyid// nam mkha'i mtha' yis khyab pa'o// kun nas zlum pa'i yi ge ni// gsal byed 'bras bu lta bu ste// glang po sna dang shad 'dra
stai// pi wang dbyibs dang seng ge bsgyings// gzhan yang tha dad nges med par// brtags pas gang yang a yi dbyibs// lte ba mgrin snying spyi bor 'brel// ba dag gsang ba'i pho brang ste// rin
chen bse gab nyi zla'i dbus// sro ma tsam gyi bde ba'i 'od// 'dus pa de yi gnas yin no// mthing ka dmar ba la sogs spangs// mdog med mdog rnams kun gyi gzhi// thams cad khyab byed gang yang

mdog/ btags na zla rgyas ba mo 'dra// snod bcud nam mkha' sems rjes 'brang// 'byung da 'byung ba las gyur dang// sa dang ri brag chu bo klung// go 'byed sgra yis khyab pa ru// thams cad bde chen dbyings
su khyab// ji srid nam mkha'i yod kyi bar// de srid rang sems nges par gnas// chos kyi dbyings kyang de bzhin te// a yang de ltar rab tu gnas// de yang so sor mi srid de// dbyer med gcig tu lhun grub
pa'o// 'di las gyur pa'i dbyer ba ni// sgra dag dbyangs dang sgra dang las// so sor nges par bstan pas na// brjod pa'i grangs las rab tu 'das// 'di yis don rnams ji snyed pa// thams cad ma lus rab
tu bsgrub// bla med snying por mngon sangs rgyas// 'di yi rigs lnga gsum dang gcig/ dbye ba'am dbye ba med pa 'grub// rigs lnga 'di nyid dug lnga sel// shes rab rigs kyi dbyings kyang de// dug lnga
bdud rtsi lngar sbyong ste// zhing khams lnga yang de bzhin no// zhi rgyas la sogs 'phrin las rnams// brtsams pas thams cad thams cad 'grub// g.yul las rgyal dang lha men 'joms// thams cad 'grub pa

nyid du bshad// rdza rnga dag la brten pas ni/ 'khor lo sgyur rgyal bral bzhin du// lha dang klu mo la sogs yang// 'khor dang bcas te dbang du yong// brgya byin 'khor bcas bsgo ba nyan// de nas kun 'grub
som nyi med// ces nges par bka' stsal pas/ sems dpa' rdo rje rnon po rab tu tshim par gyur to// de nas sems dpa' nyi ma'i snying pos/ sems dpa' rdo rje rnon po la smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thams

cad nges pa kho nar gsungs pa las/ as mtshon te rdza rnga la brten nas bsgrub pa zhes bgyi ba de da dung khong du ma chud pas de zhu bar mdzad du gsol/ sems dpa' rdo rje rnon pos/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol
ba/ kye bcom ldan 'khor ba'i g.yul bzlog cing// rgyal srid bla med rgyas mdzad pa// rmongs pa rnams la brtser dgongs te// bdud rtsi rdza rnga'i bsgrub pa dag/ bdag cag rnams la bshad du gsol// bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// a ni mtshon pa dag bral te// mtshon med mtshon par bya ba'i thabs// bdud rtsi dri ma med pa ste// bshad kyis gus par mnyan par gyis// rnal 'byor yang dag rab nges
pas// dben la nyams dga' bkra shis par// lhag pa'i rnal 'byor la gnas pas/ khri phrag dgu ru bzlas par bya// man ti sa dang rdza sa ni// cha mnyam phyed phyed gcal nas kyang// ras phran

las ni drang bar bya/ khrus rtsi nyi shu rtsa lnga'i char// btung ba'i mchog gam tshwa yang rung// dri chur bcas pas gong bur bya// dbang thob dam tshig ldan pa'i mis// gsang sngags 'di brjod 'thas par bcag/ oM

badzra pri Ti ba ang gu le 'dza ma ra swA hA/ de nas khrus byas brdzis bcag bya// a ltar zlum po spros med pa// dpangs dang rgya ru khru gang ba// pad+ma'i 'dab ltar 'jam par bya// snying po la brten khru phyed mgrin/ kha

khyer sor bzhi 'theb sor sboms// sor phyed kun tu snyoms par bya// pags pa chen pos rab g.yogs te// 'gar na pa la'i shing gis gdab// phyi nang bdud rtsi rnam lnga dang// tshil chen bsres pas yang yang

byug/ seng ldeng me la bsros nas ni// de nas nyi grib mtshams su bzhag/ bdud rtsi lnga dang sbyar ba yi// tshon gyis rnga la bri ba ni// gcig la 'khor lo brgyad dbus cig/ phyi rol sgras yi 'phreng bas

bskor// snying po'i snying por a bri'o// dang po'i lnga la A+oM hUM AHhUM// swA dang hA ste lnga bri ba// dang 'og dbus kyi snying po la'o// bcu gnyis pa la swa dang rba// pan dang tsa dang a dang ni// mr-i dang ta dang hUM dang

hri// thA dang swA dang hA rnams ni// shar la sogs par de bzhin bri// A li g.yas la kA li g.yon// phyi rol rdo rje 'phreng ba 'bar// gcig la snying por hUM bri ste// mchan du muM dang laM dang maM// pyaM taM shar sogs

de bzhin bri// 'phreng ba'i sngags kyang de bzhin te// rim gnyis gong las bzlog par bya// phyi rol pad+ma dmar po 'phreng// zlum po nyid la bri ba ni// 'khor lo dbus bri gzhan sngar bshad// rin chen pad+ma rgya
gram la// bskor ba rim bzhin ma nor bya// phyi rol bskor ba sngar bshad bzhin// yi ge 'phreng ba'ang de bzhin no// bri ba zin nas gtsang ma yi// gnas su ku sha'i stan la gzhag/ gzhan du grags pa ji

bzhin du// mnga' gsol cho ga rgyas bya ste// bdud rtsi lnga yi chu yis su// gsal byed la ni bkru bar bya// dag pa'i rdza rnga mdun gzhag ste// nyi zla spyang kis gzung dus su// brtsams te lha yi rnal 'byor
gyis// bdun 'bum bdun kri bdun stong dang// brgya phrag bdun du bdun cu bdun// dbugs bsris bar chad med par bzlas// rang snying nyi zla'i bar gnas pa'i// a las sgra byung de bskul spros// bdud rtsi

bskul la rnga la dbab// byang chub sems kyi chu rgyun gyis// stong gsum bkang ste tshim byas na// nye ba'i bsnyen pas rab tu mnyes// grub nas 'od la sogs pa snang// bsgrub tshe rang byung sgra grags te// lus bde
sems g.yo rang bzhin rgod// bsgrub pa chen pos rab brnyes nas// 'jig rten g.yo zhing ldeg pa dang// stong gsum kun tu thos pa'i sgra// dge dang mi dge rang 'dod pa'i// sgra yis sems can
don byed nus// bla ma spong dang theg chen smod// gsang bar 'os rnams bshod byed pa// sgra grags tsam gyis thogs pa med// brgyal dang snying 'gas khrag skyug cing// gso bar 'dod na'ang sgra thos
tsam// bskrad dang gzir dang yul dbyung dang// mkhar dbab ser ba dbab pa dang// lce dbab pa yang sgra yis 'grub// tshe sring gzhon nu bde ba dang// nor spel bgegs rnams zhi ba dang// yul khams

dbang bsdu gter brko ba'ang/ bdud rtsi rnga yi sgra yis so// g.yul las rgyal bar bya ba dang// rta dang glang po dbrog bya dang// 'khor lo lnga de thogs nas su// sa rnams rim par bgrod byas nas// sangs rgyas

sa la sbyor ba yang// 'di grub phan chad the tshom med// bdud rtsi rnga yi sgra yi rgyun// grag pas stong gsum sems can rnams// bsgral nas bla med lam la bkod// de sogs 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das// bya ba

ci yod 'grub pa ni// 'di la the tshom za ba med// de phyir mtshon med chos nyid kyang// mtshon te gtan la dbab par nus// ngas bshad 'gro la phan pa'i phyir// nges par rdza rnga bsgrub pa bshad// dpal bdud

rtsi bde ba chen bo zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ bdud rtsi rnga sgra bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bdun cu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang sems dpa' nyi ma'i snying pos phyag 'tshal te/ sems dpa'

chen po zhu ba po la smras pa/ kye sems dpa' dbang phyug chen po khyod kyis ci dang ci zhus pa thams cad ston pa dam pas sems can gyi don gsungs pas na/ da dung du'ang bdud rtsi sgrub pa'i thabs yod na yang zhu
ba dbu bar rigs so zhes smras pa dang/ sems dpa' thams cad zhu ba po des gsung pa'i bdag nyid seng ge bsgyings pa de la phyag 'tshal te gsol ba/ pad+ma lta bur nyes pa thams cad dang bral ba chen po
gsan du gsol/ bdag cag 'khor 'dus pa rnams da dung tshim pa ma gyur pas/ bdud rtsi sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan dag bshad du gsol/ bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po la sogs pa khyed 'khor

rnams nyon cig/ 'di ltar ste/ bdud rtsi rkang du bsgrub par 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas brag phug stong pa thibs por song la/ bdud rtsi dam pa lnga dang// lcags kyu lnga dang/ ga

pur dang/ su ru'i tsan dan dang/ li ga tur dang/ ka ko la dang/ dza ti pa la ste dri lnga dang/ tsan dan dang// a ka ru dang// li shi dang/ 'bri shi ka li dang/ de ba ru dang/ sgron shing ste dri phal pa lnga dang/ ta ma

la dang/ du ru ka pog dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ lce pog dkar po dang lnga ste spos lnga dang/ gser/ dngul/ mu tig/ byu ru/ mu men te rin po che lnga dang/ stag tsher ba dang/ seng tsher ba/ dbang po lag

pa/ shu dag/ ud pa la ste sman lnga dang/ 'bras dang/ til/ gro/ nas/ sran ma sha ste 'bru lnga dang/ bu ram/ sbrang rgod/ mar lan tshwa/ 'o ma ste snying po lnga dang/ a 'bras rgun 'brum pa na se/ na le ker ya pa ri

bum sha ste 'bras bu lnga ste/ 'di rnams cha bsnyams te zhib par btags la mi'i rkang gis dpol nas/ myos byed kyis kyang dpol te/ mi'i rkang ngam/ bya rgod kyi rkang ngam// glang po che'i rkang gang yang rung ba'i

nang du blugs te/ sing ga'i ras kyis gril nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag ste/ lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas dus drug tu tshogs kyi mchod pas yang dag par mchod de/ bdud rtsi'i 'phreng ban phrog 'du
dang bcas pas bdun 'bum du bar chad med par bzlas na/ du ba la sogs pa rim pas 'byung ste/ dge mtshan rtags ste rung ba dang/ 'phags pa mchod cing bdag nyid kyis 'o ma 'am/ ba'i mar dang sbyar te/
bags kyis bskyed cing zos na/ skra dkar med/ mig rno/ dbang po gsal/ so dam/ lus mnyen la yang/ gnyer ma med/ gdangs snyan zhing lus sra brtan du gyur nas/ ngal dub dang 'du ba'i nad kyis nyen pa

mi 'gyur te/ tshe ring zhing dge ba la bar chad med de/ bdud dang srin pos kyang bar bcad du mi nus te/ rgyal ba'i grangs rigs 'dzin du gyur nas/ lus des sangs rgyas kyi sa lhun gyis grub par 'gyur te/

'di la the tshom cung zad kyang med do// yang bdud rtsi ri lu sgrub par 'dod na/ rnal 'byor pa dbang thob pa/ dam tshig dang ldan zhing sran tshugs pa/ dad pa cha zhing sgrub pa la mos pas/ gnas bkra shis shing bar

chad dang srog chags med par/ yo byad dang ldan pas sgrub pa la 'jug par bya'o// sngon gyi bya ba rdzogs nas 'dul bcad de/ dkyil 'khor gyi las ma lus pa byas nas/ tshon sna lngas rin po che zur brgyad pa

snying po dang bcas pa/ khyams dang sgo khang dang bcas pa rgyan sna tshogs pa bris te/ bla 'og gi rgyan gyis brgyan te bde bar gnas par bya'o// de nas gong du gsungs pa'i rdzas sam/ yang na khu zho ma sha srang gcig

pa zhes bya ba'i sha ma rul ma sums par bskams te phye mar byas pa srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ hU lu ka dang/ shing tsha dang/ pa tra dang/ gan d+ha pa Ta dang/ phra ma na a ke dang/ shan ti ka pus pa dang/ 'gan da

de shwa ra dang/ ka sho kan da dang/ ma hA pa la zhes bya ba dang/ go tsi hA dang/ le na le'i rtsa ba dang/ nA ga pu pa dang/ la phug dang/ sgog skya dang/ hA dkar po'i rtsa ba 'di rnams cha bsnyams pa'i phye ma bsres te
sbyar ba dang/ nye'u shing srang drug cu rtsa bzhi bsdus pa'i khu ba skan de mas sbrus te/ ri lu a 'bra'i 'bras bu tsam srang las mnyam por byas te/ shing stag pa'am/ be'i shun par re re zhing gril
nas/ thams cad mi'i pags par gcig tu byas te ku sha'i chun 'khor la khri'i steng du dbus su gzhag nas/ lha'i sbyor ba yang dag par goms par byas nas/ bkug pa'ang bdag dang de la phab ste mchod cing/

phrum dang bu ram bag tsam gyis 'tsho bar byas te/ 'od zer gyi dri bas bdud rtsi bkug nas de la bcug ste/ dur khrod na gnas pa dang/ sman gyi lha dang/ de'i rigs 'dzin pa rnams la'ang gsol ba btab nas/

bdud rtsi'i 'phreng ba 'bum phrag bdun du bzlas shing/ bya ba mang po'i sems mi bskyed/ mnyam pa las lus kyi g.yeng ba gzhan bskyung/ bzlas pa'i bar chad gang yang mi bya/ lha'i nga rgyal las mi bsam par

bsgrubs na/ dang por 'jam par 'gyur/ dri 'byung de nas dro bar 'gyur/ sgra 'byung/ de nas du ba 'thul/ de nas me lce lta bur 'bar bar 'gyur/ de nas snod dang bcas pa 'phar zhing nam mkha' la lding bar
'gyur/ de nas shun pa rnams rang tshig nas gser dngul bzhu ba'i dngos po bzhin gnas par 'gyur te/ des bde bar gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing rang rnal 'byor dang ldan pas re re zhing mur zhing
bzlas na/ thun mong gong du gsungs pa dang 'dra ba las/ lus mdangs rab tu gsal zhing gser gyi kha dog dang ldan par 'gyur/ mngon par shes rnams dus gcig 'char/ nam mkha' la bya bzhin du 'gro/ sa

dang brag la thogs pa med par 'gro/ rgya mtsho la mi 'bying ste/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal ltar gzhon nu'i cha byad gzung nas rgas pa dang/ rgud pa'i nyes pa cung zad tsam gyis nyen par mi 'gyur te/ bdud rtsi ri

lu bsgrub pa'i thabs mchog go/ gal te skyo ma 'am/ khu ba sgrub par 'dod pas gong du brjod zin te smra mi dgos la/ dkyil 'khor ni 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'o// rdzas gong ma gnyis gang yang rung ba'i steng

du/ ge'u wang srang drug/ a ru ra srang nyis brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga/ gser phye ma srang bcu drug/ dngul de'i nyis ldab/ zangs dngul gyi nyis ldab/ lcags zangs kyi nyis ldab/ de rnams dang mnyam pa'i ldong ros gser

gyi mdog tu 'tsher ba/ bdud rtsi'i chu srang sum brgyar sbyangs te/ lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas/ de bskams kyi bar du bdud rtsi 'phreng ba bzlas par bya'o// de dag rmeg med par gyur pa dang/ tsha 'am/ skyur po

srang brgyad kyis gnyor te/ sor bzhi 'am/ drug gam/ bcu gnyis sam/ khru gang ngam/ mda' gang ngam/ 'dom gang ngam/ nyis 'gyur du je ring je ring ste/ dpag tshad tsam du'ang drang du btub par bzlas par
bya'o// de nas 'phags pa la mchod cing rnal 'byor dang ldan pas bags kyis bskyed cing zos te/ lus kyang bskus nas 'byung ba'i rkyen med par 'dug na/ de bsam pa yid bzhin du 'grub ste/
sems can gyi don ci bsam pa dar gcig la 'grub/ lus la nyi ma lta bu'i gzi brjid 'byung/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams mang po dar gcig la bgrod cing/ bde bar gshegs pa'i zhal mngon du mthong la/ de

dag gis lung ston cing sangs rgyas kyis mdzad pa yang ci bya ba 'grub/ thogs pa med pa'i shes rab kyis pha rol gyi rgyud dgrol bar nus/ lus dang ngag gi sprul pa 'byin cing bden pa ci brjod pa 'grub/ bye ma
dang gseg ma las rin po sil mar bsgyur zhing dbul ba sel nus/ skam sa las chu 'byin zhing/ sol ba las ljon shing bskyed pa la sogs pa 'grub ste/ 'dod na dar gcig gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi sa la

lhun gyis grub cing che ba'i yon tan grub par byed do// 'di ni bdud rtsi lde gur sbyar ba'i thabs dam pa'o// yang rnal 'byor pa mchog la la dag bdud rtsi zhun chen sgrub par 'dod na/ bya ba thams cad rdzogs
par byas te/ zhen chags med par byas pa des/ gnas gang yang rung bar stan med kyang rung ste/ langs pa'am/ tsog pu 'am/ 'phrad dam/ khas bub kyang rung bar 'dug la/ rang gi sems kyi dkyil 'khor

bltas te/ rang byung ji bzhin ma bcos rnam ma'i ngang la mnyam sdoms tsam du spyod lam thamasacad du gnas par bya'o// rdzas thams cad sgyu ma 'am/ mig rgyu ba ltar spang blang med par shes par bya'o// 'on kyang

bdud rtsi dam pa lnga las// byang chub sems ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya las btsal ba'o// gzhan du ni cung zad tsam yang ma yin pa'o// rak+ta ni dang po kho nar pad+ma las 'dzag pa'o// sha ni nu zho ma 'am/ srang drug pa

man chad do// dri chen dang 'dri chu ni/ lus kyi bcud gzhan du ma shor ba'i 'o// de la byang chub sems ni nges pa mes do// rak+ta ni srang brgyad man chad do// sha chen ni de'i bdun 'gyur ro// dri chu ni bsdus pa'i

snying po'ang gong ma bzhin no// dri chen ni nges pa med de ci mdo// de dag kyang rlung dang 'bu srin gyis ma khyer zhing ma rul/ ma rnying/ ma sums pa btags te yang nas yang du btsags pa dang/ a ru ra phye ma srang

drug brgya man chad gcig tu byas te/ zhun chen bdud rtsi chu las btsos te du ba srang re re'i nang du/ gong ma srang re blug pa zho re re nas bags kyis bskyed pa rang bzhin gyis 'grub par byin gyis brlabs te dus

gsum man chad du bza' 'o/ bdud rtsi chu'ang de bzhin te srang gsum gsum mo// ba'i 'o ma'ang ci ran btung zhing/ rang gi shes rab gsal ba'i me long la blta ste/ ma yengs tsam du sgrol ma goms tsam du nan
tan byas na// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rang rgyud la shar nas/ log pa'i lta ba ngan pa rgyud bcad de/ bla na med pa'i byang chub mngon du grub par 'gyur te// ngas gsungs pa 'di dag la the

tshom za bar ma byed cig/ ces smra ba'i mchog gis bka' stsal to// dpal bdud rtsi bde ba chen po zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ sman las grub pa'i rigs 'dzin mchog bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun cu
gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal bdud rtsi bde ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ston pa thams cad mkhyen pa des/ thams cad mi rtog cing 'du 'bral med pa'i dbyings su sdus pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin la bzhugs te/ hUM zhes bsdu bar mdzad do// de'i tshe sems dpa' rdo rje rnon po dang/ gzhan 'khor 'dus pa thams cad rtab rtab por gyur te/ bdag cag gi ston pa bla na med pa/ dam pa'i mdzod rnam

par bkod pa/ gsang ba'i yang dag pa'i gsang ba chen po/ don rnam par bkod pa'i snying po'i yang snying/ smra ba thams cad kyi seng ge chen po 'di 'dra ba gzhan gang dang yang mtshungs pa ma yin pas bdag cag
gis bkur zhing bstod pa'i gnas yin no/ zhes bsams nas mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces rol mo dang pheg rdebs shing bstod pa/ oM/ 'gro kun thugs rje bkod pas rab 'dzin khyab pa'i sku// gang
'dul thabs kyis rol bas mthun pa'i gzugs snang mdzad cing// bde gshegs mtshan dpe 'gran med rab 'jigs me ltar rab 'bar bas// dregs sogs gtan sreg ma lus byang chub lam la 'god

mdzad pa// nyid 'dra gzhan med rdo rje bdud rtsi sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// AHbrjod bral thams cad kun la go bar shugs kyis ston mdzad pa// rnam dag gsung ni cher seng ge nga ro sgrogs shing brjod// lha dang

klu sogs rang skad ji bzhin 'tsham par ston cing 'dul// snyan cing zab ces ka la bing ka la dang 'brug stong ldir// ci gsungs chos sgra sna tshogs char phab thams cad gso mdzad 'dud// hUM/ rab tu zab cing
brtags par dka' la gsal dag de// lhun grub ngang la bskyod pa mi mnga' rang 'byung ye shes gsal// kun 'dus kun gyi bdag nyid mchog nyid rtse mo dbyings// kun gsal khyab pa'i dbang phyug yongs
gsal dri ma bral gyur pa// thugs dbyings gsang bdag kun gyi dbyig gis bdud rtsi nyid la'o// swA/ zad med yon tan dpal 'bar mnga' dbang mchog gi gter mnga' bas// ma rig phongs pa rnams kyi
dbul ba sel cing sangs rgyas dkor ldan pa// stobs chen mnga' ba'i lha ste log pa'i sde 'joms dpung dang rab tu ldan// tshad med dga' ba'i bde bas thams cad byang chub mchog gi lam 'dzud pa// bshes
gnyen dam pa kun gyi mgon du gyur pa'i re gnas dam pa la'o// hA/ 'phrin las zad med bsdu bas ma lus kun tu btul te dpal ldan mdzad// mi gtsang 'dam khung ku mu ta skyes rab mdzes bung

ba bcings grol ltar// nyid ni 'khor ba'i chos la dbang sgyur nyid las gzhan mi dmigs// 'dab rdzas skyon nyid dor med rang byung bdud rtsi gcong rnying 'joms mdzad pa// kun sgrol bdud rtsi gcong rnying sel
ba'i las rab mdzad pa dpa' bo nyid la 'dud// bstod pa mchog gyur dam pa 'dis// rigs kyi bdag nyid chen po la// dgyes bskyed dus gsum bde gshegs dgyes// 'di yi bsod nams brjod las
'das// a la la ho/ zhes bstod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab tu dgyes te mnyam pa nyid la ngam ste bzhugs so// de nas yang sems dpa' rdo rje rnon pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas te

gsol pa/ bcom ldan rdo rje bdud rtsi mchog/ bcom ldan nad sbyong sman pa'i gtso// bcom ldan gsang chen thabs kyi rgyal// bdag cag 'khor tshogs tshim mdzad kyang// ma 'ongs gro la phan mdzad phyir// nan
tan bskyed de gsung bar rigs// ces gsol pa las/ bcom ldan 'das ni ci'i snang bar yang mi mdzad/ ci lta bur yang mi rtog/ c-i'i dgongs pa'ang mi mdzad de mnyam pa nyid la lhan ne bar bzhugs
so// de'i tshe sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rnon po dang 'khor 'dus pa thams cad 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag la sogs pa rnams ni rtog pa'i rgyal mo phyogs gcig bsal nas lam dam par btsud de tshim

yang/ da dung rtog pa mang po'i the tshom yod kyang sel bar mi mdzad pa de bdag cag skal ba chung ba 'dra grang snyam du sems pa dang/ rtog pa de lta bu dag bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs su chud nas bka' stsal pa/
sems dpa' ngas ni tshig gcig tsam yang ma gsungs/ mi gsung/ gsung bar mi 'gyur te/ gsung bar bya ba ci'ang ma dmigs so// gsol ba/ tshig gcig tsam yang ma gsungs na/ bdud rtsi dam pa ji ltar
gtan la phab ste shes par gyur/ bka' stsal pa/ ci bdud rtsi zhes bya ba de'ang nan gyis btags te blo bur ba yin na/ gtan la dbab pa ci yod/ gsol ba/ bdud ces bgyi ba dang/ rtsi zhes bgyi ba dang/

spang ba dang/ blang ba dang/ sgrub pa'i khyad par dang/ grub pa'i 'bras bu dang/ de'i yon tan dang/ ma grub pa'i skyon dag ngo shes shing khong du chud par bya ba de gtan la phebs pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/
de dag nyid kyang btags pa tsam ste/ de kho na nyid ma bcos pa/ ma bslad pa/ ma bsgyur pa/ kun la khyab pa/ so sor ma 'dren pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ rgyu zhes ma btags pa/ lam zhes bgraud du med pa/
'bras bur ma bsgrub pa ste// ye nas gtan la phab zin pa'o// gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das de lta na ci'ang bya mi dgos la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'ang don ma mchis lags sam/

bka' stsal pa/ de de lta ma yin te/ rmongs pa/ ma rig pa/ ma shes pa/ mun par 'khyams pa/ dra bar chud pa/ de kho na nyid khong du chud pa rnams la phan pa'i phyir ngas gsungs ces bya ba'ang/ don gyi snying po

nyid la nyid kyis stsal ba las gzhan du ci'ang ma yin no// de lta na'ang ngas bstan pa'i thabs khyad par can 'di'ang rmongs 'khrul gyi lta ba can de nyid la mi mos pa rnams la tshig gi mtshon tsam yang bsgrags

par mi bya'o// de bzhin du theg pa dman pa dang/ dbang ma thob pa dang/ dam tshig dang mi ldan pa dang/ bla ma la smod pa rnams la'ang ngo// sems dpa' sems dpa' chain po dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ri

gnya' shing 'dzin gyi thog nas 'char ba'i 'od de la ni/ dbye ba 'am/ bsri ba'ang med/ grang ba dang dro ba'ang med mod kyang/ ri nag pos bsgribs pa dang gling bar pa rnams la ni zer tsam yang mi snang

ngo// gcong rong dang nags thibs pos bsgribs pa rnams su ni gsal ba'i ma snang yang dro ba dang mnyen pa mi snang ngo// gzhan sgribs g.yogs kyis bsgribs pa rnams la ni ltang ltong tsam du gnas kyang sa ler

mi gnas so/ kha cig tu ni sal le sang nge ltem me gnas te/ gnas rang gi sgrib g.yogs che chung las nyi ma ni rtog 'dzin dag bral te/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che me tog u pa la dang/ tha na mi gtsang ba'i
'dam khung la dbye bsri med par 'char ba ji bzhin no// de bas na thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir nga'i dgongs pa dam pa 'di sems dpa' chen po khyod la gtad do// legs par gtad do// nges par

gtad kyis/ sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis chud mi gzan pa'i phyir gzung bar gyis shig/ khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir bcang bar gyis shig/ bya ba ci dang ci yod pa 'grub bya ba'i phyir bsgom par gyis shig
ces bka' stsal to// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni gsungs pa bzhin yang rngo mi thogs la/ bka' stsal pa'ang sngas bas glo ba mi spro ste/ da dung gsung bar rigs so// bka' stsal pa/ chos thams

cad kyi rang bzhin ni smra ba las 'das pa ste/ da ci'ang smra brjod med par blo la gtad pas ma smra bar rang gi sems nyid la ltos la 'dug ste kha rog cig/ gsol ba/ dpa' bo chen pos ding slan cad/ smrar med
tshig las 'das par ni gsungs pas bdag cag kho bcad de/ rang rig sems la brtag par bya/ zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas te kha rog ste mi smra bar gnas so// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus
pa thams cad yid gcig tu 'dus te mdangs phyung bag bzhi sa la brdabs te rnal 'byor mchog gi phyag tshul bzhin 'tshal nas gsol ba/ bcom ldan thams cad rnam kun mkhyen// zhe sdang gzer
nag drag po bcom// bcom ldan mkhas pa rtsal du gyur// 'dod chags zhen pa'i btson ra bshig/ bcom ldan rgyal ba yongs kyi mes// gti mug mun par sgron gsal bteg/ bcom ldan lha mi yongs kyis

bstod// nga rgyal ri bo dregs pa'i ri bo bsnyil// bcom ldan rnal 'byor dbang phyug che// phrag dog 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho bskams// bdud rtsi sman mchog a la la// rang snang ye shes a la la/ khyab brdal nad
sel a la la// gsal byed sgrol ma a la la// chos rnga sgra rgyun a la la// bdag cag rnams ni mngon par bstod// dga' dang gus pas bkur bar bgyi// zhes mgrin gcig tu glings nas kha rog ste rang gi
sems la bltas nas 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das ni bdud rtsi dam pa'i dbyings 'phel 'grib med pa la rnal zhing bzhugs so// dpal bdud rtsi bde ba chen po zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ dgyes
par bstod de smra brjod las 'das pas thams cad rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bdun cu gsum pa'o//// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsungs dang/ thugs gsang ba'i ye shes kyi snying po
dpal bdud rtsi bde ba chen po zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po ji snyed par bshad pa rdzogs so////

rgya gar skad du/ shrI badzra a mr-i ta/ ma hA su kha/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ kA ya wAk+ka tsit+ta badzra/ badzra ma hA tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal bde ba chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung

dang/ thugs kyi gsang ba'i yang gsang ba/ rdo rje'i yang rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyal po chen po'i rgyud ces bya ba'o// dpal bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus

gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs gsang ba'i yang gsang ba/ rdo rje'i rdo rje yum gyi mkha' pad+mo'i dbyings na/ rdo rje bdud rtsi byang chub kyi sems bde
ba chen pos brgyan te bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das ma ma ka ri bcas yang dag rnam par rol 'gyur ba yi/ lha yi gsang ba de nyid brjod med shin tu ldan pa'i rnam par brgyan// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud 'di

las thog mar lha'i de nyid 'byung bar 'gyur// rdo rje bdud rtsi bshad pa thams cad mchog 'di bde ba chen po ste// 'di ni bcom ldan bdud rtsi rdo rje bde ba chen po 'grub pa yin// brjod med rtog bral zab
mo'i don chen 'di ni dbang po rnams mi dmigs// rdo rje bdud rtsi bshad pa rgyud mchog re zhi dang rnam par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i rdo rje bdud rtsi mchog 'di ting 'dzin
yul// chags pas bde bas brgyan grags te// gsang bzhi yum ni mA ma ki/ rgyud rnams kun las sbas pa'i ye shes bdud rtsi mchog gi mchog/ de nyid bdag gis bshad par bya ste zab mo'i gling gtsum pa

de// rnal 'byor dam tshig bde las rol pa'i glu tshig 'di rnams brjod// myur ba'i grub mchog lha yi de nyid bdud rtsi nges pa'i rgyu// byang chub sems kyi bdud rtsi 'byung bas 'gro ba kun la skyabs chen
skyob// bsgrub pa'i yon tan 'di bshad pas thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// dbang po kun kyang 'dir 'dus so// mnyam pa nyid kyi tshig gi sder bcas bdud rnams sbyor zhing 'dul ba'i mchog/ sems can
kun la phan pa'i don chen rnal 'byor grub pa'i bdud rtsi yin/ 'khor bcas myur du 'grol ba'i rnal 'byor gyis ye shes nyid byung ba yang/ ye shes chen po dngos grub bsgrub pa 'di ni khams gsum kun las

rab tu bsngags/ sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub chen po 'di ni brtan pa'i mchog/ rdo rje pad+ma mnyam par sbyar ba'i ye shes bdud rtsi 'byung gnas te/ mA ma ki nyid dbyings la rtsum nan te pad+ma rdo rje rtsu pa ta/

'dis ni rdo rje'i rdo rje bdud rtsi mchog ldan bde ba chen po yin// de nas mnyes 'gyur lha mo'i dbyings bcas pad+ma la yang rtsum pa te// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor pad+ma las ni rdo rje bdud rtsi 'byung// de 'dra'i

bsgrub mchog las/ dkyil 'khor mchod pa dam pas rgyan mchod pa// dam pa byas de nyid las ni dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur// de ltar bshad pa'i don las bde mchog de nyid thob pa ste// de phyir bcom ldan rdo

rje'i rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba'i mchog ces grags// bcu gsum pa phul ba yi yon tan mchog ste rab dga'i don mchog 'di rnyed do// lus ngag yid gsum sbyang dka' 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho sgrol bar byed// bde ba

chen po rab tu sbyor ba 'di ni ma ma ki yi sbyor ba yin// gru gsum chos kyi dkyil 'khor ye nas bris pa gsang ba'i pad+ma mA ma ki/ pad+ma 'dab brgyad snying po ze 'brus 'khyol ba'i spyod yul la// de dbus rigs
lnga'i rgyal po zhal gsum phyag drug rnam par bsgom// sku mdog sngo bsangs zhal bzangs dbus mthing g.yas ni gsal// g.yon gyi zhal dmar rin chen la sogs mchog rgyan ldan// 'bar ba'i 'phrang bas sku

brgyan dri dang byug pa mchog la sogs// sku gsung thugs kyis rdo rje phyag gis byed pa dngos grub pad+ma sbyin// dkyil 'khor phyi rims bzhin bkod de// sgo ba bzhin yang rtog 'grel sgrol sgo bzhi// shar phyogs
khro gnyer can te lho phyogs 'jigs byed dam pas brgyan// nub tu rta mchog gzugs te byang phyogs ded dpon chen po bzhugs// rigs pa'i rgyal mo bzhi ni pad+ma'i 'dab ma brgyad la legs bris

nas// de ba zhi byed rab smra zla ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la// zla ba dang ni yi ches sems 'phro dge ba dgod par bya// rigs ma brgyad kyang legs bsgoms sna tshogs gzugs ni rnam shes rgyal byed ma// zhal
gsum phyag drug phyogs kun gsal byed rnam par rgyal byed 'gyur byed yin// dbang gi lha mo bzhi ni bdug pa me tog spos la sogs// glu dang gar dang nye ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis ston rtogs rnal 'byor
ma// gsang ba'i 'khor lo dngos grub thams cad 'dus pas bdud rtsi bde chen po// ma dang bu mo sring mo la sogs bsgrub pa'i gnas mchog dam pa ni// sbas pa bdud rtsi gzhal med khang re gsang ba'i dkyil
'khor mchod pa'i mchog/ gzugs mchog bdud rtsi bum 'dzin dngos grub dam pa 'byung gnas pa'ang// sing mo nad med 'gyur te bu mos dug gsum nad las grol bar 'gyur// stong nyid sbyor mchog don

yod dngos grub dkyil 'khor rab gsal ba// pad+ma'i kha nas rdo rje lces len dngos grub mchog de 'dra'i rol ba myur ba'i dngos grub rdo rje bdud rtsi bden chen po// rtag pa kun sdud thams cad rol pas 'dod

pas dga' dang 'khril la sogs/ rdo rje dkyil mo bsnol te phyag rgya bzhi brkyang mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin// bsdams dang bcings dang mnyam par sbyar ba'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya ni// sha chen khrag chen rdo rje

dri chu dang de bzhin dri chen byang chub sems// rdo rje bdud rtsi mchod rten mchod pas bsgrub pa nyin gcig bzhin du bya// bdag nyid chen po ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin 'grub pas rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// ces

pa'i dngos grub sna tshogs 'byung ba 'di ni 'grub pa dam pa yin par bshad// zhes 'gras rdo dang gsod dang dbang du byed dang dbye dang dbral ba gza' ba dang// bya ba thams cad 'grub par byed pa yin pas

bdud rtsi bde chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsungs dang/ thugs kyi gsang ba'i gsang ba/ rdo rje'i rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon du bstan

pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// yum mchog ma mA ki ni yangs pa'i pad+ma mnyes pa ste// dbang po drug dang gnas drug tsum pa na ste 'phreng ba bstan// gnas bcu drug kyang gtsug gi sgras ni dga' dang bde bas

gsungs te dang ba'i yid// dga' ba'i gad mo bsnyen dang rdo rje rdo rje bcings pa'i 'khor lo che// 'dod cing chags pas zhen pa'i dngos pos rdo rje pad+mar gnas nas ni// snyan cing dang ba'i dbyangs blangs
khu byug sgra ltar dad pa bskyed par bya// rgyal byed lha mo ma ma ki la rdo rje bdud rtsi bde mchog gnas// lag gnyis sen mos gnas drug dpung la sogs brud pas blangs par bya// blangs nas steng

'og bar gnas bstan pa ni ma bzhin rnam par bltas nas ni// dbyings kyi pad+ma tsum pa la ste dga' ba'i tshig dang dbyangs kyis blang// legs so legs so ma ma ki ni pad+ma rgya cher bzang// rab tu dga' ba'i
chags pas mnyes par 'gyur bas gnyis ka bde ba ste// gang 'dod dam pa sbyin pa bshad pa'i lung ni bde bas brgyan// de phyir yum mchog ma ma ki ni rgyan dbyangs 'di bde ba'i mchog tu gsungs// bcom

ldan 'das byang chub sems kyi de nyid bdag ste rnam par brgyan pas bsgyings// zab mo zab mor sgrol ba'i ye shes dbyings su ldan// brjod pas zos par gyur ba'i dbang po dbang po bzhin te de nyid sbyin par

bya'o// dam pa mngon du sbyangs pa 'di ni mchog gi don chen yin par bstan// 'di ni rdo rje bdud rtsi chen po yang dag gnas// rnal 'byor rnam par sbyor ba ma ma ki ni ye shes zag par ldan// shin tu phra zhing
bstan pa'i ye shes rig pa chen po'i gzugs can yin// de ltar bshad pa'i tshig don sangs rgyas byang chub bsgrub pa'i mchog tu bstan// rtag dang mi rtag brjod med zag bral ye nas rnam par spangs pa

ste// yod dang med pa'i dbang por bcas pa'i ye nas dbang po med par bstan/ 'byung ba kun gyi rang bzhin ma mthong rnal 'byor lam gyis mthong zhing rig/ rnal 'byor bsgrub pa gnyis su 'dus te phyi dang nang

du nges// gzugs dang phung po 'byung bar snang ba kun rdzob yin te phyi yi rgya// gzugs la sogs pa sna tshogs bkra bar snang ba khams gsum chags pa'i rgyu// thams cad yod par rtog pas 'dzin pas rnam shes
bkra bas dam por bcings// gang gis sems can rang bzhin rnam par rig pa de zag dang bdag med rtogs// sangs rgyas so sor ye nas gnas pararig pa mi rnams grub pa'i mchog tu nges// sems dang

bsam pa'i de nyid rnam par rig pa de ni ye shes dam pa yin par gsungs// don du grub pa rnams la chos kyi chos nyid don dam 'byung bar 'gyur// gal te sangs rgyas mang po yod par mthong ba de ni sangs mi

rgya// mang po rang bzhin gcig tu 'dus par rtogs pa thar pa'i lam bla ma lung gis// thob par gyur pas bdag gi rnam par gnas// b+ha ga'i dbyings nyid nam mkha'i dbyings nyid yin pas rgyan lnga ye nas tshang

par gnas// pad+ma 'dab brgyad dkar po ge sar ze ba'i snying pos brgyan par mdzes// de dbud stong pa'i rdo rje yang dag bdud rtsi rnam par brgyan// dus dang dus min rnam par ma grol ba ni thig le tsam yang
spangs// dus min 'chi las grol te thig le tsam gyis grub par 'gyur// de nyid rtag tu 'byung ba de ni rdo rje bdud rtsi dkar po'i gzugs// thams cad 'byung bas phyogs bcu thams cad khyab par
gnas/ mnyam pas 'grub par 'gyur ba'i mthong dang stobs las grub pa'i mchog/ skal ldan bde ba'i rig bkang pas khyab par bgrang ste gnas bas gnas// sems sbyong don rig smra mkhas len dang 'dzin

pa med pas grol// 'gro dang rtse dang de bzhin thams cad byed pas rnal 'byor gnas dang bcas// dag pas brgyan pa'i mi ni nyal yang rmi lam yang dag mthong zhing ston// rgod dang ru la sogs pa rtag tu nges
pa'i yid 'phrog nyon mongs byed pa'i rgyu// bzang mor smra dang mdzes par brgyan pas 'dod pas spyod pa'i gzugs// ra ro myos pa'i gzugs dang rmongs pa'i chags pas 'khor bar gnas// dang por snang ba'i
gzugs med skyes pa bud med ma ning la sogs med// sna tshogs gzugs ni nges don gcig gis 'grub ste sbrul gyi mgo ni nor bu bzhin// khyab dang khyab par gnas pa de ni de bzhin nyid mchog bsgoms
pas 'grub// ma ma ki ni thams cad 'grub pa'i 'byung gnas yin pas kun la bsngags// myur dang nye reg spyod pa bgrang 'phreng la sogs yo byad mi dgos te// dbyings kyi pad+mo mnyes par mchod pas mngon

sangs rgyas// sna tshogs dngos grub rnyed pas de phyir rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// rtag tu b+ha ga'i dbyings su rdo rje mchog gi bde bas rab brgyan pa'o// sum cu rtsa gnyis rtsa ste sde dpon gang rtsa// de bas snod
dgu gnas pa bud med sgo ni rtag tu dkyil 'khor gnas// sgo dgu'i mchod pa gnas pas bsgrub pa'i rig pas mchod pa gces// rnal 'byor des par bshad pa'i 'di ni yang dag gsang ba bsgrub pa'i
mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur// mchog tu gsang bar gsungs pa di ni rnal 'byor dam pa rnams kyi yul// mngon sum snang bzhin rang bzhin gsang ba

kun gyis yul men mi gnas ma ma ki/ mnyam pa de nyid rtogs pas rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rab tu gsang ba'i yang dag gsang ba rdo rje'i
rdo rje dpal bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ rnal 'byor gyi ye shes kyi de kho na nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// lha mo rab tu mnyes pa de ni rin chen sna tshogs rnam par 'byung

'gyur te/ 'di ltar sems pa'i dbyings ni sna tshogs dbyangs sgrogs pa// gson cig gson cig rdo rje chen po nye ba'i mchog 'di kun mkhyen gson// bcom ldan rdo rje chen po tshur spyon dbyangs kyi don 'di rnam
par gson// ka kha li dang dar rab snyan dbyangs kyi sgra ni tshigs su bcad do// sna tshogs gzugs 'dzin sgra las gces pa'i don ni drug 'byung ste// snyan pa'i dbyangs sgra mang po shin tu dag dang

bde ba snyed par rol// sangs rgyas byang chub de nyid dam pa grub pas rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// the tshom thams cad gcod pa'i gsang ba de nyid dkyil 'khor rnam par 'byung// de bzhin nyid dag bdag
bstan pas ye shes rdo rjes bya ba thabs cad byed// mchog tu yab yum gnyis ka dgyes pa'i grub par 'gyur// chags pa'i bde bas bcom ldan bdud rtsi rdo rje 'byung gnas mchog/ rnal 'byor rdo rje'i theg

pa thams cad sbyor zhing khyab par gnas// dam pa 'on kyang rtogs pa sbyang phyir phyag rgya'i rol pas rnam par rol par bshad// phyag rgya'i mchog ni rnal 'byor dam pa yin pas kun gyi yul min gsang// snying

po'i don ni lha nyid ldan pas khyab par ldan zhing 'byung// don 'di rnam par sbyangs ba lha yi rang bzhin rtogs shing nges par 'grub// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po// ma ma ki nyid

mngon sum gyur na phyag rgya'i snying po 'byung gnas dam pa yin// phyag rgya'i don nyid gsum du bsdus te lus ngag yid las rnam par 'byung// lus kyi phyag rgya lag pa bskyod dang ngag gi phyag rgya sngags tshigs

yin// sems kyi phyag rgya ting 'dzin yin te mngon sum khyab par gnas// rdo rje bdud rtsi chen po'i rgyud 'dis phyag rgya rnam par gsal// rnal 'byor phyag rgya dang po'i ye shes yin pas mtshan ma'i phyag rgya bris pa

med// mngon sum phyag rgya gzugs rnams yin pas bzang po'i lhas ni rnam par brgyan// dbyings kyi pad+ma mchod pa'i mchog re dbang po thams cad de bzhin gsal// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam par gzhag pas sbyar bas
gces pa thams cad zab pa'i mchog/ ji ltar dpag bsam shing chen las ni me tog yal ga lo 'bras sdong// rtsa ba gang yin zin pa las dgongs pa med 'byung zhing// re ba kun rdzogs de las 'byung ste/ phyag

rgya'i don ni thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyu de ma dang 'dra'o// rig pa mchog gi gnas ni bde ba'i dbyings ni khyab par gnas// de phyir bcom ldan bde ba chen po yin/ ma ma ki la rdo rjes bltas pas gsang sngags

mtshan ma thams cad 'byung// dang por oM sbyor rnam snang la sogs bdud rtsi bde chen dang// sa bon bzhi yis mnyam sbyar bas// sa la sogs pa byed par 'gyur// de yang rnam par snang mdzad sbyin pas gnas
