bdud rtsi shin tu rnal 'byor gyi bdud rtsi/ gnas phun sum tshogs pa'i bdud rtsi/ mos pa yon tan gyi bdud rtsi/ don dam pa'i rdo rje'o// kun tu bzang po'i rdo rje'o// rdo rje dbyings kyi tshogs rang byung ye shes kyi

rdo rje de la rtogs par rig pa/ bdud rtsi 'bab pa ru byed pa/ yab yum thams dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i bdud rtsi/ phung po lnga las bskyed pa'i bdud rtsi/ skye mched lnga las bskyed pa'i bdud rtsi/ khams

gsum grub pa'i bdud rtsi/ dpal rdo rje gzhon nu rang bzhin gyi lhun gyis grub pa'i don la bdud rtsi de rnams grub bo// ye nas bdud rtsi yin pa'i phyir bgrub mi dgos/ sems can lam la 'jug pa'i bdud rtsi

yin/ mngon par rdzogs pa rdo rje lta bu'i bdud rtsi/ de las rtogs pa'i ye shes lta bu'i bdud rtsi/ byang chub kyi bdud rtsi ston pa dang/ rdo rje lta bu dbyer med pa dgongs par mdzad do// thams cad rdo rje phur pa'i

bdud rtsi 'di la/ thams cad bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin/ dngos grub chen po nye ba'i snying po/ rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i snying po yin/ rdo rje phur pa theg pa'i sgo nas byang chub kyi lam la 'dug pa dang/ bdud

rtsi chen po sgrub pa'i thabs/ rdo rje skye ba med pa'i theg pa/ rdo rje gsang ba'i theg pa/ rdo rje 'dul ba'i theg pa/ rdo rje byang chub pa'i theg pa/ rdo rje thig le'i theg pa/ rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi theg pa/ rdo rje che ba'i theg

pa/ rdo rje lam gyi theg pa/ rdo rje theg pa kun la khyab pa yin/ rdo rje rig pa'i lam/ rdo rje grub pa'i lam/ rdo rje byang chub kyi lam/ rdo rje mtshan ma'i lam/ rdo rje bskyed pa'i lam/ rdo rje bgrod pa'i lam/ rdo rje thig

les bgrod pa'i sa/ rdo rje mnyam pa'i bgrod pa'i sa/ sa'i rim pa grangs kyis bkod de// lam gyi rim pa grangs bzhugs so// rdo rje theg pa'i don la thams cad 'grub bo// dper na nor bu rin po che dang 'dra

ste// nor bu rin po che la nor thams cad rang bzhin gyis grub nas yod do// rdo rje ru 'dra ste 'khor 'das thams cad rang bzhin gyis grub nas yod do// de bzhin du bdud rtsi che ba'i mchog/ byang chub sems
mnyam pa'i mchog/ des bstan no/ rdo rje phur pa grangs mang gis kyang/ rdo rje bdud rtsi'i bsgrub pa la/ gnyis su med pa ru bstan/ dbye ru med de tshul gcig phur pa yin// gcig las med de rdo

rje yin/ bstan pa yin/ rdzas rnams yin/ khyab pa yin/ lta ba yin/ bsgom bsgrub yin/ sman gyi dri rnams 'byung/ byang chub kyi don rnyaid/ byang chub kyi don rnyed pa'i thabs yin no// yon tan yin no// mnyam pa

nyid dang rdzas rnams dang/ lta ba bsgom bsgrub kyi nang nas/ de la bstan nas byang chub kyi ngo bo thob pa'i thabs yin no// nges par gsal ba'i don/ rgyas par mthar thug don/ grub pa 'bras bu'i don/ de ni
rtogs pa'i sgo nas so// skye med don 'di brtag bka' ste/ so so brten pa'i nga rgyal gyis// skyes med thob pa shin tu dka'// khams gsum 'khor ba'i rig pa dang// nyon mongs bag chags ched pu yis// rig

pa rtogs par phyir bltas nas// byang chub rim pa rtogs ma gyur// so so nga rgyal ris bcas rtogs par dka'// de la grol ba'i klong nyid shin tu dkon// skye med byang chub rdo rje bzhi las 'byung/ rtogs nas

rig pa'i ye shes gzhi las rnyed// byang chub kyi don ni mthar thug gi lta ba rtogs/ spyod pa'i tshul bsrungs/ nyams myong gi bsgom pa bskyed/ de las logs na gang yang med/ rdo rje phur pa chen po bdud rtsi thal
sbyor gyi rgyud las/ rdo rje'i gzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// bde bar gshegs pas gsungs sems can thams cad la bdud rtsi 'bebs pa las/ bgegs kyi rgyal po ru dra yis// sems can bde ru ma
gter nas// sems can thams cad ma rungs par skyes so// de 'dul ba'i don du bde bar gshegs pa'i byin rlabs las/ dpal chen po rdo rje gzhon nu bskyed nas/ bgegs kyi rgyal po ru dra btul

lo// sems can thams cad bde ba la bkod do// de sems can thams cad bde ba'i ngang la bkod nas/ mnyam pa'i don la spyod do// rdo rje phur pa bdud rtsi thal sbyor gyi rgyud las/ ru dra'i don bstan pa'i le'u
ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas rdzas bsgrub pa ru bstan te/ dang por gnas bstan/ bkra shis pa'i gnas/ bsgrub gnas byin che ba/ dbyibs zlum por 'dug pa/ de gnas la zheng che ba 'dug pa/ sa rong khung

dog par 'dug pa/ de lta bu'i gnas btsal/ de lta bu'i gnas su rdzas bsags par bstan te/ badzra kI la ya la sogs pa'i rdzas/ ji snyed 'byor pa ma lus kun// ma lus de ru sbyar la gzhag/ rtsa ba brgyad dang

yan lag brgyad// rdzas ni khro bo bcu ru bstan// snod ni khro mo bcu ru bstan// pha ni don byed ma ni bkol nas ni// kI la ya yid dbye ba'i yi ge dkyus su srang// bkol ba'i phyag cha ni/ phyag tshang sku ba bcu tham

pa// yang na thod pa bcu gcig gam/ khro bo bcu'i sman rigs kyis dbye// rgyal po bzhi ni rigs dang bstun// nang gi rtsa ba brgyad la/ mig dang rdo rje chu ba nyid shar du// sna dang po lho bde ba lho ru/

lce dang pad+ma nub tu/ rna ba dang tsit+ta byang du/ de ltar dbye/ de'i phrad phy-i yi ra brtsa ba brgyad kyi bya/ lug mig dang khal ba shar du/ sri shing sna smra dbang po lag lho ru/ kha 'bar ma dang rgun 'brum nub tu/ ka sho ka

snying ma sho sha byang du/ de ltar phyi nang gnyis kyang cha mnyam mo// de legs par drod la thabs par bya'o// blon po brgyad ni gros byed ces byed de/ ra sa ya na spyi yin/ rtsa ba dang sdong bu shar/ yan lag dang lo ma

lho/ me tog shun pa nub/ 'bras bu dang snying po byang/ dmag dpon brgyad ni sna 'dren zhes bya ste/ blon po brgyad ni skos 'debs brgyad ces bya ste/ shar du cong zhi rnam pa gsum/ ga pur ram/ nye shing pa 'am/

bu ram ka ra de rnams gcig tu dril ba de nang gi blon po'o// des ni tshad mnyam po mnyam por bya'o// dmag mi rnams ni/ ram mda' byed ces bya ste/ shar du 'gro ba ni/ lan tshwa/ dom mkhris/ rus thal 'bras
bu lnga bsgral ba'i rus thal/ til dkar po/ gshed ma shu dag dkar po/ thang dpal ha cang tsha sna tshogs kyi rus thal/ byi la/ bya rgod/ khrag nag po/ shang shang/ rma bya/ ngang pa/ ko li/

la phug/ thang dkar po rnams so// lho'i dmag dpon rnams ni/ a ru ra/ brag zhun/ mkhal zho sha/ gla gor zho sha/ tri tra kha/ ka ko la/ skyes pa'i sa ra/ brgyas rang gi blon po dang cha mnyam mo// skyobs su 'gro

ba ni/ mo la dri chen/ yungs kar/ gser phye ma/ bsgral ba'i sna thams cad do// nub kyi dmag dpon ni/ dkar nu/ tsan dan smug po/ ram bu ched pu kha 'bar ma'o// nyid kyi lce/ skyu ru ra/ de rnams mi shing/ de

rnams brgyad ni blon po dang cha mnyam mo// skyobs sbrang rtsi/ rak+ta nyi shu rtsa lnga/ byang gi dmag dpon gur kum/ gu gul dkar nag/ gnod sbyin stobs bzangs kyi mig/ le'u mig/ thar nu/ bya rlung/ rul thal/

brgyad ni gong blon po dang chas so// skyobs ni bsgral ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang/ ka sho sna da dang/ de la sogs pa'i ra sa ya na kun/ ro dang kha dog gis dbye ste/ mngar ba dkar ba shar/ ser ba kha ba lho/

skyur ba dmar ba nub/ lnga bab tshe ba byang/ shar la sogs pa rang rang gi snod gsos ma/ rigs so so'i don gyis kha bcad do// 'khor lo phyogs su dgod do// rigs de ltar du dbye ba yin// sman grangs kyis
btsal/ de ni bdud rtsi che ba'i yon tan ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa yin no// thams cad snang ba dang mi snang ba gnyis su med do// de khams gsum du skyes pa thams cad bdud rtsi grub
pa'i thabs/ thugs rje'i byin rlabs chen po/ bdud rtsi lam gyi mchog/ de lta bu grub pa'i lam de ni/ gsang ba'i rdzas lnga la sogs pa dang/ rdzas thams cad ni bshad pa'i rgyud kyi 'grel ba'i nang

du bstan pa'o// rdo rje phur pa bdud rtsi thal sbyor gyi rgyud las/ rdzas bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bsnyen bsgrub rnam pa gnyis las/ bsnyen pa'i las sngon du 'gro ba dang/ khrol bu dang/ gong bu

dang/ sngon du 'gro ba'i las dang por stegs bu brtsig par bstan te/ maN+Dal mda' gang gru bzhi la// steng gi tshad dang 'og gi tshad// tshad du gcal la btsig gi/ de nas rdzas rnam pa lnga'i tshad du chag chag gdab

bo// ci'i skyon gyis ma gos pa'i phy-ir ro// de chag chag gdab pa'i phyir/ oM bo d+hi tsit+ta maN+Dal hUM/ oM ku ku maN+Dal hUM/ dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bo dag par bsam/ oM ma hA maM sa la hUM/ oM rak+ta maN+Dal hUM/ oM ku ku

maN+Dal hUM/ chag chag de rnams gdab bo// de nas sgo lung gdags pa dang/ kun bshad pa'i rgyud du bstan no// dam sri dang/ sgo lung dang/ phyi sngon du 'gro ba rnams/ thig rnam pa gnyis kyis byin gyis brlabs

pa dang/ tshon byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ de nas de rnams ni shar du bstan/ rdzas dgod pa ni le'u gsum pa'i rjes su bstan pa yin no// mtshams gcad pa ni/ dang po stong pa nyid las huM mthing nag tu gyur/

de las 'od 'phros pas rdo rjer gyur/ de las 'od 'phros pas 'od du zhu/ de las/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/ rdo rjer gyur/ de las/ ma sUr+ya maN+Dal hUM/ phyogs bcur nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor

bskyed// oM badzra kro d+ha hUM ka ra hUM/ khro bo bcu'o// hUM/ thog mdzad hUM mdzad smyo 'dul rgyal// sreg byed g.yug dang sgrol byed gshin rje gshed// gnod byed mgon dang dbang sdud de// sgrol byed gshe dang gnod

byed stobs// oM badzra kro d+ha hUM kA ra hUM gardza gardza hUM phaT/ da ni thod pa'i byin gyis brlabs// thod pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo ru bsam// de'i ngang las rig pa'i ye shes gsal bar bskyed// gtso bo nyid du byin

brlabs nas// badzra kI li kI la ya sarba bag+h+nIn baM hUM phaT/ ces gtso bo bskyed par bsam/ spyan drangs te/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ rdo rje gzhon nu rigs 'dzin rnams// srid pa rdo rje grub mdzod cig/ srid pa rdo

rje phur pa'i lha// ye shes khro bo gshegs su gsol// oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ srid pa'i phur bu bsgrub pa dang// dbang dang dngos grub blangs pa'i phyir// hUM hUM zhes thod pa la thim par bsam// da ni thod pa
dgod de/ bdud rtsi sman sbyar nas// sul med chos kyi dbyings su rtogs// byang chub sems su sman sbyar nas// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa rnams// badzra kI la ya ru byin brlabs nas// rang byung bdud rtsi
sman sbyar nas// rdo rje gzhon nu'i thugs dam skongs// dbus su brtan par bzhugs nas kyang// rang byung bdud rtsi'i dngos grub gsol// oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba beg+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/ oM a mr-i

ta kuN+Da li hUM phaT/ sa ma ya tiSh+ta lhan/ dbus su bzhugs par bsam/ hUM/ shar gyi ban d+ha sul 'greng du// dri chen mchod pa sbyar nas su// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa rnams// bud+d+ha kI la ya ru byin gyis

brlabs// rang byung bdud rtsi sman sbyar nas// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i thugs dam rgyal// rang byung bdud rtsi'i dngos grub gsol// oM bud+d+ha kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/

hUM/ lho yi ban d+ha sul mangs su// maM sa mchog la sman sbyar nas// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa rnams// rat+na kI la ya ru byin brlabs nas// lho ru brtan par bzhugs nas kyang// rang byung bdud rtsi dam rdzas

gsol// oM rat+na kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM tha/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ hUM/ nub kyi ban d+ha zla gam du// rak+ta mchog las sman sbyar nas// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa rnams// pad+ma kI la

ya ru byin brlabs nas// nub tu brtan par bzhugs nas kyang/ rang byung bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu gsol// oM pad+ma kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/ kuN+Da li hUM thA/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ hUM/ byang gi ban d+ha sul

'greng du// dri chu mchog la sman sbyar nas// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa rnams// karma kI la ya ru byin brlabs nas// byang du brtan par bzhugs nas kyang// rang byung bdud rtsi'i dngos grub gsol// ha karma kI

li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM thA/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ ra sa ya na dgod de/ rang byung gdod nas rnams dag thA/ bdud rtsi lnga dang rtsa ba brgyad// yan lag stong dang rab bsnyems pa'i// 'o
ma dang ni chu rnams dang// me tog rin chen mda' rnams dang// 'jig rten 'di ru grags pa rnams// 'khor gyi khro bor byin brlabs nas// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i thugs dam skongs/ phyogs mtshams brtan par

bzhugs nas kyang// rang byung bdud rtsi'i dngos grub gsol// oM badzra kro d+ha hUM gardza hUM phaT/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM tha/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ mar me dgod de/ hUM/ thugs rje chen po'i ngang nyid las// thugs mchog
rab tu gsal ba'i phyir// ma rig mun pa 'joms pa'i phyir// 'khor ba'i bag chags gsal ba'i phyir// dbus su brtan par bzhugs su gsol// sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ rdzas dang rgyan dgod/ hUM/ thabs

kyis spyod pas 'gro don du// byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba// sangs rgyas 'phrin las rdzogs mdzad nas// dbang dang byin rlabs 'dir stsol cig/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/ sid+d+hi sid+d+hi
sa ma ya lhan/ rdo rje phur pa bdud rtsi thal sbyor gyi rgyud las/ rdzas rnams rdzogs par btad pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de ni bdud rtsi dbab par bstan te/ thod pa las rdo rje gzhon nu gsal

bar byas la spyan drang/ hUM/ rdo rje gzhon rigs 'dzin rnams// srid pa rdo rje grub mdzod cig/ srid pa rdo rje phur pa'i lha/ ye shes khro bo grub par mdzod// ye shes khro bo bdud rtsi thob// nam mkha' gsal bar

bzhugs par bsam// oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/ amr-i ta kuN+Da li/ ha na ha na/ phebs phebs/ zhes brjod do/ thod pa bdud rtsi rnams rang bzhin gyis grub nas yod par bsam mo/ khrol bu'i

'phrin las bstan te/ chos kyi sku'i phrin las ni/ thams cad grub par 'gyur te/ khrol bu'i dkyil 'khor ni/ de 'khor lo bri'o// spyan drang ba'i lha'o// byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ phyi mtshams dang/ sgo byang

gdags pa dang/ phur pa dar gyi cod pan can rta mgrin du bsam la/ bsgrub pa'i khang pa'i sgo la gdags pa dang/ zla ba yar gyi tshes brgyad la/ dkyil 'khor bri ste// stegs bu bum pa khru gang pa/ rtsigs su

byas la dri chen dri chu byug/ dri yi rgyal po lnga yis byug/ phyogs bzhir dkyil 'khor bri'o// dri sna lnga yis maN+Dal bya// de nas thig gdab pa kun dang mthun// de nas brtags pa'i bgegs bzlog/ thig gdab pa

dang/ tshon bri ba dang/ yab yum thams dang shes rab las bri ba yin no// dkyil 'khor bri bar bstan zhes bya'o// bkra shis de las bdud rtsi'i snod bstan te// bkra shis rus sbal thod pa 'am/ mtshan dang

ldan pa'i ban+d+ha la/ phyogs bzhi dbus su dgod par bya/ mtshams su rigs mthun thod pa dgod// sman gyi grangs ni thod pa blugs/ hUM gis sman gyi snying po bskyed// gtso bo lnga dang 'bras bu lnga// phyogs na gsang

ba'i rtsa ba brgyad// rang rang skabs dang sbyar bar bstan// shar gyi dkyil 'khor steng du ni// sgrub pa'i rdzas rnams dgod par gzhag/ lho yi dkyil 'khor steng du ni// me mar dag la dgod par gzhag/ nub kyi

dkyil 'khor steng du ni// gtso bo yab yum sbyor ba'i thabs// byang gi dkyil 'khor steng du ni// bsgral ba'i rgyu ma zhags par gzhag/ dar sna bzhi dang me long bzhi// phur pa dang ni ral gri dang// lho'i dkyil

'khor steng du ni// de nas phur pa dar gyi cod pan can du bsams la mtshams gcad de/ dang po 'byung ba'i rgyu stong pa las rgyu'i hUM du bskyed/ de las spa ra na phaT kyis rdo rje gyur/ de las yang 'phros pas 'od du

zhu bas/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/ ces rdo rje gyur par bsam/ dngos grub bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' las ni// sdig can

gang zhig 'da' byed pa// stobs chen khro bo chen po yis// klad pa tshal pa brgyad du khos// oM badzra kro d+ha hUM kA ra hUM/ zhes pa des khro bo 'dre'o// oM badzra kI li kI la ya ha sa yar na ha ta n+ye hUM phaT/

sras mchog drug 'dre'o// 'byung po dang ni bgegs ni des bkrad do// hUM/ rdo rje gzhon nu rigs 'dzin rnams// srid pa rdo rje grub mdzod cig/ srid pa rdo rje phur pa'i lha// ye shes khro bo grub par mdzod// hUM hUM

zhes pas bdud rtsi'i lha phebs par bsam/ bdud rtsi byin gyis brlabs pa ni/ gong du bstan pa ni/ de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin bskyed de/ ting nge 'dzin gsal zhing snying po brjod de/ ye shes bdud rtsi'i rgyun

mi gcod/ dang po stong pa nyid las yun ring du bsgom/ bzhi chos nyid kyi bsgom pa/ de ngang las gsal ba nam mkha'i bsgom pa/ rgya ma chad par bsgom pas rig pa gsal ba'i bsgom pa/ de las rgyu'i hUM mthing

nag tu bskyed do// hUM rdo rje khros pas zhes sdang gcod// e yaM keM ri/ b+h+ruM bi sha bi shud+d+hi/ e ag ne maN+Dal/ dz+nyA na ka ba la b+h+ruM/ des ni gzhal yas khang bskyed do// hUM nam mkha'i dkyil nas thig pa shar// hUM hUM
zhes pa bdud rtsi'i lha rnams gzhal yas khang gi thod pa la bstim mo// hUM/ mtshon chen sngon po 'bar ba yis// srog gi go ru shar ba dang/ snying gi go ru bsgom par bya// phur pa rdo rjes gtam

byas nas// rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya ma hA pany+tsa a mr-i ta hUM hrI thA/ zhes lha rnams gsal bar bskyed do// hUM/ thabs kyi spyod pa 'gro don du// byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul

ba// sangs rgyas 'phrin las rdzogs mdzad nas// dbang dang byin rlabs bdag la gsol// oM AMHhUM/ sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku// ngang nyid rdo rje chos dbyings las// 'bar ba'i khro bo mi bzad pa// oM
sku'i dbyig tu bdag bskyed cig/ aM gsung gi dbyig tu bdag bskyed cig/ hUM thugs kyi dbyig tu bdag bskyed cig/ hUM de nas yig 'brus kyang bskyed/ yig 'brus phyag kyang dbang bskur/ gsal bar bsgom/

de rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'o// de nas khrol bu sbyang ba ni// 'byung ba bzhi las bskyed pa yin// yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba las// 'od zer lnga po 'phrau 'du las// snying po la ni 'di brjod do// oM

badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nA baM hUM phaT/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM hri tha/ byin brlabs bdud rtsi 'bebs par bsam// oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nA baM hUM phaT/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM tha/ shar gyi lha 'di dngos grub

'bebs// oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM tha/ lho yi lha yi dngos grub 'bebs// oM rat+na badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM thA/ nub kyi lha yi
dngos grub 'bebs// ha badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM phaT/ byang gi lha yi dngos grub 'bebs// sman gyi bzlas pa de nyid ni// yab yum gnyis kyi dgyes bar

bzlas// thabs dang shes rab spyod pa'i sngags// de la byang chub bdud rtsi re// bdud rtsi byin rlabs 'bebs pa'o/ khrol bu'i dngos grub blang bar bstan te// de bzhin rdo rje rigs kyi lha rnams dang// rin chen

pad+ma'i lha rnams dang// las kyi rigs kyi lha rnams dang/ khro bo rigs kyi lha rnams dang// de rnams dngos grub stsal du gsol// bdud rtsi 'bebs pa'i dngos grub gsol// rdo rje phur pa bdud rtsi thal sbyor gyi

rgyud las/ bsgrub pa'i gzhung dang khrol bu bsgrub pa'i don bstan pi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// da ni gong bu brdung bar bstan te// brdung ba'i dus ni/ nyi ma shar ba'i dus dag tu// sman gyi gong bu bshig la
brdung// brdung ba'i dus der yang bgegs 'jug pas mtshams gcad do// go mtshon mang po bsogs la yang/ bskor zhing bri brdung ngo// tshangs pa'i rgyal pos gdan bting la// de ru thams cad zhugs la/

yab la nyi ma'i thod pa yis// yum la zla ba'i thod pa ru// brdung ba'i thabs ni yab yum thabs dang shes rab kyis brdung ste/ brdungs pas nyes pa spangs la byin rlabs 'byung ste/ sman gyi byang chub de ru

bskyed// sman gyi byang chub skye gyur cig/ da ni brdung ba'i lha dpal bdud rtsi 'khyil par bskyed la/ thams cad bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin yin pa la// ting nge 'dzin gsal bar byas la/ yab kyi rdo rje yum gyi mkha'

la brdung ste/ sngags ni/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ sman gyi bcud gcig 'byung bar bsam// hUM/ khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du// rdo rde tho bas
brdungs byas nas// lha yang rung ste bsgral bar bya'o// yab yum gnyis su med pa las// gnyis su med pa'i mkha' las bsam// bdud rtsi byang chub phebs par nges// dngos grub phebs pa'i yum cig
yin// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// dri med mu tig dkar por 'tsher// de la sman gyi snying po 'byung// da ni dar tshags yum gyis bzung bar bstan te/ yum gyis rig pa gsal ba dang// rta mgrin

dbyug pa sngon po gnyis// gang yang rung ba gcig gis bya// gtsag pa'i sngags ni/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/ ha na ha na hUM phaT khro bo chen po'i byin rlabs phebs byas la

gtsag/ da ni phabs gdab ste/ chu dang/ 'o ma dang/ mngar bag dang/ phabs rang dang gdab bo// oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li gardza/ ha na ha na pa tsa/ ban d+ha gr-i h+Na ti ta tsin+d+ha/
b+hin+d+ha pho Ta hUM thA/ sman gyi dngos grub yin par bsam/ da ni tshad bstan te/ skam dag rlon pa'i nyed pa med// bskams nas phur bur ma song ste// rlon nas 'das par ma song ste// tshangs du 'dug
nas dngos grub blang// dar ram za 'og nang du blugs// de las nyes pa'i skyon yang med// de nas rgyas gdab ste/ gong bu la phur pa byin gyis brlabs cig de ru gzhug/ de bzhugs bgegs kyi 'jug mi

nus// phur bu'i lha bskyed srungs mar bsam// snod ni brtag cing kha sbyar nang du gzhug/ dri mas ma gos snod du gzhug/ dus tshod la bab par shes par bya/ ma sngas ma 'phyis dus dang sbyar// gong bu la

bsgrub ba ni/ 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi bris/ gru chad dang rgyan thams cad kyang dgod 'phags pa mchod pa dang/ gtor ma gtang ba dang/ sbyin sraig dang/ rgyas pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ drag po dang/ thams cad tshul
bzhin gong du 'dres// de la bgegs kyis mi tshugs pa'i phyir/ gu gul gyi dud pa gtang/ dgod pa ni dbus nas rang byung ye shes sems dpa' bskyed pa'i lha/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya// snang srid
bdud rtsir byin brlabs nas// rtsa ba brgyad dang yan lag stong// rtsa brgyad stong las sbyar ba'i sman// pho brang chen po'i dbus su bsgyil// rigs rnams bsdus nas dbus su bzhugs// dbus sam phyag cha
gdug pa 'dus// thams cad ma lus 'dus par bya'o// sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ dbus su rang bzhin med pa ru dgod do// rdzas byin po dgod pa yang/ 'phrin las thams cad gong du mthun/ til chen gyi me mar

rgyun du gtang/ de nas 'dzab gong ma mthun par bya/ ting nge 'dzin mi mthun no// de nas bstod pa bya/ tshogs bya/ dngos grub blang ba dang/ sman gyi drod brtag pa dang/ yum rigs dang sbyar ba dang/ 'phrin las

mthar phyin pa dang/ kun tu mthun pa ru bstan no// rgyud 'di ru ni 'phrin las zur tsam mo// bkra shis gsol ba dang/ tshe bya ba dang/ dbang bskur ba dang/ lhag ma'i cho ga bya ba dang/ bstan ma bskyang ba dang/

gter du sba ba dang/ kun mthun no// rdo rje phur pa bdud rtsi thal sbyor gyi rgyud las/ bdud rtsi shar ba'i bsgrub lugs su bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas dbang bstan te/ dkyil 'khor ni/ 'khor lo

rtsibs bzhi ru bri/ rdzas ni phur pa dang/ sku tsa ka li dang gsung yig 'bru dang/ thugs phyag mtshan dang bsag go/ de nas bgegs bskrad de/ hUM/ rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' las ni// sdig can gang zhig 'da' byed

pa dang/ stobs chen khro bo chen po yis// klad pa tshal pa brgya ru khos// nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren tshogs// nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed// oM ma ra ya kha thaM kha thaM/ zhes bgegs bskrad do// de nas
byin dbab ste/ thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro don du// byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba// sangs rgyas 'phrin las rdzogs mdzad nas// dbang dang byin rlabs bdag la stsol// hUM hUM zhes byin phab/
de nas rdzas kun dgod/ sman dang rak+ta yang byin gyis brlabs/ ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum bsgom ste/ dang po de bzhin nyid bsgom/ kun tu bsgom/ rgyu'i ting 'dzin bsgom/ rdo rje khros pas zhe sdang

gcod// mtshon chen sngon po 'bar ba yis// srog gi go ru shar ba dang// snying gi go ru bsgom par bya// oM yaM spar na yaM raM keM raM bruM bi shud d+he/ e maN+Dal dz+nyA na tsakra bruM/ nam mkha'i dkyil nas thigs par shar/

phung po rdo rje gtams byas nas// rnam par shes pa rdo rje bsgom// yab yum gnyis gsal bar bskyed do// hUM/ rdo rje gzhon nu rigs 'dzin rnams// srid pa rdo rje grub mdzod cig/ srid pa rdo rje phur pa'i lha// ye
shes khro bo grub par mdzod// se gol gtogs/ srid pa'i phur bu bsgrub pa dang// dbang dang dngos grub blang pa'i phyir// ye shes khro bo gshegs su gsol/ dzaH hUM baM ho/ thabs kyi spyod pa 'gro don
du// byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba// sangs rgyas 'phrin las rdzogs mdzad nas// dbang dang byin rlabs bdag la gsol// oM AMHhUM/ byang chub mchog tu sems skyed cing// dus gsum rgyal ba'i gdung

'tshob pa// rigs 'dzin bdag cag rnams la ni// rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang// kI la ya yi dngos grub stsol// rdo rje gzhon nu'i dngos grub stsol// oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ oM

badzra kI li kI la ya/ kI la ya yi dngos grub stsol// ye shes khro bo gshegs nas kyang// rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang// kI la ya yi dngos grub stsol// hUM hUM oM badzra kI li k-I la ya/ mahA pany+tsa a mr-i ta khA hi/

sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/ ma hA pany+tsa a mr-i ta khA hi/ hUM/ byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing/ dus gsum rgyal ba'i gdung 'tshob pa// rigs 'dzin bdag cag rnams la ni// kI li ya yi dngos grub gsol// oM

badzra kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/ ci mang du bzlas so// de nas 'dzab la yang bstod do// de nas tshogs bya ste/ ci 'byor pa bteg la/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ ces pas nyes pa'i skyon thams cad spangs la/

oM a be shas spe pa la spros/ dzaH hUM baM hos dgug/ shi kri a nas bcings la/ dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab// sprul pa chen po'i dus la bab// phyag brnyan tshen po'i dus la bab// shwa na mu kha'i dus la

bab// bdag nyid chen po'i dus la bab// sa bdag rgyal mo'i dus la bab// khyed kyi dam tshig dus la bab// mthu rtsal dbyung ba'i dus la bab// badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn/ ta tha ya ma ra sa na ya kha kha thaM/
tshogs bcad la/ dpal rdo rje gzhon nu'i zhal du kha raM khA hi/ yum chen mo 'khor lo rgyas 'debs ma'i zhal du kha raM khA hi/ zhes sgrub pa zhag gsum bya/ de nub tha ma la dbang bskur te/ cho ga

gzhung spyi dang mthun/ dbus kyi rdo rje gzhon nu'i phur pa blangs la/ ho/ rnal 'byor pa 'di gsang sngags kyi sgor zhugs nas// yi dam gyi lha dpal rdo rje gzhon nu la sogs te rdo rje gzhon nu'i dngos grub thob
par gyur cig/ yum gyi rdzas blangs la/ ho/ rnal 'byor pa 'di dgyes par spyod pa'i yum 'khor lo rgyas 'debs kyi sgor zhugs nas/ yum 'khor lo rgyas 'debs kyi dngos grub stsol/ byang chub mchog tu sems
bskyed cing/ dus gsum rgyal ba'i gdung 'tshob pa// rigs 'dzin bdag cag rnams la ni// kI la ya yi dngos grub gsol// yab yum rgyan rnams dngos grub stsol/ yab yum rgyan dag cha lugs kyis dbang

bskur ro// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku// ngang nyid rdo rje chos dbyings las// 'bar ba'i khro bo mi bzad pa// sku yi dbyig tu bdag bskyed cig/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ zhes sku tsa ka li'i dbang bskur te/

gong gi tshig brjod la/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya// gsung yig 'bru yis dbang bskur ro// gong gi tshig brjod la/ thugs phyag mtshan gyis dbang bskur ro// de ltar yab yum gyi dbang rdzogs pa dang bkra shis
gsol/ dngos grub blang/ gtor ma gtang/ dkyil 'khor bsdu/ de ni yab yum gsang ba'i dbang rnams thob gyur na/ 'khor gyi khro bo rnams kyi dbang rnams zhor la 'byung ngo// de ni gsang ba'i dbang yin

no// rdo rje phur pa bdud rtsi thal sbyor gyi rgyud las/ yab yum gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yab yum thabs dang shes rab kyis dbang bskur bar bstan te/ maN+Dal mthing nag

gru gsum pa gcig bya rdzas ni rdo rje tho ba dang/ gtun shing btsal/ rdzas kyi ra ba yab ni rtogs pa che ba dang/ yum ni skra lo bzang la so thags dam// lus po cha snyoms rke pa phra/ yid du 'ong ba'i yum

bya// bsgrub pa mtshams gcad pa rnams spyir mthun te// bzlas pa'i sngags ni/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ oM laM hUM laM staM b+ha nan sa ma ya phebs/ byas kyin bzlas so// de nas 'dzab bskul ba ni/ yab yum lag
pa spel ba dgegs pa spyod de// rdungs shig rdo rje 'bar ba'i gtun// yab kyis chags pa che ba'i nga rgyal bskyed// bka' las 'da' byed sdig can rnams// nyon mongs pa'i bag chags sam// nyams pa po de'i
mig yin par bsam// rdo rje me dbal snying bsregs nas// yab kyi rdo rje me'i dpal bas tsha ba yi// lus ngag rdul phran bzhin du rlogs// nyon mongs bag chags rdul du rlogs/ khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung
du// yab kyi chags pa bskyed pa yin// yum gyi mkha' de bskyed pa yin// rdo rje tho bas brdungs byas nas// yab kyi rdo rje yum gyi mkha' la brdung// lha yang rung ste rlag par byed// nyon mongs bag

chags rlag par 'gyur// yum gyis yab la 'khyud/ yab kyis yum la 'khyud/ rdo rje mkha' la phab/ byang chub sa bon drangs/ dran rtog gi rtog pa bcad/ de ba mnyam pa la gzhag/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba

big+h+nAn lam stam pa nam sa ma ya phebs/ ces sngags bzlas pas byang chub 'byung ngo// bstod pa bya'o// tshogs dang/ lhag ma dang/ dkyil 'khor bsdu ba ni kun dang mthun no// rdo rje phur ba bdud rtsi thal sbyor
gyi rgyud las/ thabs shes rab kyi bsgrub pa ste le'u brgyad pa'o//// de nas rgyud 'byung bar bstan te/ dam pa byang chub sems nyid ni// nges par 'byung ba'i rgyud yin te// rgyud 'di dam pa'i chos las

'byung// chos 'di rig pa'i ngang las 'byung// rig pa byang chub rten 'brel yin// gsang ba byang chub kyi rgyud// rdo rje skye med kyi rgyud/ chos nyid dag pa'i rgyud/ thig le byang chub kyi rgyud/ bdud rtsi byams ma'i

rgyud/ sgrol ba khro ba'i rgyud/ nges pa rdzas kyi rgyud/ 'brel pa srung ma'i rgyud/ 'khor ba srog snying gi rgyud/ dgyes pa ston pa'i rgyud/ gzhi rang byung grub pa'i rgyud/ thig le'i rgyud/ snang srid bdud rtsi'i rgyud/ de

dag thams cad yang dag pa chos nyid phur pa las 'byung ba'i rgyud do// rgyud la rgyud du las pa med/ rigs pa 'gro ba'i rgyud du bstan// rdo rje phur pa bdud rtsi thal sbyor gyi rgyud las/ rgyud 'byung ba'i le'u ste
dgu pa'o//// chos nyid rnam par dag pa dang// shes rab blo ldan bsgrub pa yis/ rig pa rtogs pa'i dam chos kyang/ shes rab blo ldan de la gtad// ma rig kun la gtan mi bya// 'bras bu thob bya'i bdud
rtsi 'di// skal ldan gcig la gtad par bya// lam du 'jug pa'i bdud rtsi 'di// las 'phro can la gtad par bya// sa las bgrod pa'i bdud rtsi 'di// dam tshig can la gtad par bya// gnyis med thob pa'i

bdud rtsi 'di// rtog pa can la gtad par bya// bdud rtsi dam pa'i lam la 'jug/ las dang skal ba ldan pa la// dam chos 'di dag 'phrad par shog/ rdo rje phur pa bdud rtsi thal sbyor gyi rgyud las/ rgyud gtad
pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i las// thabs kyi brten pa'i rdzas rnams la// 'bras bu thob pa'i thabs bstan ni// rang bzhin grub pa'i thabs bstan no// gcig dang du ma brjod
las 'dis// byang chub bsgrub pa'i don rdzogs so////
